Review: Update after 1 month of use.There is crackling sound in the background that comes during calls games music anything randomly. During calls, once the crackling starts, it continues. It is known issue with the buds, and you need to reset the device to get it back, and then again the crackling starts in 3-10 hours.Orignal review was for 3 stars as below:Pros:+ Premium packaging+ Quick pairing with OP phone+ Stylish+ (Hopefully) good battery+ USB C interface - no need for me to carry another charging cable+ Enviromental noise cancellation+ Quality of micCons:- Very very poor sound quality. A 399/- pair of wired earphones have better sound quality.- The red cable provided is a sham. It is not warp or dash charging enabled. Also, it is too short! The cost cutting in this department at 2k is not justified- Clumsy, the rubber and buttons are plain clumsy. They never sit properly, even curl some neck clumsily. On dropping the bus down, they hardly ever get magnetically closed.- No carrying pouch. The money that's wasted in the packaging which I'll never use again might have better utilised in provinding a proper pouch for the clumsy earphone- HD quality codecs like APTx etc are simply not available for this piece...All in all this product is a sham, stay away. May be at 999/- it would be a good buy!Update after 9-10 months of use:The right bud was less loud than left, but I ignored because it was minor difference. 9 months later, now right bud sounds is very less than the left one. Contacting service centre to claim warranty. Will update the experience.
Title: Stay Away

Review: It's mentioned in the features that bass edition have quick switch option, but their is no quick Switch Button. Don't know why they have mentioned it in the features. I guess they have just copy paste features from their older edition to bass edition.
Title: No Quick Switch Button

Review: So coming from a quality wired earphones to this neck band (RIP headphone jack) this wireless band cant bridge that gap.PROS-Awesome battery life,Great quick switch functionality (not available in BASE EDITION, great job one plus marketing team),Quality phone calls (get it immediately of u spend long time in meetings or calls) WFH Fever,Type C and fast charge (minor but still its there)CONS--Music will become less enjoyable so buyer beware,BASE EDITION-Music does feel good but one plus cleverly REMOVED the QUICK SWITCH and even positioned the MICROPHONE on the neck band directly while in NORMAL EDITION it used to be on the control island thingy with volume.Any physical changes must be highlighted. Guess one plus no longer enthusiast brand.Even the band to ear bud wire length is different.. had difficulty in position with my shirt collar. BASE EDITION legth is not enought. Stupid company. Had to return Bass Edition due to removal of quick switch and reduced ear cord length.
Title: Great for calls and laptop to phone switch is very easy if u need it.

Review: After viewing too many reviews on youtube I think that op bullets wireless Z will have very little bass that's why I ordered the bass edition but after trying the bass edition I found very heavy bass in this version. but as I Iove flat sound signature I feel the bass is over boosted and I am getting headaches after using it for a long time. So I decided to replace the bass edition with a regular one. People who love heavy bass can definitely go with bass edition. I love rich vocals and instruments with proper balance bass so this bass version definitely not for me. Hope the people who are confused between regular vs bass edition will get an idea from my review.
Title: Not for me (too much bass)

Review: quick feature doesn't work and even pairing with a new device distorts connectivity in a strange manner. May be i use iphone that’s why there’s a problem in Bluetooth codec. you need to reset the device everytime to solve this issue. very pathetic engineering from oneplus. work around is - never use quick pair feature. after using it with one device you just turn off the headphn, turn off bluetooth on that device, and then connect another deviceUpdate: i have exchanged my headphones and this one has the same issue. The problem is persisting even using it with one device, the cracking sound comes up after a while. So i think I should go for the normal edition
Title: Do not buy if you are an iPhone user

Review: **Important** read till the end.I am not gonna write the pros and cons of the product, everybody else covered most of them. But the most important aspect that I noticed is not covered on any website and YouTube.These earphones support v5 Bluetooth which is decent but the problem is that if you connect them with phone Bluetooth version lower than v5 than you will gonna face some issues.I have a 2-year-old Honor device which has v4.1 Bluetooth, when I listen on this device the earphones produce a low cracking sound constantly (which can't be ignored). Firstly I thought that I got a defective product, but when I tested them on other latest smartphones the problem is not there. I contacted OnePlus regarding this issue and they cleared my doubt.So, if you facing the same issue plz check the earphones on other devices too. Don't just waste your time to replace the product.OnePlus also replaces the product in the warranty period, so don't rush to get it replaced by Amazon.
Title: Best purchase but read the review

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I have purchased oneplus z ear phone on June 2020.currently the product is about to dead and while I try to connect one plus service center, they refused to provide any service.One plus is providing zero after sell servicePlease don't buy.Amazon should look after this
Title: Please don't buy, one plus is fraud

Review: if you are looking for best wireless earphones @2K, just go for it.(OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition (Reverb Red)) 👍Even though it is a Bass Edition, Bass is not too high but pretty much enough. 👍Sound quality  & volume is impressive. 👍Didn't found much "Noise cancellation", still not bad.(If your mobile bluetooth version is 4, then you might get voice disturbance & voice break since this device is having bluetooth version 5)✌Fast Connectivity.👍No Quick switch in this version(Bass Edition) 👎Comfortable 👍Battery 💪 As they mentioned, we can charge for 10 mins & can be used for 10hrs. If you charge for 1hr, you can use upto 17hrs. 💪👍much recommended product @2K 😍And, please don't compare this product with realme buds wireless. I found "one plus Bwz bass edition > Realme Buds wireless"
Title: Go for it if :

Review: Connectivity is not good enough. Battery backup is just okay. Misleading customers saying that it has quick switch features, which can only be used by oneplus phones and not by other brand phones and laptops. My 500rs boat earphones have more bass than this bass edition.
Title: Not Worth 1999.

Review: Sound quality awesome but if you want this for taking on call please don't buy as the sound quality on call is worst. You cannot hear what the other person is talking.  Otherwise for only music this is awesome . Also as soon as the magnetic buds stick together  it get disconnect and off so  only the battery is 20 hrs back up and when you again plug to ear the Bluetooth connect to you phone it's very fast .
Title: For music awesome but for phone call worst

Review: Update after 1 month of use.There is crackling sound in the background that comes during calls games music anything randomly. During calls, once the crackling starts, it continues. It is known issue with the buds, and you need to reset the device to get it back, and then again the crackling starts in 3-10 hours.Orignal review was for 3 stars as below:Pros:+ Premium packaging+ Quick pairing with OP phone+ Stylish+ (Hopefully) good battery+ USB C interface - no need for me to carry another charging cable+ Enviromental noise cancellation+ Quality of micCons:- Very very poor sound quality. Title: For music awesome but for phone call worst

Review: The earphones themselves are very well built and sturdy with a long lasting battery that charges very fast, however support for my Samsung device seems to shaky, there are scratchy sounds that occur occasionally (much like the slight distortion that comes out of speakers that have been playing at high volumes for too long)Initially I assumed it was a problem with the particular unit and not the product as a whole, but after the same issue persisted in my second pair I called up Amazon customer care and returned it immediately.I do not like the fact that OnePlus would market earphones to all brands that have issued with all other brands except their own.
Title: Not great support for non OnePlus devices

Review: Just received my product from OnePlus brand..........first of all the build quality is super duper solid, i mean literally OnePlus did a great job on this product. The sound quality is also very superb though i have purchased bass edition but i can fell that the bass quality lies between 4-5 on the scale of 5. The connection between different devices is also again very superb, it gets connected in milliseconds. The comfortability is very good, i feel no pain during heavy music sessions. It supports fast charging so you can charge it with your fast charger. It am using my laptop to charge this device but you can buy any fast charger you like but remember, only buy branded ones not cheap like quality chargers which are available at cheaper rate. I would recommend samsung 15 or 30 watt fast charger or you can also go for OnePlus official charger.Verdict: The overall quality of this product is very good at this price range, i would definately give you green light to go and buy this product (especially bass edition). It is great product under 2k.
Title: Best Wireless Neckband Earphones from OnePlus Brand

Review: Here is my review after 30 days usage of OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z BASS EDITION. Spend some minutes to know every truth of these neckband earphones.1. DESIGN and BUILD QUALITY: Completely made of premium looking plastic. Earbuds are made with glossy shiny plastic and due to usage of plastic you are very far away from the danger of getting accidental shock in case of defective electronics. Neckband is very smooth and overall the complete earphones are very light in weight. Earbuds fit in the ear perfectly. You can have a closer look at every part of these neckband earphones in the pics I have uploaded.2. BATTERY BACKUP: I was slightly disappointed here. The mentioned music playtime on the box was 17 hours at normal volume usage. I noted the time when I used them and found real life music play time. I got a total of 14 hours and 41 minutes of music play time at LOW VOLUME which is very less when you are using them at very low volume.But you can listen to music for about 12 hours at 70 - 80% volume. The battery went down from 100 to 50% in 7 hours 25 minutes. The battery gets fully charged in less than 50 minutes with my 18 watt fast charger. The best thing is the battery gets about 70%  charged in just 10 minutes ! If you use earphones about two hours daily then you need to charge them only on Sundays.3. SOUND QUALITY: No words for the sound quality! Just amazing! Its name BASS EDITION fully justifies. Highs,mids and lows of the music are very clear. Vocals are also crisp and clear. Bass is too good and balanced one. No connectivity issues while I walked in my whole house listening to music and the phone was in one corner of a room !  👉👉OnePlus have done cost cutting also. The wire length should be 3 to 4 cm more.  IS IT VALUE FOR MONEY? 💰💰 : Of course, I can say yes, it is value for money headphones. You will like them definitely.  ✅👉👉Agar Bhai ya Behen aap Indian ho toh bahut jyada bass ke chakkar mei or 400-500 rupees bachane ke chakkar mei Boat rockers taraf mat jana. Aapka sar dard karne lag jayega unko sunkar because the bass is too high and unbalanced and the human voice ( voice of singer) is very much suppressed due to bass. And Boult walo ne bass ke naam par majak kiya hua hai. I am saying this coz I have used almost 10 to 15 latest neckband earphones of my friends and my own. Realme Buds Wireless Pro are also very nice neckband headphones but remember they cost 4000 rupees.  🔥🔥But inke jaisi sound quality or high+balanced bass apko kahi nahi milega wo bhi 2000 rupees dekar !!  I hesitated for 1 month to buy these earphones but I am very glad after buying these earphones at last. So I suggest you  not to hesitate and go for it if your budget is 2000 rupees. Don't look for any other neckband earphones in this price range. If you will try to save some rupees then you are prone to fall for a low quality sound experience.
Title: Review after 1 month of continuous use👇

Review: Bought this for Mom who is into wired earphones but gets irritated by the tangling wires.The sound is not at the level of Bose, Airpods or Sony, but if you have to choose between boat, leaf, tagg and other VFM brands, then these wireless earphones are overkill for the price.Used these for Zoom Calls on my laptop as well and there were hardly any drops.Microphone worked flawlessly and sound was also clear.Bass is 4/5 but ears start paining after 2 hours of continuous usage, so one has to keep that in mind!Overall Verdict: The best VFM in the sub-3k price range for wireless earphones.Bass: 4/5Comfort: 4/5Treble: 3.5/5Battery: 5/5Connectivity: 4.5/5
Title: The Perfect VFM buy in entry level wireless headphones

Review: After seeing all the good reviews i purchased this.Built quality: 4.5/5 for first look this can be changed after long use.Sound quality: no woww factor in listening any high bass movies or instrumental songs.Battery : it takes 1 hour 20 mins to charge full to give u 17hrs of usage time. Red light turn to white to indicate full charge. 10 min charge to 10hours is just a gimik.Mic: better than previous version nothing like crystal clear.Confirt: holds good and light.
Title: Average bullet , no woww factor after using for a day

Review: Cons:Few features that are not openly mentioned. Normal Z version has a quick switch button but the Z Bass does not have this button. Auto pause is enabled when the ear pieces are joined together magnetically (off) however auto play is not enabled when they are separated (on). Right and left earpiece is not mentioned. So you have to try on your own for best fit. Though few forums suggest the right side has volume controls. These cons make you doubt the marketing intention of OnePlus.Pros:Good build, fast charging, light weight, wires are good, soft and flexible on skin, overall good sound quality, looks good, etc. Gives a feeling that you got good product giving device/product.Overall - go for it (but choose wisely between Z and Z Bass edition)
Title: This is different from normal Z and Z Bass

Review: Honest review after using 3 days very much Satisfied finally "NEVER SETTLE"1) build quality 5/52) battery backup:-16hrs max but still very happy 4.5/53)sound clarity 5/54) fast charging wrap 5/5but note that minimum 18w adapter is required if you have 30w then charge 10 min enjoy for 10 hrs upto5 )mic quality is not good but okay4/56) noise cancellation hmm 3/57) Connectivity 5/58) watching movies audio and video sync is perfect there is no delay 5/59) for gaming we can notice very slight difference but ignorable 4.7/510) bass quality 4/5 not much improvedOver all rating 4.7/5NEVER SETTLEOverall best when compared to others at this price very much Satisfied
Title: Music quality is excellent never expected high quality at this price

Review: Oneplus has become a big brand, and the earphones that I received feels great in hand, and the sound quality was good too. Biggest issue is connecting and disconnecting with my Oneplus phone. First time pairing took a lot of time, then everytime it should auto connect it was not connecting automatically. I had to manually connect in BT option. After 2 days of purchase it stopped pairing itself. Returning it now, I was hoping with the brand value there is thorough QC that would have happened, but seems not.
Title: Quality is not at par

Review: Review from an audio enthusiast, Used Sennheisers, AKG's, Audio Technica's for long time._______________________Purchased the bass Edition.Really great pair of earphones you can buy under 2K right now. (Bass Edition only)They really have improved the sound from their last generation earphones.Bass has really improved quality wise it's improved, loudness remains the same (Great response from 25HZ - 35HZ)Mids and treble has also improved, less muddy mids now, more crisp and sharp (in a good way) trebles now.You can hear other instruments too.. so its balanced not just boommyyy or anything with the bass.Use Equalizer and turn up the low frequencies up, you will be amazed by the bass response.Go ahead buy the bass edition only, you wont get any good under 2K.Cheers!!
Title: Awesome, Better then normal Ones

Review: The product was delivered the same day I purchased (Yaay! Amazon prime). But the earphone failed to impress me due to low vol in its right ear. I usually listen music at 60-80% volumes. So as soon I listened through these earphone I could tell there is some mismatch between volumes in the ears. So I listened again at low volume (30%) but could not hear anything from Right but the Left worked fine. I have opted for a replacement due to the right ear issue, although I wanted to return it but no option for it. Will update whether the problem still exists in the replaced earphone I get or not.Update: Received the replaced earphones, they still have the issue. I'm keeping it because of no return policy. However, the sound quality is good but bass is low, but okay.
Title: Don't forget to check if both the ears produce same sound quality

Review: The device stopped working with in 40 days of buying. (Well this is normal , could happen to any chinese electronic device )Problem is the customer care passed on in complete information. They did not convey the message that each service center is accepting 40 request only every day. And there is no home pick up of faulty devices.I saw about 100 people standing a queue in TDI mall Rajouri and they had to go back home because they could not get the tocken.I would say poor experience in dealing with service and customer care.
Title: Customer service

Review: I bought these as i was previously a Bullet Wireless use and had two sets bought over period of time. I fell so much in love with the produc that we shipped to all our Team members as gift during lockdown. Going by the same impression i bought Bass edition as it had all the same features listed on its official website. It's only after receiving the product i realized that OnePlus went the Chinese way and did false advertising. It does not have Quick switch feature and u can simply disconnect from current device and then connect to second device. The experience does not change even if you are using OnePlus phone as they claim. Disheartened by the deceptive advertising. Horrible experience and now it's time to say GOODBYE TO OnePlus as a Brand. No wonder all YouTubers who used to go gaga over OnePlus have been bashing recently. Dave 2D,MKBHD, Unbox Therapy, MrWhosthe boss.
Title: Cheated by Oneplus - NO QUICK SWITCH - GOING THE CHINESE WAY

Review: First of all thanks to amazon for faster delivery❤❤Oneplus z wireless earphone Reverb red❤After using 5th day without charging.(previously 80%)😊My experience: Awesome sound, perfect bass, no latency, premium feel & good battery backup(now 40%)😊Gaming experience: PUBG, COD, AMONG US, FREEFIRE & etc. Perfectly balanced & footsteps sound also without latency. 😊😊Music: 😍😍 just love itBut about noise cancellation i deduct one star😒👎. But Oneplus did a good job after Normal edition.Bit costly Rs. 1999/- 🤐
Title: Just Go for it..👍✌

Review: See as this product is Chinese, it maintains their's legacy. After using this product from 3 to 4 months, I suffered from headache, dizziness and a little blindness, I was confused at start what the hell is getting wrong with my eye sight.Later I noticed past actions and change.I believe uncontrollable radio frequences is the issue of this product, which causes damage to the brain and nervous system. So after quiting this product, I'm feeling very well and using the old style wired hansfree. I'm sharing this to aware you, rest is your choice and health and money.Thanks
Title: Product is good but not for your health

Review: Purchasd on 7 November 2020, the product is malfunctioning big time. Sound coming too low, left side went first now right side. I had purchased one more of this bass edition from other site and it has similar problems.My re 500/- JBL earphones lasted for 2  years and had better quality audio, bass than this so called bass edition. I only purchased this cuz of brand and wireless capabilities and it turned out like this. Poor quality produc!
Title: One plus Bug edition!

Review: Overall it's good but the shiny protion has too many scratchs.Talking about the sound quality it's good. For a heavy bass user it seems to be balanced bass but for me it has bass more than enough, if more bass boosted then the background instrumental music will be depressed. It's vocals sounds clear and Avg crisp, but the feeling from inside remain inside only at medium volume. From my experience I noticed that increasing the volume increases the bass and crispness.Overall it's best budget neckband in 2000. I have tested realme wirless in which driver mm are only and only number the bass the treble are less than avg. 1+ offers a very very good battery life. The last conclusion is that "Invest of 2000 for damaging your own ears is not a better deal"
Title: Sound and looks.

Review: A very poor product. Just after a month stopped working on one side with no physical damage. Service people say that this is a very common issue along with mic not working properly. Selling poor product for a premium price is just unacceptable.
Title: Faulty product with lots of issues

Review: It lasted for a month, yeah you read that right.One night as music was playing the music stopped coming to the left side. Pretty sure it's a loose connection, but still ! 2k for this is worth it if you consider what you get.Sound quality, passive noise cancellation, low bass.All the above are top notch. The build quality is top too. Materials used are fairly high quality.I guess I got a defective product. Will have to go to the store to see if they would replace. If they do, I'll let you know.If they don't replace, i don't think I would recommend it. Sennheiser provides replacement for their earphones which have loose connection.TBH this is the last time I'm buying any headphones or earphones with wires on it.
Title: Lasted for a month

Review: I did a lot of research before deciding to buy this. I was initially keen on buying a TWS but none of them were giving great quality of sound vs cost paid ratio. And I also learnt that within a year most budget tws stop working one stem. So I decided to go with this.Now I consider myself a basshead. I like punchy bass. Kinda like boat earphones when they launched. After that they became too bass heavy. This is not that. This has the right amount of bass. It's not exactly punchy but it's almost as good as it. And this sounds signature is almost impossible to find. I have listened to a lot of wired and tws earphones and nothing comes close to this. Only sony basshead surpass this but it's 4 times the price.The vocals and mids are well represented and you get an overall great music experience.I have a one plus phone so I have had no issues in gaming with these. There was a very slight delay in the normal mode but in fnatic mode the syncis perfect. I did notice a couple of sound outages when the game starts but 1700 me taj mahal khareednahai kya?Overall it's a really great but for this price range. Go for it.
Title: Near perfection for under 2k

Review: Sound is awesome , specifically the bass .I was a fan of realme ,used that almost 7 months . But after using this ,I must say this is better than realme in sound . Needless to say I am a bass lover. I am using oneplus 6T so maybe that is also a factor.CONS : -1. Noise cancellation should be little bit better.2. If you are listening music and suddenly you watch a video in YouTube then after end of the YouTube video you have to manually play the song. In realme it automatically play the song .Pro :-1. Bass2. Latency is way better (Almost zero) than other  earphones under Rs 2000. ( I almost tried all)3. Battery capacity : Nonstop music ,video  ....around 18 hours .4. Charging Capacity : Charged for exactly 10 mins.  Jumps from 20% to 90%Thank you Amazon for oneday delivery.
Title: Oneplus Bass edition is awesome.

Review: Sturdy build quality, sound is clear but even though this is marketed as bass version, I cant feel much of bass. If the bass version is so light on bass, I wonder how the earlier models used to perform. But other wise this is good piece.Moreover the bluetooth toggle button is not present in this model (my oversight while buying) which is not a good step. As ability to toggle between devices with press of a button is really very good feature. I would have paid some extra buck for that, but sadly thats not present
Title: Above average product, not for bass lover even though this is claimed to be bass version

Review: Had a great expectations from this 1+ so called bass edition earphones. But got very disappointed with the quality of sound it produces.Great connectivityGreat mic qualityGreat ear comfortGreat built qualityVery poorest sound quality, which is main purpose of any earphones.Had checked reviews of this on various platforms like YT & other ecom websites, there were so many positive reviews. Now I am strongly feeling it those all were seems paid reviews.If I wanted this kind of worst bass, then I could have went for Ptron. I am not de-grading Ptron, because they are offering products at less pricing & can't expect much from them.But if 1+ is taking 2k for their so called bass edition earphones, but they are not providing that much good quality bass. By just adding dhoom dhoom bass they have simply hampered the sound quality.Many time I love to hear songs at close to full volume & listening those in 1+ are so irritating. I have to try & keep changing equaliser settings for every single song in my F62 phone.My Sennheiser CX180 at far far far giving great sound quality.So my honest opinion strongly not recommended for those who actually looking good quality sound output.Those who just looking for just dhoom dhoom sound, please don't waist your 2k for 1+. Go for Ptron instead, at least you'll save your min 1k rupees.
Title: Honest Review- Simply Disappointed with 1+

Review: Pls avoid One Plus.The right side earphone stopped working exactly after two months. The service centre was kind enough to arrange for a pick and drop.That was the only good part. It's been almost 2 weeks, I get contrasting updates from the call centre.1st updateThe repairs are yet to be assigned to a service engineer2nd updateThis will be prioritised and someone from the service centre will call. It's been one week, I have not received any call.3rd UpdateGot to know from the call centre executive that the service centre is closed due to pandemic.  If this is true, basic courtesy says that I should be informed about this.Please avoid One Plus products. All hype nothing else
Title: One side earphone not working

Review: Pros:* Loght weight* Battery life* Noise Cancellation* Ease of switching between devices (Need to press pause / resume button for 3-4 seconds. It disconnectes and you will need to manually add it to alternative device)* Quick chargeCons:* Lack to dedicated sound control button near left ear. (This made control easier - this was included in the original OnePlus Bullets Wireless). But that is 2K costlier than OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition. So thats okay.* Wire width is little less.
Title: Good product. Detailed review below.

Review: This review might be long, but it's honest. These are one of the best in ear wireless earphones for the price, out in the market right now. I purchased this for my brother, and later, I got the same earphones for my birthday. I also use a Sony WI-C400 (priced around Rs.3500) and Apple Airpods Pro, and I will be comparing the bullets wireless Z bass edition with these two.Pros:1) This one charges very quickly, especially if you have a OnePlus Warp charger adapter. I use a OnePlus 8 and these earphones charges to a 100% in around 40 mins. The Sony on the other hand takes around 3 hours to get to full charge.2) It pairs instantly. As soon as you separate both the earpieces, it pairs with the phone in under 4 seconds. It is similar to what happens with an iPhone and Airpods/Airpods Pro. To pause the music or video, you just have to clip them both together, which also turns off the earphones, thus saving battery.3) Very lightweight and comfortable. The earphones weigh just 28 grams, and while wearing them, I don't actually feel it. It also looks good when one wears it. The Sony earphones were heavy and sometimes uncomfortable.4) The sound quality is very good. It is actually better than the Sony in terms of clarity and loudness. I rarely have to raise the volume to 50%. The bass is decent; I wouldn't say it's great, even with the bass edition. But considering the price, the bass is pretty good.5) IP55 water resistance means that I can use these earphones while working out or when I go out cycling.Cons:-1) It has a noticeable amount of latency. Even though OnePlus advertises low latency of 100ms, you can actually feel the latency while watching videos or listening to music. The Sony WI-C400 is way better in terms of latency; it's almost non existent.2) While playing games and listening to music at the same time, the music seems to break every now and then. This did not happen with the Sony WI-C400, and this irritates me every time.Final verdict: If your budget is around 2000-2500, then don't look for anything more, buy the OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition. If you are willing to spend more, then I would suggest you go for Sony. I have been a long time Sony user, and all Sony earphones I have used has lasted at least 3 years for me. Sony earphones are made in Vietnam, while OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition is made in China. For me, only time will tell how durable this earphone is, but I'll surely be updating this review is anything goes wrong.
Title: Definitely worth the money, but not the best

Review: It's light weight..Fits well in Ear better it sits better is the sound quality.Call quality is good even for longer durationLiked the feature of auto power on connect when buds are separated and off when joined.10 min of rapid charge gives 10 hours thats almost shows 80% of charge and to 💯% takes around 30 to 45 minutes.Could manage a around 11 -13 hours on every charge with mixed usage.Cons.Does not have MUTE buttonDoes not vibrate while recieving calls should be dependent on phone..One less 🌟 for no mute button..

Review: One of the best you will get in this price tag ... From design, sound and latency all things are working great .. the sound signature is very similar to sonyXb. Just one thing they have not provided that they kept charging slot open,there is no cap protection.. always keep your mic clean and dry from sweat or any other liquid thing their mic is no that much capable.Design: 3/5Bass:4.5/5Battery life:5/5Vocals:4/5Latency:5/5
Title: One of the best wireless neckband under 2k

Review: All I was looking for was a decent earpiece. I read its review & researched a bit. I thought it was a good enough earphone will be, for me. I was mistaken. I will also agree that I fell for advertisement, and didn't listen to my heart which was forbidding me to give it a green signal. Sound quality is not even close to what I expected. It's simply flat. It doesn't even have a bass. Very irritating. Why would you go for an earphone, which lacks quality sound? There's no cancellation of noise. I get to hear what people whisper, when I use this earphone, forget it cancelling noise. Only thing you don't have to worry about is its charging. Once charged it runs for a very long time. Rest is okay.

Review: If you are an iphone user like I’m;Music listing in this: frustrating:Why ?Ans: when you play music in it you will listen glitch sound in every bit,Im having spotify premiumWhere they provide clear with beat quality music but i wont be able to enjoy such quality because of this negligence of product testing,If you are planning to buy it only for call purposes then good to go but,Hey its 2000 rs,You should have your demands like i have ,As i dont have any option as i dont know what to do,I already return a product and get another one but same problem,Look like manufacturing issue.1+ if you are reading this ,Please work up on your testing team,You can’t launch such product in market without proper premium quality testing.Disappointed..🥺
Title: Iphone use stay away from this headphone...

Review: I got fooled by all the reviews and bought this junk. The build quality is so bad it didn't last me 6 months. The wires look sturdy in the beginning but they dont last for long, they start to rupture near the speakers. I initially thought it was due to my extensive use but asking my friends who also bought this proved this was a build issue coz they were facing this too. My friend actually lost one earphone coz his left earphone's wires ruptured and it just fell off. I had to cut mine and resolder to make my left earphone to work again. But the problem has recurred and I've given up, will have to buy new ones. Yea sound is decent but if you are looking for something long lasting, THIS EARPHONES SHOULD NOT BE YOUR PICK.

Review: Negative ---i have used Sony wired ear phone, and the sound was much much better then this. yes it has some bass, but you may not like it after a minute, and it will sound like noise to your ears.you cannot connect two devices simultaneously, which i was able to do with my Rs. 600 rupees Bluetooth earlierit was also not very comfortable in my earsPositive----built quality is very good, seems durableconnection to devices is quick, which are pairedmagnetic on and off feature is very usefulthe battery life is very good, in 5 minutes charging you may get decent hours of battery back upits OK and good for calling but for high quality music, i would not use it.

Title: Reverb Red -bass edition

Review: Here are some points which i lovedPros- 10 min charge for 10 hours is a blessing  - bass is better as compared to the old version  - build quality is good with buttons included  - getting about 14 -15 hrs of battery backup  - call quality is satisfactory  - comfortable for using 6-7 hours continuously  - latency is very low 110 ms which is very low and you will not feel any lag in voice while gamingCons- quick switch button is skippedThese are the best neckband i
Title: Best neckband for 1999/-

Review: Let me first clearly put this the delivery from Amazon is on time no complaint on the same.The issue is with the product, never anticipated such a poor product from OP.I purchased the product on 8th July, received the product on 10th July.It's unfortunate that I couldn't spare the time to test it completely in first few days to understand the product is not worth. I could realize it after using for 5/6 days, after which I couldn't go for a return or refund.There was too much of rattling noise, even other parties complained about noise.As suggested by Amazon CS, I went to nearest OnePlus service center on a Saturday, they said that I have to come on Monday - Friday between 11 am - 3pm and I have to make a prior appointment on call. I tried to reach over call for an week never got anyone on call.I went to service center directly then they told I have to take an advance token, which I got for 16th Aug. Finally on 16th August I could submit the product. I was told that I'll be updated over call. After 2 weeks also there was no call, so I had to call the help line as the service center phone was never available, and I came to know that for accessories they never call back and my replacement is ready. So went again got my replacement.This time it worked for a while and showed up issues again, so I called up helpline and went for a pickup service.The pickup was prompt no issues, after 10 days I got the parcel too. After opening I realized nothing was done simply they returned the same piece without any information.When I called again they said I can submit again.Lost 2 months of time without using the product. 2 months warranty also gone. So much time invested in following up and running to service center, it's frustrating.I used to be huge fan of OnePlus phones, seems like the OnePlus era has finished.
Title: A total junk, don't buy save time and money

Review: Product was really amazing when I started to use but over the past months it started to show issues like left ear not working, and within this week the bluetooth connection is not getting done.. the product is not working. Never thought of experiencing such a bad issue that too within the warranty period.I am gonna connect with the OnePlus team, hope they have an answer to this issue.
Title: Got complain within 6months

Review: There is a crackling sound during calls.You can reset it, but after one call, crackling sound starts coming again. So I got tired of resetting and decided to send it for repair.Sent the device for repair, they sent me a new one in replacement.Same issue with new one also.So buy only if you will not be using it for calls. Although, sound quality while listening to music is good.
Title: Not recommended at all.

Review: For media playing activities like watching videos and listening to music it's fine. The problem steps in when you make calls or receive one. There is an unusual noise along with the speech that both people hears which degrades the audio quality very much. I confirmed with a friend of mine who also has the same one plus bullets wireless neck band. He addressed the same issue. I started using the unit little late so I missed the product return window.To all folks out there I suggest you to go for the realme ones or maybe boat for hazzle free calling. For listening to music and playing games one plus ones is good.Battery backup is ok. I don't use it continuously. Lasted me more than a day. It's decent.
Title: Bad for calling. Ok for audio listening

Review: Just after 3 weeks of the delivery, the sound quality of the product degraded drastically. I went to the official service center of oneplus near me, there were around 20 customers and 80% of them had this bullets wireless z and had came to get repaired. Some had their one side of the earphones stopped working, some had an issue with the microphone, some had Bluetooth issues and some were like me, having issues with the sound quality. This product is a total failure. Although some of the customers were getting a replacement which were in warranty and had unsolvable issues, but it's always better to not buy a product which will cost your time and may be money also eventually. Even after a repair, my earphones are still not performing as you would expect from a ₹2k earphones, the issue still persists.As I said, It's a total failure. Oneplus is no longer a community driven company. Everyone knows what they become now. Ignore this earphones and find something else. Or wait for some time, save some money, and buy a better product though it would cost a bit more.
Title: Read this before buying

Review: I purchased this in Feb 2021.its July and it has suddenly stopped working.It's not responding and the LED indicator has also stopped glowing.I can hear a faint crackling sound from the earpieces, even when they are connected together magnetically and supposed to be off.Very disappointed by the quality.I left it on for a whole day to try and discharge the battery. After it discharged, I charged it again, and it started working properly.

Then it's get connected. Call voice is very bad and not clear. Went for this hoping it's brand and will give best voice calls and connect but very disappointed. One plus please assist. Title: Connection and voice calls

Review: These earphones are ideal for listening to songs and watching movies but if you're intending to use it for calling activities, please reconsider. The excess bass comes in the way of listening while on call due to which one can't hear clearly what's being said. I've never faced any negative feedback from call recipients with reference to mic quality. There's no echo issue while calling i.e. one does not hear ones own voice while on call. Further, the battery life is awesome. I get 2 days of usage time and a little more for the next day. I typically use this for work which requires me to be on call stand-by for 10 hours per day. Its connectivity is also good. I can continue a conversation outside of a room but it begins to drop if I move into a 2nd room. On initial switch on, it connects to the device instantly. It's extremely comfortable to wear all day long and is light weight. The magnetic touch function is counter productive as it doesn't instantly recieve calls when detached. Thus, one needs to always ensure that both the ear plugs stay detached at all times so that whenever one recieves a call, one can answer it immediately without having to detach it first and then wait for Bluetooth to connect and then attend the call. This is a major inconvenience as such. The buttons are just ok. I wish they would've been more tactile and responsive. Sometimes one really needs to be patient with the volume up and down buttons as they aren't as responsive for operation as one would like it to be. The call recieve and cancel button is good. The ear plugs fit perfectly and can be used for long hours but I personally prefer using any one at a time due to long hours of usage. I haven't felt any radiation side effects like some of my earlier Bluetooth headphones for which I'm thankful. Further, the charging time taken is excellent. Please note there's no active noise cancellation as mentioned by other reviewers.
Title: Ideal for listening to songs, not taking calls

Review: This headphone is pretty basic and surely overpriced. The non-bass edition has a physical switch tow toggle between paired devices. This one does not. The documentation for the device claims that we can go to the bluetooth settings of the paired devices to choose this headphone for switch. I have two problems with that:1. It is not "auto" switching.2. It does not work 75% of the timeThe sound quality is "acceptable" at best. There's no bass. Call quality is okay.I would not recommend this headphone at anything above 600 INR.
Title: BASS edition?? More like BASE edition

Review: It’s a nice product, you can buy it without any doubt, not worrying about whether you’ll have to return this or not even when now Amazon doesn’t provide with this feature anymore.It’s best for bass liking people.Sound is very good, little bit on the bass-y side.Only 2 cons:-• Mic positioning is not good as the Oppo Enco M31. It should’ve been in the wire but it’s in the band and tends to block under the collar or may be the neck itself.• There is a cracking sound when you regulate the volume. It’s while adjusting the Volume only. However the sound quality of any MP3 you hear or watch any movie, the proper audio would be there but when you regulate the volume at that certain point of time, it will produce the noise.
Title: Read the review

Review: Update: This is a much-delayed update. I took the device over to the service center that very weekend, the good people at the service center did something and got it working again. Haven't had any problems since, hence the updated 3/5 rating from the earlier 1/5.Original Review: I bought this device on 6th Jan 2021, it died on 12th Feb 2021. It died during a morning video call abruptly, the last sound from it was apparently a screech that only my friend could hear and I couldn't. I didn't know at that time that it had died, thought a recharge was all it needed. Alas, that was the very end of it.The two months it lasted, it did well. Many a podcast. audiobooks and songs from all genres were heard with it. And hence the 3 star rating for its features. The last few days of listening to Daft Punk and Gorillaz will be the memories I'll keep.This sad, abrupt and early demise of it has shaken my confidence enough to not consider getting the same OnePlus Bullets or any of their headphones.I will be reaching their service center to see if anything can be done, maybe a replacement that'd last for longer, hoping the service doesn't fall short just as the product did.
Title: Edit: The Service Center Revived It! [Old Post: Device died in just 2.5 months of moderate use]

Review: I trusted OnePlus brand but it let me down. The connectivity is a joke. device disconnects without reason. Quick change between is worst about this device. It doesn't have the power button to switch quickly between devices. Earbuds are little better than wireless buds 2. apart from that everything else is worst.
Title: Had a Worst Experience

Review: I’ve been using these bullets for 1 month now. The things I’ve noticed... just amazing! Well, if we talk about the specs this product comes with, there is no doubt it’s all correct! I especially like the battery life of these earphones. I sometimes go more than a week without charging and it’s just an awesome experience overall! Well, the sound quality is really soothing. There is one flaw that drags me behind from having a complete experience... it’s the comfort. If you’ve used one of those EarPods provided with an iPhone, you’ll experience a very strong discomfort while using these earphones. The eartips of the bullets are quite uncomfortable for a long term usage. Still, I’d say if you are experienced with using that specific type of eartips you’ll be just fine. If anyone asked me to rate this product out of 10 I’d give it like a 8.5/10.
Title: Awesome!

Review: After 2 month, mic is not working properly, very less voice is going to other side over the calls.another person cant hear me properly.and there is no any damage or liquid spillage on the device.Warranty claim has been raised through one plus care app. lets see what they will tell,,,,will uodate soon
Title: After 2 month review

Review: Yet another amazing piece by OnePlus. I've mostly heard great reviews about the Bullets Z and received positive responses from peers. So, decided to go ahead with the purchase.2 months into usage and not once has this one failed to deliver. Seamless connectivity on my Mi 10t Pro. Cross Mobile brand connection does not seem to have any issues.Pros:1. Magnetic strength on buds is powerful enough to hold. Unlike my previous "Mivi Collar 2b". Worst magnetic strength ever and flew away from my shoulders when i was riding and not wearing them. Quite glad that it did.2. Battery backup comes upto 14-15hrs on normal usage and conditions.3. Range seems pretty alright too. Yet to test extreme lengths. Will share an update.4. Comfortable around the collar and stylish looking as well.Cons:1. Does not support connecting to 2 devices at a time. This is a vital feature if one's accustomed to having this feature on earlier earphones experiences.2. Latency seems really high as tested on multiple mobiles from different OEM.Thank you for reading! Please feel free to hit the 'Helpful' if you've benefitted from my analysis.
Title: Value for money

Review: A great deal i must say.I have ordered the one plus wireless bullets z bass edition on the day after it was lunched blindly trusting on the brand "ONE PLUS" and have to say it's worth it.After using it for 2 days,i have some pros and cons.--Pros--1)Great emerging sound quality especially bass as mentioned.Bass will bring a smile on your face when you listen it for first time.2)Great build quality.3)Light weight.4) Stable Connection.5)Lower latency than previous version.6) Position of Mic on the band is not problematic at all.--CONS--1)Having no device switch key and also the feature is missing.2)Battery life is lesser than previous version.#GO FOR IT.
Title: ONEPLUS BULLETS WIRELESS Z BASS EDITION

Review: Pro:We can pair the neckband with 3 devices in the BASS edition while in the REGULAR edition we can do the same with 2 devices only.Cons:1. Mic location is over neckband in BASS edition.2. At the price of 2k there is NO quick switch physical button in the BASS edition while it is available in the regular edition, we need to switch manually by going into the Bluetooth setting of the device each time we need to connect.
Title: Feeling Cheated & Disappointed at price Rs 2,000

Review: purchased it on 19 october 2020 , got it delivered on 25 october 2020 (as promised by amazon).I have used it extensively for these 3-4 days and charged it once till now. (got it with 90% charge)based on the usage of this time framePROS-1. Adequate bass (youtube and inbuilt mi music player), superb bass with any equaliser (i used spotify)2. connection is seamless.. but sometimes gets disconnected automatically ,, but very rare,, all i do all day is connect and disconnect so may be thats why it happens (once in 50 times )3. magnetic on off works perfect4. Battery life is magnificent ,  can last the whole day in most extensive usage5. Music quality is above par at full volume and full bass.6 call quality is too good , person on other side can hear properly without knowing that u r using any bluetooth device7. bluetooth range is 15-20m. , can place your phone in center of your house and will catch signals wherever you go in houseCONS:1. feels delicate , may break with little force (may , as i have not tried to break), so use carefully2. due to magnetic buds ,, size is too big ,, difficult to use more than 2 hours straight3. it looks so stylish and attractive ,so people may borrow most times ,lol :P
Title: Astonished with the product ! Worth the price. (bass edition)

Review: although the bass is good, it overpowers the actual audio. for example your watching a movie and something heavy falls down while people are talking, in a normal set up you can ear everything everyone is saying but in these headphones you will hear the thud louder due to the extra bass because of which the full experience is compromised. but this is not a very common scenario. But the really good part about it is the instant connection from the moment you separate the magnets it will instantly connect to your last connected or closest device which to me is very convenient. The battery life is also great and can last for 2 days with no problems on a full charge at 40% volume (anything louder than that will damage your eardrums😂💀). Overall worth the price but could have been better.
Title: its good for the price

Review: Build quality is very low but sound clarity or bass is awesome. One of best feature is not available in this band is that there is no support for ear, So when you walk or do something it is not holding properly ear and one more problem is that it's light is blinking all the time while I use, it is annoying for me, specially in night. Instead of buying this, buy Realme neck band, with realme band you can get all features like ear support, metal body and one time light blinking while you connection your phone.
Title: Don't Buy this, Low Build Quality | I Recommend Realme NeckBand, they have metal build.

Review: Received the item on time.- thanks to Amazon d we livery. The product is good quality and reproduces sound adequately. The battery life is amazing... Haven't taken formal measurements but easily lasts 7-8 good at least ...Used it for jogs and they almost stay in place.. you have to push them in once in a while... But I wear them loose... Could be my issue...It is easily identified and paired with the device's. The functionality of it switching off when the earphones are magnetically stuck to each other and on when separated is very practical. The pairing time is also fast so that by the time  you separate the ear pieces and put them in your ear, they are paired and ready to go. If fit snuggly, they provide ample passive noise cancellation.Strongly recommended for high value for money and performance.
Title: Good performance and value for money.

Review: It has good bass but the problem is that it's not deep and is somewhat on the sharper side. And that spoils the overall sound quality. The piece I received sometimes doesn't turn on after it switches off and I do not know how to get that taken care of.
Title: Found it not bad but not good enough either.

Review: First ordered got replaced, would like to share my experience after using it for 15 daysI was getting cracking sound in my first  earphones so got it replaced but after doing all setting changes, cleaning cache of device  blutooth, resetting headphones the problem didn't go, but the issues was with my deviceSolution - please uninstall any additional equalizer if installed on phone, which I have being using (wavelet), the prob go solved.Now the cons firstThe battery indicator is not accurate, it changes from red to white after charging for 1 hr 20 mintues, I have tried charging it for 20 mintues the battery shows 100 % which is not accurate but the red light doesn't change to white, so 20 minutes full charge is fake (using my oneplus 8 pro wrap charger and wire given in earphones box)The claim of 17 hrs is myth, using aac codec and 30 volume u will get 12 to 13 hrs bsckup maximum.Calling is avgRange is avgProsWith one plus device it sounds good but oppo m31 is better in sound qualityBattery is ok as I m not gamer with avg use of 3 to 4 hrs it will last 3 daysNo delay or lags in videos or musicComfortsble eartips, u can use them for long hrsControls are good, u can easily recognize all the buttonsBuild quality is goodGot it for 1600 after 200 cashback so recomend specially if ur using oneplus deviceIf only sound quality is ur preference plz buy oppo m31, if u want overall then go for oneplus z bass edition.
Title: Best suited  for one plus devices but has cons

Review: Every product or OnePlus is highly recommended. The price bracket is on the higher side, but its value for its money. The bass effect, flexibility and the colour combination is so amazing. The connectivity is quick. YOU DONT NEED TO CHARGE FOR MORE THAN 30 MINS. THOUGH the charging light colour doesn't change even after charging
Title: OnePlus...it's brand is enough. VERY VERY good

Review: everything else is okaybut the mic is horriblethe sound breaks while you chat onlineeven though you have speedy internetthe mic catches ambience noise from 200 feet radius & there is no way you can change itbass makes you sound unrealthere are not many settings on to improve anything on the sound settings of the laptopwhile other cheaper mics give noise reduction setting etc in enhancementsi use the old microphone with these bluetooth earphones for online calls & chatting
Title: don't buy for online chat-calls

Review: Been wanting to buy this for sometime,but as usual,had to do my research first,and boy was it worth it!  I'll keep the review simple-Pros.*Build quality is nice,not luxury-premium nice,but feels robust and doesn't feel cheap.*Very comfortable to wear,the earbuds fit snugly in the ears.. the neckband part is made of a soft and smooth silicon material that feels velvety.** Connectivity is pretty perfect😁.using the magnetic on off system is very smooth and seamless.I tried testing the distance it could maintain by keeping my phone on my bed,while playing some music and I pretty much walked all around the house,even went upstairs.no trouble,at some angles,even four thick walls didn't make a difference 🤔*** Sound quality- I'd say like a 8/10. But given the price you're getting this at,it's a 10/10.It sounds crystal clear,decent soundstage.Zero cable noise,and yes,it's definitely been tuned for extra bass!! It did feel a bit bass heavy in some styles of music,but never overbearing. A little tweaking with the EQ and you'll obviously find your preference. Having said that, it sounds well balanced straight out of the box.** This unit does not have ANC,but because of it's in-ear form factor,the noise cancellation is  good enough... You can't hear anything while you have music on for sure. (It does get annoying is you're chewing crisps or something 😂)*Battery life is excellent,lasts atleast 2-3 days of regular use.Like, I won't use it for the said 17hrs straight, obviously.*does not induce battery anxiety.Been using it for like 4days,charged it only once so far.Now haven't come across any Cons so far, my only concern is its a bit uncomfortable to lie down in bed with(on your sides),as the shape of the buds either get the sound blocked or it pushes on parts of your ear uncomfortably.Now let's see how it holds up with long term use.
Title: Really happy with this. Punches way above its weight class!!

Review: Disappointed with this piece by one plus.They claim 17 hours after the bass boost whtever they have done.I had the normal bullets one of one plus too before. This one just doesn't last that long. It will drain in 12 hours with a full charge of constant use. The price is the same as the previous one. But I think they have saved some money on this one.Quality of cable is good. Build quality is good. But go for the normal bullets one. Is what I will suggest. Those are way way better and they last 18-19 hours too of usage. ( Claims 20) still fine.
Title: Battery didn't last as claimed 17 hours.

Review: This product is looks good but I don't know there is issue in voice of you hear there is some voice cranky ness is there. You will definitely notice after use of a day or 2.I have got replaced item then also in replaced one also same problem is there don't now this issue with my product only or others also noticing this?I suggest go for wired one if wireless is not that much useful for you.
Title: How's the voice quality

Review: First, all the reviews displayed on this page are from Regular Wireless Z edition only.As of all you know about features / sound quality / bass quality / Battery backup, so here I'll not tell about them because you know everything.Difference between Regular Wireless Z Edition & Bass Edition.Reviewed after 3 hour of use.- 👎🏻 - Quick switch button removed in Bass Edition.- 👍🏻- Bass quality really really really improved but if you're basshead and wants some intense DUPCHIK DUPCHIK then it's not for you.- 👎🏻 - Battery hours reduced to 17 hours but never mind.- 👍🏻 - Design / Modules look premium.I'll keep updating more in time after use. Stay updated.
Title: *BASS EDITION* REVIEW

Review: The earphones are good no issues while using them and also they fit good in your ear. No issues while using its features like Play/Pause, Next, Pervious. The buttons are perfect and feels like smooth and no issues while using them. The response of the buttons are also good and no delay. The assistance of Siri and Google also works fine with the device. I am facing problem in Paring the earphones with Asus Zenfone 5Z as my software and all are updated to the latest. Still working on trouble shoot steps will keep you updated around the same.
Title: Nice and Comfortable Earphones.

Review: Good quality material. Excellent sound quality and battery backup. Gets 2-3 days with good usage. Recommended. Go for it. I've used samsung level u before, but let me tell you, this is way better than level u. Sturdy too. Twice it got splashed water inside the ear piece; stopped working for a while, dried it, started working again as if nothing has happened. Excellent quality. Get it, you'll definitely love it at it's price point.Only con is it will be paired and synchronised better with one plus, ie connectivity is better with one plus than other brands.
Title: Good one. Go for it without any second thought..

Review: When I tried it first time, felt amaged, later after a month everything changed....The good part is Very very low frequency sound or bgm also clearly audible, bass is little low, but u can enjoy good quality vocal,May be this piece of ear phone has few issues or whole model might be having,1)As it is able to increase lows to high, the sometimes I feel unnecessary noise also..2)If it comes to mic it's pathatic, mic is far from mouth but it can capture decent vocal, unfortunately it is capturing 60% noise and 40% voice, people on call with me asking me to remove wireless,3) disconnection issue, it gets disconnects while on call, or watching movie it's not frequently happens, but few times in a week it happens, even we are beside the phone it's getting disconnecting I am using oneplus brand phone, if I try laptop or other devices connecting to them is little difficult but after connecting it is working perfectly..
Title: Good to go if you are going to listen only hd music..

Review: It has been two days I am using this product and i am quite satisfied with its over all performance. In terms of sound quality i was confused as all the reviews voted for oppo enco m31 but this one is not that bad either.Pros :Battery lifeway to turn it on and off is really cool.sound quality is good in this rangepremium build qualityCons :the battery capsules are a bit heavy.the blutletooh connection swap button should be there like the bullet z.
Title: Amazing product. go for it.

Review: SOUND QUALITY - Best . Way better than oppo enco. To the people comparing this with realme. Yes the sound is louder in realme headphones but the quality of sound is better in one plus.BASS QUALITY - No doubt why it's named bass edition it's really powerful, thumpy and don't get distort even at full volume.COMFORT : I find it less comfortable than oppo enco. If you can gave up on sound quality over comfort, go for oppo enco. Those are really comfortable not gonna lie.BATTERY : Warp charging works really amazing and on full charge i think 3-4 days for me I listen almost 3-4 hours of music and calling for 1-2 hours daily.CONNECTIVITY : REALLY FAST LITERALLY. Missing the quick switch though..DURABILITY : Feels durable, using all the time even sleeping with it.Overall: 4/5 (1star reduced due to less Comfortable)
Title: Terrific

Review: Don't just go by 4Star reviews and ratings. not at all good.Day 1 - Charged to 100% and used for 20min and disconnected from iPhoneDay 2 - Not able to turn on the device so charged again still 100% used 10min disconnected from PhoneDay 3 -  Was trying to turn on again Not able to do so charged again to 100% this is the daily work habit.Was using sony before it used to give 1-week usage with one full charge.Now run to service centre for new device
Title: Problem From Day one

Review: This is my 2nd Purchase ( Red & Black Color )The Best thing about OnePlus Z Wireless is the Bluetooth Connectivity. It's way better than Competitors and other brands like Jabra etc., and the Bluetooth Range is incredible.The sound is loud enough, but I would request the OnePlus Team to use them at least 10/12 mm Driver in the edition. Also, provide Song Forward & Reverse option, which is badly missing.Bass is Satisfactory, but not Great.Battery Back-Up is Good.It is highly recommended but in Black Color.I am happy.
Title: Excellent Product

Review: I had purchased this for the second time after my first one was stolen. The first was ones wire was peeling after one month of use. The second one worked well for 7 months after which battery backup fell drastically and I was recharging it almost twice a day. 9 months into it, the magnetic on-off is not working . I was initially happy at the price and quality it was offered but if this is its level of endurance then it is as normal as any non branded or competitors neckband and makes no sense to pay higher price . I bought this as a gift for two of my friends one of which had latency issues within the first week. Sure to say will not buy this again for myself or anyone else. If you are ready to take a chance, the sound, bass quality and noise attenuation are nice and adequate for most audiophiles. The lows are not as crisp . It gets pretty loud. The mic is not appreciated by those you will call and I had to always hold it closer .
Title: Does not Survive

Review: These are good but can be better much betterIf you are in love with music 🎶 though these are also in the category of bad these are decent but if you more of a music lover go for oppo m31 wireless earphones.What I feel is this is a good purchase these will serve you very well for work out sessions and runs.The best thing is connectivity just detach the magnets and it is paired with your phone it can be a one plus device or anyone the connectivity is top notch.You can pair 3 devices at a time though it does not have a connectivity switch button like the original one but still it does the work.I am quite happy and relaxed with this purchase the battery backup is awesome listening from 3 days with like 4hrs of use everyday still it is not out of charge.
Title: Good one from 1+ at this price point, must buy if you are not a music lover

Review: The product was delivered nicely and on time, so no issues there. The design is also pretty cool, the color and build quality are decent.However, I mainly purchased these as an upgrade after my OnePlus bullets wireless Z (non-base edition).  They didn't turn out to be an upgrade. The bass is improved, sure, but at the cost of clarity in voice quality. If you want loud sound, these are decent. However, the clarity and "originality" of sound is not as good as it's former version.Besides that, my use case for headphones is on my OnePlus 7T Pro and my MacBook Pro (2019). They work fine on OP 7T Pro, but that's a constant cracking sound while connected to Macbook and it was super annoying. I've seen some tutorials for how to get rid of it, tried them but didn't seem to be working. But then I didn't spend enough time on the problem so I believe it could be solved if I tried harder.One more reason that I hate this particular version over it's precursor is the absence of a quick switch.  Currently, I do not need to touch my devices (phone or MacBook) to connect my headphones to them. All I need to do is double-tap the switch on headphones and it disconnects with one, connects to the other. Double-tap again and it switches to the former one. However, in this particular version, that button has gone and now, you have to go into Bluetooth settings of the device that you want to connect these headphones with, even after they are paired. It sucks.
Title: Fine product but not even close to former OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z

Review: Previously owned the realme wireless buds & comparing it to that, this one has an edge over OnePlus smartphone users as the connectivity is pretty fast & the latency is better in this one. The built quality is better on the realme though.The bass edition doesn't have the quick switch button unlike it's predecessor which was one major feature.The best part of these earphones are warp charging & it just takes 10 minutes for hours of use. And again if you have a OnePlus just go without any second thought.
Title: Works like a charm for OnePlus users!

Review: Guys....  believe me please don't buy this earphonesThere is lots of issue in connectivity + on call disturbanceI spend 1800/- thought its one plus device it will perform well but at the end very bad experienceNo doubt battery back up is too good you can listen songs it will work. GoodBut when we use for calling purpose Oh good such poor performanceI request you all don't buy
Title: BELIEVE ME DON'T BUY THIS

Review: After going through multiple reviews, asking bunch of people and applying my own mind, i zeroed in on this one.. the highlights:- excellent sound quality- good call clarity includes a decent amount of noise cancellation- fantastic colour combination- minimalistic designan important aspect was whether i need to take the one plus wireless edition (the normal one) or this one.. i can tell from experience that this one is definitely a better choice and that includes voice calling
Title: The best earphones you can purchase under 2k

Review: Note : GOT the solution for cracking sound.  The crackling sound comes when you use the headphones at full volume. And if your device have a option like absolute volume that is used to maintain bluetooth headphone and phone device volume consistent. In this mode makes the bluetooth headset in full volume so don't use that.Last few years i only used wired headphones only and that is also only from boat products. When coming in to bluetooth headphone i checked out different product. . Most of the reviewers had this one in the 1st place. It will be best for the OnePlus and iphone devices.Pros1. Once both magnet connected it will automatically disconnect. And if you remove them it conncets instantly. Even though during calls you may feel a 1 or 2 sec delay.2. Battery was awesome. It depends on the usage for me it will last 2 to 3 days.3. Audio quality and bass is ok for the price. Volume is also good.4. Build quality is good not the best.Cons1. After a few days i have faced cracking sound. I have reset the headset but it won't go . Then i tried change the codec it worked for a day. Then it happens again so you have to do the samething again like a loop. I don't know how long i have to the samething.2. No aptx, LDAC only SBC for android and AAC for iphone users. That's worst.3. There is quick switch button or last redial features.4. Gaming only useful if you have oneplus deviceIt's not worth for 2000 rs😡
Title: It's an ok product

Review: PROS:  *The quality of this product is just mind blowing, its looks premium in design & build, 9/10.  *Bass is not that much but when u enable the equalizer and adjust the bass frequency in (YouTube music, Spotify) means, its mind blowing. 9/10.  *It fits perfectly in ears. 10/10.  *Play/pause magnetic feature is a added advantage. 10/10CONS:  *The neckband rubber is not that but comfortable, Feels likes the neckband rubber part is little small(Personal opinion) 8/10
Title: Top Notch Audio Quality with High Basssss!!!!!

Review: If you are using bluetooth mouse and keyboard on mac then this headset is not for you.1. Audio gets scrambled/distorted because of wireless inference.2. I read and tried several options to reduce the inference thinking it would reduce the distortion but none of that helped.3. I even tried replacing this headset with a new one to check if the one i received was faulty. However the new piece as well had the same problem.So I wouldn't recommend this to anyone who is on mac platform and is using bluetooth mouse/keyboard
Title: Be careful if you are using macOS along with bluetooth keyboard/mouse

Review: The headphones are good and handy the sound quality was better, noise cancellation will be average,while playing games some times rarely the sound will go mute. I don't why the sound was going mute every thing was fine and the phone was already connected but some how the sound will get muted. But it is not a problem we can turn off the Bluetooth and fix the issue within a minute. Like simple every item has some disadvantages in their own. Some of the reviews will be negative but think that we cannot satisfy every person expectations. So go for it if your planning to buy a good brand wireless headphones. Battery backup are awesome it can withstand upto 10 to 12 hrs based on the your usage.
Title: Worthy headphones 🎧

Review: It's been 2 weeks I am using OnePlus bullet wireless Z & I must say I am very impressed with it.1. I love the bass quality of the earphone. I am using it with OnePlus 6T and I must say I can clearly feel the good bass. I can hear very minute sounds in the Youtube ads, which I never cared of.2. One other thing I liked is the seamless connectivity with my OnePlus 6T. You detach the magnets... It got connected within milliseconds. You attach it and it disconnects. The experience is very nice. This feature is very useful when you are in a call and wants your hands free.3. The design and overall look is good.4. Noise cancellation feature is working pretty good. I tested few phone calls while my TV was playing with moderate sound.
Title: Great overall sound experience & seemless connectivity

Review: Sound quality for audio and video files are very good. But these series of headphones are poor in call quality. Static disturbance and the other side cannot hear well. The internet has similar complaints but no FIX from the OnePlus team. DO NOT BUY IF U ARE LOOKING TO USE IT FOR CALLS. BUT if it's for audio and video usage, then perfect.
Title: NOT FOR CALLS BUT GOOD FOR MUSIC

Review: Product build quality and speaker quality is very good. I have been using this for almost 2 months. Battery back up is good.Only problem I'm facing is lack of Noise cancellation. In outdoor calling it's difficult to speak. I have to keep mic near to mouth so that I'm audible than people around me.Next problem is we can't switch off this device... For example if I keep this in my pocket (magnets attached) and if if magnet detached it will turn on and connect to phone... But anyway considering the fast connectivity .... This can be ignored.My suggestion is if there is any other with noise cancellation go for it....If no, This one (bass edition) is the best in 2K range.
Title: Best one

Review: This version of oneplus earphones also have the same limitation of not being able to connect to multiple Bluetooth devices.However unlike the last version, this version doesn't have a button or mechanism to switch between two device. Which makes it difficult to operate, if you plan on using this earphone for multiple devices.There is an obvious increase in the bass performance and audio quality, which is the only saving grace here.
Title: Unable to connect or switch between two devices

Review: I am writing this review after 3 months from the date of purchase. Sound quality was  very low from the very beginning itself and there  was noice  issues at both ends and not audible while making calls. It was kind of wrong purchase and I have contacted Amazon and OnePlus customer service and schedule a repair for the product, they have done the pick up and service very neatly and I got the product back after one week.But nothing has changed again went through the same customer service and  sent the product for second repair.(I have requested to refund instead of repairing the same,donno what will be the response.still waiting to get back the product)🤧
Title: Terrific experience and completely waste of money.

Review: I have been using this for 3 months and I should say that this is an amazing product. The battery backup and the sound quality is very good. Moreover that the call quality and microphone quality is also very good. It is having good bass. The build quality is very premium. The only con that I found on this product is that it is having significant latency while gaming, maybe a fraction of a second but still it is noticable. The low latency mode is only available when only paired with an Oneplus mobile phone. I would not recommend for gaming but if you are into music or your purpose is calling, then I'll say this is a best buy at this price. Really value for money.
Title: Superb battery backup and value for money

Review: You can blindly buy these wireless earphones, I have used the Oneplus wireless Bullets, which lasted like ever. This is half its price and the built and sound quality is better than the wireless bullets. Sound quality is amazing for the price tag. It is one of the wireless earphones which has faster Bluetooth connectivity. As it has magnetic heads with auto on/off feature, it's easy to connect to phone effortlessly. Bass is in the comfort level and pleasing.Conclusion OnePlus Wireless Z-Bass edition worth every penny.
Title: Best Bang for buck wireless earphones.

Review: It has an attractive design. The red chord not only makes it attractive but also helps locating it from the mess on working table or bed. It has long battery life. Since I use it sparingly it can last for 2 days. Voice Quality is good. However since it is not an over the ear headphone ambient noise is always present. Connectivity is good. However one has to join the magnets back to back and pull them apart everytime before establishing a new connection. It doesn't sit inside the ear canal nicely. Feels awkward but overall a good bluetooth headphone. It has a range of about 20 - 25 feet depending upon the presence of interfering signals. The price is definitely high. Should have been under 1,000/- Rs. Not money's worth.
Title: A fine cordless inside the ear Bluetooth headphone

Review: I want to know about the warranty!
Title: Warranty data

Review: So usually I don't write reviews but if something you use daily and if that gives you an issue you will be reminded to write this. In a nutshell that was the review of this earphone.It has a crackling sound while call which makes the experience worse.Many times, a call switch to media has an issue so you have to reconnect.Crackling sound happens during media also.Its price is so high but it doesn't fulfill the basic need.
Title: Worst Product, don't buy.

Review: ProsWell madeLooks goodDecent bass and clarity.ConsNo on off button, so each time the Magnets on earphones get stuck together it switches off and disconnects. Wonder which moron designed it like this. Call quality isn't great can't hear the caller loudly enough.Battery is average.ConclusionDon't buy thisLooks elsewhere
Title: No on off button is annoying

Review: The product is good for the priceInitial impressions:- built quality is awesome it's material is durable and flexible unlike other sturdy plastic earphones- Sound quality is decent nothing extraordinary not too horrible as well-Connectivity is just amazing it switches off when attached and immediately connects when detached from the magnetOverall a worthy buyThe only thing that pissed me off was the delivery I was delivered a package where it can clearly be made out that there was whole underneath where someone has taken out the earphones used it and then packed it back using tape I was just horrified seeing the package quality Amazon must take strict actions against such employees who misuse customer products
Title: A decent buy for the price

Review: Simply amazing. Charges pretty fast and it is enough for long usage and remains for days. It's designed so well that it is very comfortable to wear. The Neckband is very convenient as well. The magnet feature is amazing as well to save the battery when not in use and there is no need to switch on/off. The sound quality is pretty good as well. Very happy with the product.
Title: Brilliant

Review: Am some way not comfortable with single ear BT devices or ear pods for long calls even though I use then for short calls.  Wired hands free are good but pick up too much of ambient noise which is a pain for the other person.  Randomly picked this up but was surprised at the noise cancellation... Cuts out most of the regular noises like a bike passing by or a loud fan and the regular kitchen noises.  Pairs seemlessly with BT devices and love the way the call switches back to the original device when you keep both the ear pieces together (ends are magnetic).  For the price a definite buy.Cons: Doesn't have a mute/umute button and you need to be around the system/phone to do so.
Title: Best handsfree in <5k
