Review: I'm really disappointed by one plus because i was expecting a really great product. To be frank, the sound quality and other stuff are all decent, but the whole experience is ruined by crackling sounds which keeps coming again and again. I tried listening with different devices but they all seem to have it. Probably something wrong with the bluetooth of the earphones.
Title: Crackling Sounds with several devices I tried with.

Review: Pretty disappointed with the lack of featues. For example, no option for switching between devices which is a standard feature nowadays. Honestly, I bought this because it comes with extra ear tips which are not available in the market and I have lost the ones of my OnePlus Z and OnePlus Wireless 2. Both are much better.
Title: Bought this only for the three sets of ear tips in the box

Review: Sound Is crystal clear. The Bass is good. Don't know if it has preamp or not but, the loudest sound is very loud, which I feel is a good thing as you have a wide range of loudness. As expected from OnePlus, battery life is great. On one full charge, I can use it for a week (max 5 hrs per day). The quick charging actually works. These are light and comfortable. The controls are pretty simple and intuitive. Ear fitting is impressive, not too tight and not too loose.
Title: Great Sound, Comfort and Controls

Review: As mentioned by everyone, the best thing about this product is it's battery and charge time. It lasts more than a day on one charge, and I have it on almost all the time.However, in terms of audio, it's pretty underwhelming. To be honest, I am not that hard to please, I am not an audiophile. But even to me it felt poor, especially like me if you are someone who isn't in to bass heavy stuff and likes their headphones to be pretty balanced.I also would like to point out that I got these to use it for my work calls, and while the call quality is pretty good, I noticed that my wifi speed dropped and the call kept getting disconnected. I used a regular non-bluetooth headphone and didn't have this issue. So I still have to use my old headphone, which sucks. Overall, I give it 3 stars for its battery, connectivity, material and design. However, if you are an audiophile, and likes their headphones to capture all the nuances then stay clear of this one.
Title: My skype/teams calls keep disconnecting, the bluetooth is interfering with the wifi signal.

Review: Was a bit skeptical at first because I was apprehensive about the fact that a bluetooth earphone can outperform a standard over-the-ear headphone with significantly big speakers. Boy was I wrong.I've had this for a short while but it's been a delight. Pairing and connecting is like cutting through butter, especially if you use a OnePlus device. Even if you don't, doesn't make much of a difference.Sound quality is far better than I expected with a balanced sound system. It's not very bass-heavy that muffles all the other frequencies, but enough bass to feel that sweet beat you hear in EDM songs.Tl;dr, you won't feel like you're listening to music muffled by a pillow, that's characteristic of other bass-focused earphones out there.The price is justified. It's incredibly light weight and the ear buds are comfortable and don't fall off easily. Noise cancellation is impressive too.
Title: The budget listener's dream

Review: I was using Boat rockers before, then i switched to OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition,Everything was good with these earphones, even sound quality, bass, and long battery life,The only thing which keeps irritating me was switching from one device to another manually, which i did not use to because i was using Boat Rockets with dual paring feature, I just had to return OnePlus bullets because of this reason, as i usually connects with 2 devices while working, otherwise, these headphones are very good in this budget.
Title: Why there is no dual device paring?

Review: The design and build have departed from the original Wireless Z, now the tip of the band has all the volume and play/pause control buttons. Meanwhile they took a u-turn with the quick-switch button and removed it altogether. Oneplus claims quick-switch in their product description, but with a footnote saying you need to select the device from the paired devices list in each device for switching between them-- outright stupid I would say. In my experience it hasn't worked as mentioned even once.So those of you buying for the sole feature better stay away, their software solution is terrible and I don't see it improving.
Title: Not an exact iteration of Bullet Wireless Z

Review: Changing my review after a few days of usage.1. Don't buy if you are using any other device except OnePlus.2. Frequently disconnection Issue while calls3. Sometimes the call receiver complained of a robotic voice with lot of disturbance.I would not recommend buying this, trust me you cannot return the product also rather go for the realme budz wireless it's much better than this. I made a mistake buying this because I wanted to try it out.
Title: Please don't Buy 🙏 Worst Experience

Review: Sound quality is good but bass quality is not the best(adequate) would not recommend for truly  bass lovers.Cons: Quick switch feature is completely useless as it is only available for OnePlus phones, also the earphones does not have any physical button as a quick switch. Disappointed for this one.Build Quality is average.Pros: Bluetooth connectivity is very good. It connects instantly and has a good feature of auto turn on/off via magnets.Overall sound quality is good if the average bass is neglected.
Title: Good sound quality but the Quick-Switch feature is a useless.

Review: Pros:1. Great build quality. Lightweight, flexible yet quality build material.2. Easy and convenient to carry around3. Clear and high quality sound4. Great battery backup and easily last a day if fully charged.5. Easy connectivity. Works especially well with oneplus devices.Cons:1. Despite being called the bass edition, I found the bass to be of average quality. Its not bad but not great either.Conclusion:Value for money if you're looking for earphones around ₹2000. Go for it!
Title: Great sound and build quality, average bass.

Review: One of the best TWS earphones under 2000 rupees it gives environment noise cancellation and the bass it has is outstanding the mid,lows, uppers are so perfect and you can clearly difference between the instruments in the music.The battery life of this is around 16-17 hours in single charge and if you charge them for 10-12mins then it will give you 10 hrs of playback time that's amazing one and no other brand earphone give that.These are Compatibility with iOS and Android there is no specific issues which I found with them, but you have OnePlus device then they will give you little more features to enjoy.
Title: Sound experience is amazing

Review: These bluetooth earphones are simply amazing. The build quality is amazing. The sound is superb, just one issue when the sound is on maximum volume its a little too high and it hurts the ears.The magnet auto-connect and disconnect feature is amazing. The sound while talking on phone is also great. And the range of the Bluetooth is also amazing, almost 10-15 meters. And the wall penetration is also great.Wearing it for long time doesn't hurt the ears. Overall a perfect buy. Go for it.
Title: Paisa Vasool, Amazing Product!!

Review: These are a good set of earphones but they come in with a con that I’m totally not okay with.The overall sound stage is good but the crackling sound is REAL! Though the crackling sound is faint and feeble once you notice is it’s difficult to ignore. Creates a lot of problem while watching videos and on calls. I don’t see a fix for this and will have to live with it but it’s poor from OnePlus to not address this issue.PS: I’m using the set with my iPhone not sure if the crackling sound exists on Android devices. I will try to test the headphones with an android device and update my review.
Title: Good product but could be better!

Review: While buying a OnePlus bullets headset one expects it to have Aptx Codec for those Amazing HD sound with low latency but it supports universal SBC and AAC codecs.  Regardless of this Sound quality is nice with a nice tinch of bass wherever it's required.Volume levels are good, goes really loud without distortion so that's all the good parts of this Neckband.  OnePlus Magnetic disconnection works perfectly as expected.But the big holdup here is the quick switch feature.  When even models from 2019 with Bluetooth 4.0 were giving 2-way bluetooth connection (connected simultaneously with 2 devices for music and calls) this device doesn't support it (ONLY CONNECT TO 1 DEVICE) which is really a shame. Its like launching a new product and actually degrading it.in the previous wireless Z models there was a Quick Switch button which could help switching connection with multiple paired devices but in this model (Bass edition) that quick switch button is removed -_- and in their product description page it's written Quick Switch now works differently -  USE THE SMARTPHONE BLUETOOTH MENU AND SELECT ONEPLUS WIRELESS TO PERFORM IT.  This line is actually a scam  and coz everytime of We have to devices to Switch it's not Quick-Switch anymore  and MOREOVER  once this Neckband is connected to 1 device other paired devices can't connect to it even selecting it from the device.... I tested it so ot just can't connect to 2 devices which is really dissapointing.I'll still keep it as my secondary headsets but overall not satisfied
Title: No Quick Switch, No Aptx, Sound nice but overall expectations not met

Review: I have oneplus bullets z normal edition,But i order Bass edition for Best Bass Experience.1.But I am not satisfied with this product.2.Bass is not punche.3.And it's not feels like normal edition from box to neck band it's not feels good.4.just little bit bass not much expected.5.Also decrease Battery life.6.For Bass lovers it's not that product your looking for.
Title: Bass is edition that don't have that much Bass

Review: I had been using the One plus bullets from 1 month and I didn't face even a single issue with it... I bought it for my online classes and this reaches my expectations... I have other earphones and bluetooth headsets but They have more bass than treble... If u want earphones for ur meetings and for classes, just go for it... If u want good bass to listen songs then go for boat rockerzz ... It's very lite in weight, very comfortable and have more battery backup...On the whole just go for it guys.....
Title: You must go for it..!

Review: After a lots of research i finally decided to buy this product for because of the brand name Oneplus,  but i was totally disappointed when i realised even a roadside headset could have given me better battery backup. Initially i was happy about its sound and Mic quality.  But day by day the battery backup time started to reduce.  Not even a month of usage, now it takes more than 1.5hrs for full charge and Fully discharges with in 3hrs of usage. Pathetic product please dont buy it.  Such a worst experience with oneplus and will never buy any of its product. I have wasted my money.  Now looking forward for the warranty claim and iam not sure whether it will help me out or not.Editing after warranty claim..  I was happy they given immediate replacement..  But the surprise is even that one has the same above issue.  Omg!  Tis is unbelievable..  Seriously oneplus is even a brand???
Title: Replaced product from showroom is also defective..  😖😖😖

Review: The product was dead on arrival! It took me more than an hour to figure out that the battery wasn’t able to hold the charge in spite of connecting with 30 watts one plus charger. Never expected such a downgraded product from one plus company. Have ordered successfully for a replacement only because of Amazon’s promise n trustworthy customer service and have to see further how the product works. Will then review the product with additional details..
Title: Dead on Arrival/Defective Product

Review: Good Quality of neack band and ear buds.Gives a 2 days battery backup if only used for calling. On a continuous video streaming and Gaming gives, after full charged gives about 8.5 hrs of battery backup. Quick charging is a added advantage. Not much issue on running out of battery.🔋👍
Title: Value for Money.

Review: This is a great pair of earphones. I was using a TWS by an Indian Brand similar in price, but this is far better. The sound is loud and crisp, the bass feels great and the battery life is awesome. Neckbands are better as they are easy to use compared to TWS where there is a chance of losing them if you drop them accidentally. The battery backup is more than anyone would require and it charges really fast.Recommended to everyone for everyone.This is okay in terms of noise cancellation as it is passive cancellation and not an active one. (Active is when you can turn noise cancellation on and off. Passive means it is a tight fit that will block noise). When playing music there is hardly any noise passing through. Bought this product twice and the quality and packaging are as expected from OnePlus (really great!).
Title: One of the best for the price.

Review: OnePlus bullets wireless Z is an excellent bang for money product, sound and bass quality is impressive. The build quality of this is top notch comes with rubberized neckband and aluminium casing, the wires are textured, cool colour combination Red and Black. The bass on this one is excellent. Overall looks premium and sturdy. Battery Life is around 12-14hrs with continuous usage with intervals of 30min breaks. Full Charging take around 20-25min with my 65w flash charger.
Title: Excellent Quality Wireless Earphones

Review: I must say i am pretty much impressed with sound quality 👌 and battery backup is superb. Charging is fantastic with warp charge and bass is also good compared to bullets z old earphone.Cons : when we put back the earphones to magnet earphone disconnects and will be in standby and when u open it connects back which usually will not happen with other bluetooth earphones rest all is nice
Title: One of the best earphones

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 When i ordered this for the first time i received the damaged product but it was replaced by the spiritual harmony of the seller now i am using this product and this product is very good but  After some time, its magnets decrease and it takes time to connect and sometimes it gets disconnected even after connecting but even after all these shortcomings Its build quality Sound quality Best quality Noise cancellation is very good and it gives premium look Its battery is less appreciated than you praise
Title: Honest review

Review: Earphone stopped working in 4 months and service center denied to replace the earphones stating that it has been water damaged.But earphones never came in contact with water.We brought around 5 earphones too gatherAll stopped working within 3 -6 months.Service center denied to replace all of them.Don't buy any products from one plus
Title: Worst Product

Review: I have the previous model (OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z in-Ear), using it for almost 2 years. As er that experience I had decided to buy this one. But this one is very very poor compared to its previous model. Shame on oneplus.1. Low sound.2. Very bad noise cancellation especially on call.3. Too much bass makes the music experience uncomfortable.Seems oneplus knows well how to underperform and kill a good quality product model.
Title: poor performance even compared to its previous model

Review: This is widely discussed Issue with Oneplus Bullet Wireless Z bass edition.Just check them their community forums, people are complaining about strange noise while calling, even in VoIP calling options.Call drops and next person not hearing your voice is also common.Battery life is good, but it fails in basic functioning.Not recommend now.
Title: Buzzing noise audio calls

Review: I bought this for my aunty. Not for an extensive use. i think it’s more or less same to boat 255.Can’t expect to have noise cancellation provisions in this range. To me the build quality is pretty much okay and no complaints on the sound quality as it’s so mild and not tiring sound.I would call it’s a descent product.
Title: Descent product for basic purpose.

Review: I am using this since 6 + months, and problem happened after 3 months is usages. I visited one plus store and they did not helped really. I also saw 15-20 plus customer were there complaining about headphones. Those who are planing to buy it based on brand name please don't.I have used several one plus products and still using all of them were good, but not this headphones.Hope this review will help some buyer.
Title: Waste of money

Review: ● Pros...• Nothing to complain about sound quality .• Bass quality is very well balanced..not unnecessarily extra bass needs applauding👌• Noise cancellation is decent.• Comfortable to wear for hours...though you shouldn't use any earphone for more than 1 hour straight.• Connectivity is decent enough...gets connected very fast👌• Battery life is good. The marketing about...10 minutes charging, 10 hours of music...it's not a gimmick at all, works like a charm🔥• Build quality doesn't just look premium, very compact and simple yet classy at the same time 👀● Cons...• Only one negative point needs a mention... a physical on/off button. Relying only on magnetic on/off mechanism is kinda stupid. Sometime when I'm carrying it in bag...magnetic heads go detached to each other. A physical on/off button would've been a savour.Other than that the magnetic on/off works just fine.............................Bought it for 1999/- and I'm satisfied with the experience👌(Though I've seen it pricing 1799/- in very rare festive offer days)
Title: Satisfied and Enjoying...living the Experience 🔥

Review: Its a best available wireless earphones under 2000 Rs. But I still feel the older version was much betterI ordered this one without checking all the and was disappointed afterwards when found out that it is missing the OnePlus signature Quick Switch feature which was present in the older version (OnePlus bullets Wireless)Don't get me wrong as this one too is an amazing product and better in terms of sound quality and overall build.Sound Quality on this is more rich and you can hear beats clearer than last generation bullets.Bass is definitely better and you can enjoy high bass music on it.Noise cancellation is not present in it though they mention it. Active Noise Cancellation is what we say actual noise cancellation, don't purchase this one just after seeing noise cancellation.Battery life is same as before and not any change which is very goodIt charges full in 30-35 minsIt will show a 100% battery if you unplug in 10 mins but still you have to charge it for atleast 30 mins to retain the charge.Thank you
Title: Good one, but missing Quick Switch

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I bought it and used it first time after few minutes some cracky noise came from inside nd it continues further so i replaced it .the 2nd one which i recieved also had the same issue and its charger cable dosen't work for the 2nd one. Am so unhappy i loves to hear songs but the unwanted noice from it makes me disturbed🥺
Title: better to buy from somewhere else had a bad review in 2 times

Review: quick switch feature doesn't work at all;after I connect with laptop and play something sound starts coming after more than 4-7 seconds in different circumstances.using with phone, battery not at all 17 hrs for 100% but yes, for a fair amount of usage it will give approx. 8-10 hours of music listening and fast charging is the only thing which works in this ear set.FAKE PROMISES; FAKE INFORMATION BY ONEPLUS & THERE IS NO OPTION TO RETURN THEM; I would have gone for normal oneplus wireless z neckband because of that quickswitch convenience.Bass boost yes you feel, but that's not re-engineered but just basic tweaking which has distorted quality - 1000INR first copy of airpods sounds way better; sounds is so sharp it hurts your ears;Lows and highs not at all good; only the mid frequencies are average.To all future buyers, yes there isn't any option under 2000; but invest 1000 more and get a good one rather than wasting your money here; for calls I have no complains as mic is quite near to my mouth.
Title: Fake Promises; 500 bucks wired boat headset sounds better

Review: Its over all a nice product with really good Connection switching on and off when off to just plugging back to your ears. Good built quality and excellent battery life and charging speed.The bass dose not have the  punch for Bass-heads.( Including myself )But it's all about the mood and usage, I have the XM3s to just get lost into the songs which are really great with bass you can actually feel them rumble over your ears, the at times listing to the songs with IEMs is entirely diff. you can feel the song coming to life then there's these with good Sound and Portability the Convenience.
Title: Its all about the Need.

Review: While the discription says it has quick switch, it doesn't. it's not fair of OnePlus to cheat users like this , manual doesn't explain anything about quick switch , but sound quality is good , now as mic has been moved to neckband call quality is a bit down.
Title: IT HAS NO QUICK SWITCH OPTION IN BASS EDITION

Review: So I have been using this headphone for 11 months now. So within warranty my headphone one day out of the blue stopped turning on. So I went to customer center and they changed it. Now coming to my exchanged headphone. It had various problems 1. It was not getting fully charged within 10. 2. Sound quality was pathetic . Sound will break though it was not on full volume.So I went to customer care again . First they pinned it on me that the charger I am using was not good and just reset it and gave back. When the problem continued I went back again. This time they again replaced it ..but it has the same problem as the second one. And to that the customer care executive said it takes 15 minute to fully charge this though it is mentioned in the box 10 minute.I am pretty exhausted and will not be replacing it again as it is not going to resolve this issue. OnePlus has become really bad brand which doesn't perform quality check on it's product. Cause it cannot be a simple coincidence that I got the same issue second time. Will suggest go for boat or JBL. Cause belive me this brand is not worth it. They are just using cheap product parts and presenting it as a high end product. Maybe few years ago it was a good brand.but right now it's nothing of what it stands for. Will not be buying anything from this brand anymore for sure.
Title: Worst of worst

Review: Returned the received unit because of issue I will mention in the review ahead. Basic points for the earphones:Sound Quality : Sound quality of the earphones nis good, but not worthy of the price. There is mind blasting available, and I did love that, but that is not the only thing I would look for in a pair of earphones. Surely the USP of the earphones isn't the sound quality but still when my old Leaf Ear have better sound quality and soundstage when compared to this, it says a lot about the OnePlus Bullets Z.Battery life: Top notch. If this is a preference, then this is the absolute best I believe out there. Came fully charged out of the box, and I used it extensively for the next 4 days before being charged again.Call quality : The limited calls that I took with it, were fine, no complaints on the other side.Connectivity : The earphones used to get disconnected at random, and also the connection feature by simple joining and separating the earbuds was lackluster at best. This was the reason of returning the earphones as I didn't know if that was the issue with my unit or the earphones in general. itself
Title: Battery 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻 Bass 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻Sound

Review: The Bullets Wireless 2 featured two superb drivers that is useful for vocals and treble and a 10mm dynamic driver that took care of the bass. In sound audio quality, the Bullets Wireless Z has a warm, bass deep sound that’s suitable for pop, EDM, and rock music..But that tight thumping punch is missing...It's more a balanced type between mid & low.The call quality on the Bullets Wireless Z is ok only means it can served the purpose. But it offers a good passive noise isolation specially if you are watching a movie and it will effectively block the outside noise.OnePlus claims that a 10-minute charge is enough to give you 10 hours of music playback...Well it is a bit controversial but I would say still it manage to give satisfactory level which u will not regret.Overall it is a nice entry level bluetooth earphone which is reliable on decent sound quality with exceptional battery life helpful to use day to day usage.
Title: Nice Earphones with Exceptional Battery Life

Review: Probably the best neckband ever in the this price.After 10-12 hours daily usagefor almost 3 months  There are many pros and little cons as I'm about to mention now.Pros:- has really soft and nice silicon body with metal prices at both ends making it extremely comfy to wear.Has good connectivity speed (almost same as airpods) and with decent connectivity rangeThe magnet on and off clip on feature is fun and effective.Can easily pair with laptop,computer,phone ,tab, ipad, iphone, and any other devise too easily making it a great for day to day usageGreat battery life.NOW MOST IMPORTANTLY:-MUSIC QUALITY IS Almost excellent the bass is great but u can't expect much noise cancellation at this price point, duh.CONS:- overwhelming bass may sometime cover the other crest&though of music making other tones slightly less audible . The connections cable seems to much fragile. Although connectivity range is decent it can be improved. Battery life is not as good as promised and battery may deteroiate over time.Can be improved in water resistance...AT LAST AFTER MUCH RESEARCH I CONCLUDED THESE ARE THE BESTNECKBAND IN THERE RANGE
Title: Probably best neckband in this range of price

Review: I am using two mobile phones and I am unable to switch in between phones like the earlier versions.Actually I felt cheated as I never thought upgraded versions (as they defined) will drag technology backwards.Even Amazon did not allow me to return the product and the customer service told me that I can only replace it.Feeling disgusted more that I told I can exchange the product with the earleir version and that also they couldnot help me.
Title: Donot have switch to change inbetween mobile phones and thats odd

Review: I bought this for this brand. but unfortunately I got the problems regarding battery back up after the 10th day of purchase so unable to return through Amazon.so contacted one plus service centre..And after a long wait they take it for repairing but sorry to say they called me and said there is no problem in it and returned as it was.but now the same problem of automatic switch of after a long charging,magnetic connect and disconnect is functioning properly.many got a noise and even off it the noise not stopped until charge is fully drained...Tried a lot but due to covid all service centre is off.never expected such a defective and useless service from a valuable brand..
Title: Getting Defect after few days of purchase.

Review: I'm a huge fan of the One Plus Bullet Wireless 2. Bought this when the Bullet 2 got defective. When I tried the Wireless Z, I could hear some crackling once in a while. Ordered a replacement and heard the crackling noise in the replacement as well. I tried using it on my Huawei Honor 8X, Asus Tuf Laptop and Macbook Pro. It had the crackling noise in all three.
Title: Huge let down

Review: > Microphone quality is excellent to take calls.> Battery life is excellent and close to the claimed life.> Comfy to wear, as the band texture is soft & silky.> Bass is too punchy and thudding the skull ( varies from user to user).> Medium & large eartips are too big and not comfortable.>Quick switch button in the band is missing and hence needs to rely on the paired device for switching.> Volume changes through button creates a electrical graining noise when connected to laptops, but works fine with mobile phones.
Title: Too bassy but best for calls.

Review: Writing this review after a year of usage,Battery life excellentBass very satisfiedRange is good , can move freely away from laptop while Iam in Skype callsNoise cancellation good and suitable for wfh environmentBut when battery is bit low there is will frequent cuts in the streaming , that is understandable and can put for charge.Overall good buy , recommended
Title: Good quality product from MI

Review: The sound quality and battery backup is good. When u are in ugency, u can charge for 10min and can use for 2hr or more depending on ur usage. Would suggest to go for this product if anyone looking for the best product at affordable price range.
Title: Great product at affordable price!

Review: Calling with my bullets z bass edition connected via bluetooth cause a buzzing noise which can be heard by the other person. This goes away if I switch to phone or speaker mode so its obviously an earphone or bluetooth issue. Also I cannot hear the noise but the person on the other end of the call hears it. This dosen't happen while listening to music. Resetting the earphones sometimes works for sometime but then the issue occurs randomly again.
Title: Too much buzzing noise which can be heard by the other person.

Review: Bass is not as you expect instead at same price you can get tws from boult audio and they’ll give you more bass than these . Although in gaming it give low latency which helps but there is somelatency unlike skullcandy’s .. for the prices its not justified it should not cost more that 1400₹ but its just a brand tag to give it this price .
Title: Not a heavy bass version its just like normal earphone

Review: hey people who are looking to buy this.. i would highly recommend this to buy for music lovers and non music lovers' as well.the only complaint i have with earphones is that its too loud when played in full volume the person next to you need not to wear one or buy one to listen to music ") hahahahah....other than that noise cancellation could have been much better.bass is not that great but it is very good.balance is goodvoice calls are amazing, no complaints from the person talking on the other side because they cant make it that your on Bluetooth connectedOverall I would say its 4/5 so if your looking for paisa vasool deal ... just without any second thought you may go for it.Music lovers who like to be always on Bluetooth connected for long time its the item not to miss.
Title: Worth buying nice product

Review: Oneplus is known for its quality products. But this earphones is not upto their standard.First thing , the bass which they promise is not good at all. Sound quality is ok if you can compromise with bass quality.Second thing, whenever you are playing a game,their will be a sound break after every 10-20 seconds which looks like that connectivity is not so strong. I am using OnePlus 8 pro mobile and verified it with other wireless earphones and it works fine. The issue is with these earphones only.Sometimes even it will disconnect in between using any app especially while playing games.Third thing, their is no quickswitch provided in this bass edition earphones.When I bought it for the first time I faced all above mentioned issues, so I thought it's a defective piece and I have returned it.Even in replaced earphones also I faced same issue so I think its a problem with this item only. Not recommended.
Title: Too much overrated

Review: I absolutely love the earphones for its raw bass and sound quality....Sound profile is dynamic and also the highs mids and lows are clearBass = bombBut only 2 things that bummed me out to give only 4/5 is the battery life and noise cancelation.Battery with 100% volume used only for office meetings consumes around 75% of the charge within 9 and a half hours so approx I can guess a full 100% battery would last approx 13 to 14 hrs tops....Also the mic its good but not great, sometimes there are a bit disturbance (not much but a little) while speaking but that can be overlooked cuz it's not always.Also overall I would say its a great buy specially if you love bass
Title: A brief review - 4/5 pros and cons

Review: I listen to music but due to WFH nowadays, i specifically bought this for office calls, and i am so happy with it because its very reliable to use, the battery lasts so long i forget i even have to charge it, the mic is only one on the left side, and could've been slightly better but is still very good compared to other headphones at this range. does my work for calling even when driving on a bike. bass is thumpy enough, the rubber sticks to the ear properly. and snapping the  buds to each other saves the battery as well. go ahead with it,you wont regret at all
Title: very satisfied, can easily rely on this for calling

Review: If i could wrap the product review in 3 words then it would be "Does the job", if i had 2 words then it would be "Not impressive".Oneplus has built its brand on 'design' and 'value for money', however this product, as i see it , is an outlier.The first thing that oneplus prides itself in is a good design for the product, however this product is a plain built product nothing impressive about it, the sound is okayish and the bass is not that impressive considering that you are shelling out 2000 bucks for it. The most disappointing piece is the quick switch feature which is quite confidently marketed on oneplus website and amazon as present on this device but sadly is not, just a marketing gimmick, they tried to get away by saying "Quick Switch feature on Bass Edition behaves differently. Instead of a physical function button, users will be able to switch between 3 paired devices instantly by selecting Bass Edition among Bluetooth settings on said paired devices." but the fact of the matter is that 'a physical hardware button for switching between devices is the feature' and not going into a phone and clicking on connect, this is as weird as saying that if tomorrow oneplus removes their signature physical harware oneplus button (the one used to toggle between ring/vibrate/silent) from oneplus phones and says that the feature is there and the user put their phone is vibrate/silent/ring on the android/ios interface.Other than that the firmware design also takes a hit, sometime when you keep you earbuds magnetised to each other they dont shut down eating away your battery (another USP feature that oneplus messed up) and i'm not quite sure on the claim of 10min warp charge for 10hr backup.I would strongly say that oneplus wireless z bass edition is a downgrade from the non bass edition with the same cost to your pockets. Some of the other competitors are doing a much better job in delivering quality products at a lower pricepoint. To wrap up i'll say NOT IMPRESSED oneplus.
Title: Not Impressed

Review: So first let me clarify what I use it for so as to better make my point clear. I use it for literally everything except gaming starting from online classes through teams, meet & zoom all the way to watching ott stuff, youtube & listening to spotify podcasts & music. I have been a full on recommendor of the previous Oneplus bullets wireless z(normal ed) and been personally using them for a year almost at this point and frankly speaking for the price it's an absolute masterclass of a product. My only quirk would be that the sound quality is not the most impressive and this bass edition solves just that. Before this I had tried out the 7k worth of earphones in Sony's WF XB700s and they're great in literally every regards except for great features like in the oneplus which frankly speaking I could do away with and the lack of comfortability for my ears atleast which was so frustrating that I literally had to beg amazon technicians for a return which then got me to this and frankly speaking oneplus overdoes it with the bass edition for the price...now I'm not gonna be a full on fanboy and say that it sounds better than the Sony's cos it doesn't but what it does is deliver exactly what you would want from it for the price ie impeccable comfortability, great design, excellent features minus the quick pair button which sucks but I can do away with that and a bass that's a notch below the 7k Sony WF XB-700 with excellent mid & high tones, almost zero latency for videos no matter in what platform you're gonna be watching something on and a good enough battery life, good enough in that it's not as good as the previous bullets z(normal ed) which had excellent battery life so you know a 3hr drop from that should be good if not better than average at the price of just 2k. If my above mentioned usecases are exactly what you're gonna be using it for and the slight quirks don't bother ya, hands down go for it, you're not gonna be dissapointed :)
Title: Brilliance with minor quirks

Review: The product has excellent clarity and sound. But the left earphone stopped working within 4 months so i'm rating it 2 stars for the time being. Product is still under warranty, and if the replacement works well, I will update this rating and review. But in case the replacement has the same issues, will drop this rating to 1 star. Will wait and see.
Title: Great Sound & Quality. Product Life is Short

Review: If sound and bass is a preference this product is good, battery is decent enough.But the main drawback is the physical quality of this product this neckband earphone. The wires are such low quality that the maximum they can last is the product warranty period of 1 year. In less than six months the wire start to tear itself. It will not even withstand a slight finger nail scratch and will tear open the outer rubber of the wire.When the product is new, hardly anyone will realise it's defect and give a good rating. But after 4 to 6 months is when one will realise that it was no use paying so much for such a cheap quality.
Title: Sound and Bass Quality is Good, But product make quality is extremely bad for its price range

Review: Product bhut accha h chahe pese ke hisab se dekh lo ya sound k hisab se wire ki qvality v achhi h raf typ use m khrab ni hone vali .....but mere se sath ek problem aayi thi mene isko medium budsplug lga kr use kiya to kano se apne aap nikl jata h ...fir budsplug ko chenj krke choota vala lgaya to kano m rhne lag gya lekin  ...kano m thodi der bad v dard hone lag gya islie mujhe return krna. Pda
Title: Product is gud but not comfortable

Review: Straight to the point:-Pros:-1).Bass Quality is Overwhelmed and superior.2). Loud Enough for Indian audience.. It's also loud and it's loudness don't hurt you ears like RealMe Wireless buds.3). Connectivity Is top class, you wil not face any issue.4).Charging lasts for a long time even if you listen on hugh volume it gives decent battery backup.Cons:-1).Fittig is awesome for me but may not be for others as everyone has a different ear shape but I think it'll fit easily.2). No other point for it.. It's just awesome in every way.Conclusion:-You can go for it blindly, just trust on me.I've searched and tried all of the brands in this price range like SONY, BOAT, REALME,NOISE,MIVI but found this one best.
Title: Best Under 2000

Review: I am writing this review after using this product for 2 months. Just 1 word- “BEST”That’s what it is.If anyone asks me about this product then i will say that just try this on. Let the bass and sound quality do the talking.1) Sound quality• Awesome2) Clarity• Awesome3) Battery backup• 10 hours from just 10 mins of charging with C-Type charging.4) Noise cancellation• Best in segment5) Calls• Good quality audio as wellI have used Apple AirPods as well but after that this product is just revolutionary. The best till date and the best will be.There is no point to complaint.If anyone opting to go for this product then go for it with eyes closed. After hearing my headphones, my friends also purchased 3 same headphones.If still not believing, just try it once.That’s all.😊❤️
Title: The Best Product to use in Bluetooth headphones

Review: Works like a charm, sound quality not to shaby, battery life is just perfect, no connectivity issues. One time i forgot to take it off while washing my face so water got stuck in one of the earplugs, it stopped working but after i cleaned the water inside, it's started working like a charm again. Not a single issue before and after that. Good job OnePlus.
Title: Have been using it for almost a year.

Review: This is the classic example how to screw up a perfectly working design.First of all, I bought this product because I was using the old bullet wireless earphones and in that model everything was so balanced. The sound output was really smooth and it was an overall awesome product be it for office, casual listening et. One more really good option was the one button toggle option between 2 paired devices.Bought the Bass edition and regretted it from the first listen itself. I am only listing the cons because this one has no pros.- The bass is really sucks. Its tweaked and its ugly to the ears. Still I continued using it thinking my ears will get used to it - IT DIDN'T.- Calls suck too. There is a crackling noise every time you attend a call and its not just on the recipients end its on the callers end too. Haven't been able to attend one office call properly.- Badly miss the toggle switch between devices button. Why would anyone remove such a wonderful feature is beyond me.So there you have it, do not I repeat DO NOT buy this product.
Title: Worst product from a company like One Plus( I hope they see this)

Review: I am purchasing this as gift for 3rd time. This is the best earphones in all categories of sound equipments avaible in market right now.Built quality is good. Plastic and abs body. Earbuds are made up of plastic. But you can sleep on with the same. Sound is clear and punchy. Battery performance is just out of the box for any other earphones in this range. Feels great in ear and wearing in neck. Looks cool. Highly recommended for music lovers.
Title: Value more than money

Review: I've been using this product for about 2 weeks now. The sound quality is AWSOME. I was using boat and Sony headphones previously.The sound quality is better than both (although the cost was almost 2wice for the boat and sone ones)Loving it for now. Not very sure about its durability though. Though quality is good it seems to be a little on the frilly side.
Title: Awesome producy

Review: It's really a good product. I used the Samsung Level U before this but I feel the sound quality and noise cancellation is a bit low in the Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition. The bass is better than the Level U though. Battery life is also good too.For those who is confused to buy between the Level U and the Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition here's the thing.- If you want better sound quality and noise cancellation - Level U- If you want better battery life - OnePlus Bullets (Charging is fast too)- If you want better portability and comfort - OnePlus Bullets (Since you'll feel discomfort in the neck while lying down using the Level U and might break it when placed a bag or luggage)- If you want vibrating notifications for calls, etc. - Level U (OnePlus Bullets doesn't have a vibration motor in it)- If you want strong bass - OnePlus Bullets (This is a personal preference tho')Product delivered a day before estimate and received without any defect/damages
Title: Good headphones for its price

Review: I have used sony, JBL, synheiser earphones before this one. No one yet completed with synheisers sound quality and battery life. I was hesitant in purchasing one plus earphones as it was not a known brand in audio. But based on the reviews and internet research, convinced me that this earphone is good. Hence purchased it.1. Excellent sound quality.2. Excellent bass.3. Great battery life. 2 days usage on single charge.4. Good Bluetooth connectivity. Remain connected if you are in some room which is far away from you device.5. Best earphones in this price range
Title: Best sound quality earphones

Review: Product is totally not worth 1999Rs. In name of Bass the sound is boosted, and you do not hear any bass.Sound quality is not at all comfortable at high levels, Frequently Bluetooth connection goes off and need to re-pair or turn on/off the device.Better go for Realme buds wireless in same price range infact less than oneplus
Title: Better go for another product

Review: The mic stopped working just after a month of purchase. They said it has a one year warranty and so I searched on the site. Apparently, only mobiles and television are recognized as devices on their website. After a failed attempt to register the bwz and claim warranty, I sent them a mail stating my concern. It says they'll reply to you within 48 hours but its been 3 days and there is no reply (also sent them a follow up mail after that, which was again of no use). I have been a one plus user for the past 5 years and never expected such low quality product from them. I am even changing my mobile from one plus due to this decline in their quality
Title: Did not expect such a bad product and customer servicefrom one plus!

Review: The buds do deliver on the promise of more bass than the normal Bullets Z. It sounds better overall, delivering the missing oomph. Bass isn't overpowering and the sound is somewhat balanced.However, what I absolutely do not understand is why 1+ have removed the mic AND the quick toggle button WHILE keeping the price same. These two are, imo, very important features that are missing for absolutely no reason.Go with the original and if bass is all you want, look elsewhere.
Title: Inexplicably Compromised

Review: This one plus headfones are the worst headfones.... Even a 500 rs wireless headfone will work better..Within 6 months only 1 side of headfone is not working..Not just this I have purchased 2 wireless  headfone of one plus... One stopped completely working after 8 months..Waste of money.....
Title: Worst headfone

Review: I own almost most of the bluetooth headphones to earbuds. This is by far the most convenient to use and best sound quality. The best part is its battery and charging speed with the type c charging. Best bass with great sound quality that you can get. This earphone is easily a 5000 rs plus quality at this price. Just go for it. But get the bass version.
Title: Blindly go for this. Don't buy true wireless ones. This is great

Review: I brought this product in November 2020. Just after 4 months it’s mic stop working. On contacting service centre they only bios me instead of solving the issue. I brought this product for my online client meeting which get hampered since then. Still I didn’t get any possible solution. I believed Oneplus as a fabulous company but experiencing the service issues neither I purchase nor I recommend Oneplus products to anyone else.
Title: Really disappointed Oneplus.

Review: so i have been using this earphones for quite a while and here are my thoughts:Build and looks: unboxing experience was awsome and the build is pretty good, the right module is a bit heavier compared to the left due to the battery heft so it tends to shift towards right while on your neck, someone who has OCD like me might find it annyoing. Wires are of good thickness and everything else is fine.Features: The product description page says u get a quick switch feature which is not correct, u have to switch to another device just like any other bt headphones. rest all features are as advertised. Also i want to mention that while u attach the magnets the sound pauses but dosent play back while u open it, u have to press the middle button, which many youtubers have mentioned wrong in their reviwes. An intresting thing that i found was that while my phone was locked i could acess the google assistant from my bullets and play my playlist from spotify which works like a charm!Sound quality: This is what is the most important part, these bass edition have incredible bass, sometimes more than what should be in the song, which can muffle other frequencies, the treble is flat and high pitches fall on their faces... thing to note is i compared the sound with OneOdio dj pro over the ear headphones which has similar price tag, but trust me the sound u get on those is just out of the world. i have been so spoiled from those sound that this bullets feel like a cheap chandni speaker with boosted bass! if u ever enjoyed a premium sound signature u just cant enjoy the sound of oneplus bullets bass ed! If u want the best sounding device just grab the oneodio dj pro, period! But still this is the best bt earohones in 2k inr, next reason is why..Battery and call quality: I got mixed reviews about its battery life but omg, its insane, long battery life is a must for bt earphones and this delivers. I got 2 days of continious usage and charged it at 20 percent with an average of 15hrs of play time connected with multiple devices. It does provide 10 hrs of playtime with 10 mins charge which is just insane. But it has one issue though; the led light should get white while fully charged (45mins appx) but it doesnt , u have to open the charger and reconect to see the white indicator.Bluetooth range and calls: The range is more than sufficient no crackles or conncetion drops , if u have any those issues then replace it, the call quality was decent, env noise cancellation isnt that good tho.Also sound leaking isnt an issue as i saw someone mentioning it.Conclusion: If u just need a bluetooth earphone , going wireless is your first priority only then oneplus bullets z bass edition is a must buy , i feel the oppo enco m31 dosent fit the first choice because it has poor battery life which is a must because ur battery would degrade over time, getting the oppo dosent make sense just for better audio coz if audio is your priority just go all in and buy the OneOdio dj pro which is the same price and provides a sound signature of senheisers and akgs which are much much more expensive headphones!
Title: keep your expectations in check!

Review: I have a oneplus6t.It's a review after 2 months of use.Build quality is nice and flexible. Design is as per your ear fits perfectly, but falls off in exercise.10-12 hrs of battery life on full charge. Good sound quality.Best thing is magnetic on and off, Which gives you more hrs of battery. Once we disconnect magnets it connects to device within 1 sec.Easy switch from one device to another, but no automatic shift between devices.Can't connect to 2 devices at once.Noise cancellation is not upto the mark for oneplus brand, hope it gets better. All the surrounding noises can be heard by the caller.No issues with the device, till now10 min charge gives upto 50% charge, which is best.Value for money, no regrets.
Title: After 2 months use genuine review...

Review: After watching many reviews in youtube I buy this product,alternative Boat rockers 385v2Amazon poor package, 2days delivery good,Pros..1) Magnetic control2) fast connect3)sweat resistanceCons..1) Sound quality not bad, but not super 3.8/51) Bass edition but average Bass 3.5/52) battery life 10-12hours at 100% volume 3.5/53) sound loudness average 3.5/54) China made 1/5
Title: Not worth, Just ok.. but recommend

Review: It's the best I have ever used. The sound is amazing...and so powerful. The battery life is also good. I just have to charge it for like 10 mins and that's it. Once charged....it goes on for like two days or even three... I love this earphone...and obviously it's OnePlus... guaranteed best quality. I highly highly recommend it to everyone! ❤️
Title: Best wireless earphones!

Review: Sound Quality : 4.5Bass Quality : 4.5Battery : 8/5 (Too Good)Call Quality (while Driving): over the speed of 50Kmph Forget about it, you can't talk while driving , the receiver will only hear the sound of air. The only con with this device is this that you can't talk while driving fast.Call Quality (While Stable) : Great, No issues in this segment.My Verdict : nobody can best the sound and bass Quality in this price range but if you use it heavily for calling while driving, then It's not for you.Otherwise, there is no reason at all to ditch this premium device at 1899/-
Title: For Music say a Huge yes, For calling It's Complicated

Review: Bought it in January 2021 recieved on 15/01/2021. Sound quality was good at the starting. Bass effect went off after 3 months. After 4/5 months volume decreased gradually. Today the right earphone stopped working. I called customer care as the warranty period is for 1 year. They said for claiming warranty I need to have undamaged earphones, the invoice and the earphones packaging box. If have all these, you can make claim at OnePlus store. I have earphones and invoice but who keeps packaging box after 6/7 months? So they said I have to book repair through OnePlus Care app which is showing "To safeguard against Covid-19, as per guidelines of authorities, this service mode is unavailable until further notice." But my surprise, they are delivering new orders on the same address. So I'm stuck with these 1999/- earphones like those cheap ones which stop working at one side after some period. Never expected such product quality and after service from this famous Brand "OnePlus"Now don't think it's worth the price.I bought Creative Sound blaster Jam in April 2019 but it's working perfectly fine till date! Though the sponge cushion has come out but sound quality hasn't been changed yet!!
Title: The right earphone stopped working after 7 months

Review: Those who are saying excellent bass, might be they problem with their ear. Bass quality is avarage. Battery life is little bit good not 20hrs as committed. Not easy switching between two device. Length must need to be larger by 1". Operating switches are on left side when 90% people's are using cell phone in their left hand the placement of switches are wrong it should be on right side.
Title: Chinese means Chinese only

Review: Bass is OkOk, the sound is just like any other Boat, Noise, Realme Bluetooth headphones which come at much cheaper price than this. These Oneplus people are just looting money using the brand, and TRUST ME THIS PRODUCT IS NOT WORTH Rs. 1999/-1. Dual Pairing is not supported, we need to manually switch between phone and laptop (if you are willing to buy this earphone for work-related)2. MAIN FEATURE – CALL BACK OR REDIAL feature is not available in this. THIS IS REALLY BAD. Every other Bluetooth earphones have a callback or redial option when you click on the middle button, the last dialed call will be placed, but this is just worthless as this feature is not there3. ONLY REPLACEMENT OPTION AND THERE IS NOT RETURN Option!!!!!!!!!I just wasted 1999 on this worthless product, wondering how do we have a 4 rating for this.
Title: WROST PRODUCT, PLEASE DON’T BUY.

Review: Purchase for daily use , build quality and sound quality is pretty good bass is also Good but not as much as in boat 255 , used in public places and noice cancellation worked well.Previously purchased boat 255 pro but there was a buzz sound coming out of it during low volume so returned it and then purchased OPZBE for 2k and they really work well so according to me you can purchase them for 2k or if u dont want to spend 2k then u should go for 255 pro only.Its been 6 7 months since i bought this product and now its mic isnt working at all and also i am not able to return the product for repair to the Amazon.
Title: Good one in this price segment

Review: Used it for the first time and was disappointed1) It has similar Sound Quality to my 599rs realme headphones2) It's a Bass Headphone but bass quality similar to or probably worse than a 500rs headphones. I have used Boat ( Wireless & Wired over the ear + in ear ) choose anything between 500-1500 & they definitely have better bass at lesser price tag.3) Loved its design and build quality pretty clean and attractive4) Its not isolating when the music is not playing I can hear the surronding or fan sound clearly or people talking which was biggest the disappointment for me. Some 500 rs headphones isolate the sound 10x better than this you can hardly hear anything with them more like a cheap ANC headphone.5) When you remove the headphones and stick their magnets to each other Music is paused  its disconnected from phone also when you put them in ears again it gets reconnect automatically which I think is very usefull feature.6) Battery life is definitely a lot better than similar headphones like boat and real me which requires charge after every 4-5 hours but this work for days without having to charge it
Title: Read and decide if its worth it

Review: I am impressed with the sound quality as this is impossible to get anything that close with this price।. I have seen people, complaint about sometime noise, bass and other factors. But my opinion is totally based upon my usage for two weeks, and believe it or not this phones are the best for this money. YOU CANT GET ANYTHING BETTER THAN THIS
Title: Best in earphones for this price।

Review: I had used OnePlus Bullet normal edition and compare with this one is different. It's don't have adjustable mic, Dual connectivity (switch device function) but this one have it's own plus point. It's have powerful but not heavy for ears bass output, noice cancellation and good mic. Consider bass edition only if you are going to use only on 1 device at time and don't have more than moderate calling usage.
Title: Review after using for a month continuously

Review: Ignoring all the negative comments I bought these earphones, but God they are pain in the ass.First it's music itches in the ear. It's too harshSecondly it's mic, wtf within a month my mic just don't work, it's has disturbing sound from both ends.I have to go to OnePlus service centre for this now.Seriously wtfPlease guy do consider negative feedbacks
Title: No no

Review: I expected this to be average and bought it as a temporary measure until the One Plus Buds Z are available. That aside I'm genuinely surprised by the sound quality right out of the box. The volume levels are also pretty high with no distortion and a few equaliser tweaks give it a very balanced sound.
Title: Quite Surprised

Review: These one plus wireless earphones stopped working after 15 days. It is not getting switched on. Service center engineer can not rectify the issue.They submitted it and told to contact or check after 10 days for replacement headsets as they do not have it now.What kind of service is this? This is the era of online gate service........ But I hope I will get the replacement soon. Submitted to Bareilly one plus service center.
Title: Worst experience

Review: It was supposed to be the best in the price,but unfortunately it doesn't make the cut.First thing first if you are looking for a entry to mid level Bluetooth headphones then these are still the best "option",though it isn't even comparable to the wired headphones that come at this price.The claimed battery backup is about 17 hours that too if you listen at low to mid level volume, although you are at a public place you will eventually end up listening to max volume because it becomes inaudible.Not enough Bass.Range is upto 10 to 12 ft max after gitters and stutters kicks in and eventually cuts out completely.It is definitely costly for what it's worth.
Title: Underwhelming: Performance not upto Promise

Review: Pro's1) awesome bluetooth connectivity2) great battery with little charging time3) Sound quality was good for this budget,(Don't compare with SONY, BOSE, jaybird) for this budget the sound quality is goodCons-1) The treble and bass quality can be better2) It would be so great if the ear bud Design like Bose. Since it is a traditional model ear bud. Creates pain some time
Title: A Best quality wireless headset for this budget

Review: I have an One+ 8 pro, I ordered this as I'm bound to lose the TWS which is in trend these days. Well I've got to keep moving from one place to another. Juggling work, gym and other activities. In between that don't have the time to open the case for TWS and place it back in!I think this works the best for me. Its been 2 weeks I guess, Have charged it only 3 times since. And it does give a good enough battery life even if charged for 10 minutes. I don't know if it lasts for 10 hours but this one is amazing. Would definitely recommend this to everybody who think TWS is not for them. 2000 bucks for this is good, and I believe when brands like boat can last for over 2 years at half of this price why this one wouldn't?And lastly when ordering from Amazon, if something goes wrong they've really honestly got your back. I did tried it when things went wrong and Amazon stood by its word! Hail Amazon, LOL! Get the best from the best!
Title: Works best with the brand product

Review: There is alot of crackling involved while listening to any kind of music....if u r buying this product for music purpose...please don't buy it...u will regret it later.....just got my new earphones today....my expectations are very high seeing the package but after listening to any kind of music or normal videos in highest quality available the crackling comes randomly somewhere (not just a single time it may come so many times)which makes me frustrated so much.....I instantly opened amazon,went to my orders and replacing it now...waste of time and money...
Title: Beware music lovers....waste of money.....

Review: Please don't order any electronic item or may be other products,  from online platform. They will not exchange if u got any damage or wrong product. I bought a ear phone worth of 2k. But delivered wrong and damage product. No one has replaced the product
Title: Don't buy Election item or may other products.

Review: Recieved today. Reviewing as a music and content lover. THIS REVIEW DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY CALL QUALITY REVIEW.This product is for people who don't want tons of features such as realme wireless neo and other neckbands in this price range offer.1) Sound Quality --> Crystal clear 10/102) Base Quality --> I haven't used the normal edition one. But the bass on this one is very good. Not too much bass that you'll have a headache or something. 8/103) Built Quality --> Built is amazing and doesn't feel cheap 10/104) Comfort --> You will forget that you have something on your neck. The earbuds fit well and are comfortable and doesn't give any ear pain. There are extra eartips given in the box but the eartips that were given with the neckband were fine for me so i didn't change them. 10/10Just go for them. You won't be disappointed. Will edit the review if some problem arises.
Title: Simply Amazing

Review: Best design. Highly durable... Can consider for long time usage.. It charges so quickly and it last more than a day. There is no worries about the battery backup...But it has a issue with sound quality. Normaly it sounds best.. But sometimes it produces a noise in the background which was so iritating. I cant fiqure out how its happening. Its like the sound if the audios cables are only half plugged on old systems. Now im using for more than 2 months and i dont get that how it noise is generated... The thing is that it does not produce these noise frequently and if not, it sounds best..if you are an extremely cautious on the minute bit of sound quality  it may disappoint you.. I normaly use to watch youtube videos all about my studies, i dont care about the studio perfect sound qualities.for movies also without that noise its excellent..If anyone know whats the issue with the noise please help.
Title: Best charging and backup

Review: Good battery life, 15-20 hour range as the description suggests.With a oneplus charger 10 mins gives close to 50% charge, but the remaining 50% takes longer. 0-100 would need 30 mins if not more. Sound quality is good, for wireless earphones. Bass is strong. If you know to work with an equalizer, then its easy to control and get good outputBut, I ordered 2 pieces and both had a common problem. Crackling sound when playing music or on call. Common issue on oneplus forums. Returned it because its a big issue considering these are earphones.
Title: If only the crackling sound wouldnt have been there :(

Review: Being a Musician myself I am very finicky about the sound qaulity... but this OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass edition provides a good sound for experiencing good music... with proper differentiation between the highs, mids and lows... Not like many others like booming Bass without other frequencies or tinkling sharpness without any mids or bass .. this one is quite close to almost perfect. Not any dislike I could find... but obviously not as good as the Apple pods... but a good pair of headphones to buy... U wont regret
Title: A good choice

Review: I want to share an experice with you guys which will help you identify the product and it's quality.I gifted my wife Infinity glide by JBL and it was the worst product in bluetooth headset category. Bad sound, cheap build and earplugs that always falls off.Then I bought this product. In one word...it's an AMAZING product. I personally use Bose True Sports worth 19K and belive me, this product can easily compete with it. Fantastic sound quality and fabulous build quality.Just go for this one.....it's truly worth it.Also amazing delivery by Amazon.....got itnin less than 22 hours.
Title: Amazing Product.....just go for it!!!!

Review: This review is based on my usage:Pros:1) Great sound quality (including awesome bass)2) Decent microphone quality3) Good bluetooth coverage4) The battery life is also great (Oneplus claims over 17-20 hours of usage on a full charge)Cons:1) There is a significant audio latency if you're not having a oneplus mobile (I have noticed delay while in video calls and gaming, won't matter a lot for songs and videos)To summarize it, if you're only looking to listen to music and videos, go for this blindly. You won't regret itBut if you also occasionally play games and want to use this for video calls and if you DON'T have a Oneplus mobile, you might wanna skip this.Hope this helps!
Title: Great for audio but latency isssue is present for non-Oneplus mobiles

Review: First I would like to inform you that this is my first review I do lots of shopping online but I'm writing this review for first time because of only one reason I'm stunned with this I mean which price it comes is really a mind blowing earphones if you are moderate bass lover then bro you can go for it without worry but if you are one of the peoples who like the heaviest bass not matter what the quality is contained. Unfortunately this is not for you although I'm heavy bass lover I'm very satisfied with this quality of bass which this earphone has.noise cancellation is great you will not get any chance to complaint.and especially if you are planning to use this with OnePlus device then this will be make a perfect choice of yours.Purchase it if you like OnePlus and you are not very heavy bass lover. This will provide you more than heavy bass but not heaviest and vocal,treble are very good as well.
Title: Simply value for money in this price range.

Review: Sound quality is decent for the given price range.The problems are1. There is no separate option to switch off, one  has to do it by joining earbuds and it is very irritating as keep on separating.2. Amazon says there is quick switch button is provided, but its not available for bass edition3. if you are connecting multiple devices you have to suffer as there is no easy connection
Title: One plus lost its credibility

Review: I purchased it with believe of this brand name. One month it worked like wow but all of sudden one morning it started showing cracking sounds while calling, approached support through chat which gives you any random number as waiting number and I got my turn after good 12hrs and they asked to reset and try again. Magically it fixed for 2-3 calls and then again started same issue. Don't waste you money on this device.
Title: Worst product in this price when you have better options in half rate (i.e. 999)

Review: Both the Sound & Bass and The Build quality was beyond my expectations for any earphones fallimg within the price range of 2000 INR.First of all the Build quality is top notch which was again beyond my expectations from the Brand One Plus as I've been using their device too which is very promising for the price range for any android smartphone available in the Indian Market.Secondly, the bass quality is decent.Third and the most important feature is its battery life. I can only imagine one word "Wonderful".The only thing the brand should work on is its below good sound quality as in thus price range and point a slight improvement will be an excellent upgrade.
Title: Pretty Decent

Review: Product Quality is great, sound quality is great...The only one issue i found with these neckband is, if you are listening to music or watching a video, and stop the music/video for few minutes, and then play the music/video (after like 5-10 min) the neckband stops working, until  I press any of its buttons.. i think its some kinda power saving feature.
Title: Only one issue, overall good product

Review: Oneplus bullets Bass edition is best neckband for those who is love to listen music and it has best experience in 3D surround sound, acoustic music and soft rock music..Pros:1. Warp charging technology is truly works 10 min charge give you 11 to 12 hours of music if sound is low.2. Natural and excellent Bass.3. Low latency mode with quick pairing.4. Magnetic controls is an excellent feature.Cons:1. The one features I don't like is pair button, as Oneplus bullets wireless z have pair button for pairing another device. However bass edition don't have this feature as it will helpful for 2 mobile user at a time for effortless use.
Title: Genuine neckband for music lovers

Review: Earphone gets disconnected automatically while using, either watching videos or taking calls. Volume increases and decreases itself. It creates very buzzy or hissy sound on call on both ends. Very noise, irritating and unbearable sound comes on both ends while taking calls. Have asked other users about this and they also have similar experience with this earphone.OnePlus really need to look into this. Expecting them to remove such issues as I have been using their accessories for a long time and this is the only unpleasant experience.
Title: Not recommendable

Review: I love it and gave 5 stars. Although it works totally fine just 20 minutes of charge gives u 90% of charging and that 90% charging will last for approximately 9-10 hours(if continuous use). But if i wanted to make it 100% charge it is written in booklet that light turns something different colour i don't remember but when i keep it for charging it doesn't give any indication if it is fully charged. There's no light indicator change. U yourself have to check timing of for how much time u r charging it. Like i only charge it for like 20 minutes and took it off. Then connects to the mobile it shows 90% charging. I don't know if only I facing this problem but its fine for me it is not giving me any headache, besides this I'm facing no problem.
Title: Excellent product!

Review: There is a crackling sound while watching video and is irritating as hell if u can't even listen for one minute straight whts good about them I thought this problem will go away after connecting to other device but nah it was still there after factory setting reset Bluetooth reset headphone reset it was still there  I was so hyped about them after watching reviews by youtubers I thought these are the best wireless earphone I can get after finding the truth I searched it and there was lots of lots of complaint about the same issue and one plus has never solved this in 2 year of making wireless earphones they don't care about customer review they just sold it by building the hype and removing the bad reviews from Amazon looks like i am "settled" with this brand . Hopefully they don't remove this so that everyone can notice the problem before buying it
Title: Irritating crackling sound

Review: Nice product.  But one peculiar problem is been faced when there is voice call the sound goes up and down . Not sure whether it's a mobile network issue or headphone issue.When it is removed from headphone sometimes the sound is good and sometime it is same.Rest all connection , sound quality, bass all excellent
Title: Nice product

Review: I have seen with a friend having it found good, i have ordered on the spot via amazon. I have received this device after 3 days and opened and started but it did not started. I have charged it via shared USB wire and it charged in around 1 hour white light started blinking.I have used it only 1 hour and it auto disconnected I have read the manual and according to that 1 hour charging will sufficient for 10 hour backup it seems it is not happen accordingly.Now I have to charge it again and again seems One plus seller has done cheating with me and have sent defective peace to me.But unfortunately 7 days have spent by me to know that this piece is defective.I would request amazon and its seller to change me the One plus bullet earphone I have ordered because this is defective piece.
Title: from the day I have received this device it worked only 1 hours.

Review: if you are looking for best wireless earphones @2K, just go for it.(OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition (Reverb Red)) 👍Even though it is a Bass Edition, Bass is not too high but pretty much enough. 👍Sound quality & volume is impressive. 👍Didn't found much "Noise cancellation", still not bad.(If your mobile bluetooth version is 4, then you might get voice disturbance & voice break since this device is having bluetooth version 5)✌Fast Connectivity.👍No Quick switch in this version(Bass Edition) 👎Comfortable 👍Battery 💪 As they mentioned, we can charge for 10 mins & can be used for 10hrs. If you charge for 1hr, you can use upto 17hrs. 💪👍much recommended product @2K 😍
Title: Best Wireless Neckband Earphones from OnePlus Brand 🔥🔥

Review: Guys if you want the best earpiece just go for this one. Try to shed some extra bucks if you want to buy some other model between 1200-1500. Because i did the same bought jbl and then Philips but none is as satisfactory as ONEPLUS. buy and you will say someone had given a right review.
Title: Superb quality and frequency

Review: These are the best earphones under 2000 segmentPros:  1) awesome sound quality2) above average build quality3) 12hrs battery backup (full charge in 50min)4) decent bt range no connectivity issuesCons:1) bass is not up to the mark (bassheads stay away)2) treble is too sharp it will cause pain in ears (only in music)3) comfort is worst after 30min of use ur ears feel the pain (the reason I returned)4) in reality battery backup is like 12hrs and for full charge it will take 50minConclusion: if u want comfort go with oppo enco m31 or if u ok with this cons go for bullets z bass edition any time
Title: These are the best earphones under 2000 segment

Review: NOTE - The only problem with this earphone is that it should have contain ear wings which would have helped these earphones to get a firm hold in the ears. But its okay they aren't that loose.Review : The earphones are great with great bass and clear voice quality and the microphone also gives great sound output during phone calls... overall an excellent product for the price..go for it without a doubt...its worth every penny.Update - I returned these earphones just because i was getting these in Bold Black color on the official OnePlus site for Rs 1899.Really happy with the product.
Title: Must Read This Before Buying.

Review: As promised by one plus brand, the sound quality and bass are really good in this product, I bought this product on January month, after 7 months of usage suddenly this headphone not switched on. Bluetooth also not connected with any mobiles. when I tried to charge, it shows battery full indication. Also I tried to reset the headphone as per the given steps in user manual. No use. If you expect the life of this headphone more than a year, than it is not suggestible. for 2000 rupees it worked only 7 months. Also In my case wires joined to the ear buds will started to be damaged after 5 months of usage (due to low quality connection in the joints). Other than this issue it is a good product.My suggestion is try any other brand products. One plus headphone products are not that much good  now a days.
Title: Life will be less than a year - not a quality product

Review: The sound quality is just sooo good! I coupled it with my Nord and BOOM!Bass is super punchy. (On the bass edition)Call quality is good if not great.Charging is super fast. (Supports Warp Charging!) Charging cable is provided in the box.Battery backup is amazing. I have been using it for 4 days straight without changing it. Moreover, charging for 1 minute fills the battery upto 10%!!Build is really good.I highly recommend this product to everyone.
Title: A perfect product for bass lovers!

Review: I replaced this product once and even then I got earphones without stereo.. it seems they forgot to put but having stereo is fun.But you are not into stereo and overall I will say its great in this price range... You can chill while listening to your favourite songs and you won't realise what's happening in the world till Spotify gives you add or Mom's flying slipper.. whichever first.For gaming sound is not problem but latency and the absence of Stereo is.Features are marvelous..And Bass goes as deep as 10hertz.So Bass Lovers its you Deal
Title: Rip Stereo

Review: I have both ,OnePlus wireless Z reverb edition and OnePlus wireless Z .Normal edition has a between which is super useful to change between device whereas this new reverb edition doesn't has the button.Plus company mentions that quick change can be done but was not working in my case ,so returning to buy previous gen .And also the fit was also different (idky) and was lighter which gave me a feeling of cheapness also .
Title: Regular are better than reverb edition

Review: Stay away from any oneplus accesories or red cable stuff. The mic is so noisy that its unusable. It has the loud cracking sound always. My friends are also facing the same issue. It's unusable. This is straight up scam.Quality of a 500rs wired one is a million times betterGo for m30 by oppo. It's far more better than this plus they have replaced mine after 8 months without a question when it broke (yeah reliability of any wireless at this price point is iffy)
Title: Unusable product

Review: During neckband selection phase confused between BOAT rokerz 355 & one plus bullet bass edition but finally after watching lots of videos on youtube Bought this neckband on 14 april 2021 in 1999₹ till 2 month really loved the product no issues very satisfied( also recommend my other friends which i regret now) but after 2 months during calls (not while playing videos audios) distortion started coming(not always but very frequently). Downloaded one plus care app found out that home pickups services are not available due to covid.
