But if u buy new one they will definitely reach ur home but for home pickups they had covid as an excuse. Then searched for one plus centres nearby & got one 10km aways from my place. Cost me 200₹ to & fro in traveling because can not use public transport due to covid.I discussed the problem they asked for proof LUCKILY i had recorded the calls so they said they will send product for testing will take 2 days that means i have to spend 200₹ again & time also & still they told it may be COMPATIBLITY ISSUE & asked which phone brand i use. I replied redmi note 10. They said there may be no problem with earphone it may be COMPATIBLITY ISSUE.I said my sister using motorola and having same problem in her phone too. My friend was also came with me bought same neck band facing same problem but he didn't had recording of distortion as a proof so they dont even accept there product for testing, his day completely wasted he was using Vivo phone. Another my friend using REAL ME phone having same neckband faced same issue, these things i explained to them and also pointed out that these are 4 major brands of phone. They replied same sir COMPATIBILITY ISSUE.  I said if there was a COMPATIBLITY ISSUE why i am not finding written discription of product on amazon & why i have not faced so called COMPATIBLITY ISSUE during first 2 months. I am feeling cheated why would i bought a product which is not compatible with my phone i can't change my phone for a earphone.Then they said they got to know about the problem after complaints started coming. I replied so what's my fault in this if your product is not compatible i was not informed about this anywhere in discription, what i do with this earphone now. After that they agreed to take product for testing before this they just trying to make this a "COMPATIBILITY ISSUE" while accepting they repeatedly said if there were other reason of distortion other than COMPATIBILITY ISSUE they will replace neck band with the new one, if not they can't do anything.Now they took neckband for testing & told me to wait for 2 days.NOW no matter what happens product is going to cost me 2400 ₹ including traveling cost of repairs.Anyhow this caused me lots of inconvenience & this is unexpected from the brand i respected so much.Please dont get influenced by you tubers they may be doing paid promotions & None of them said about this distortion problem.Then i bought boat earphone of 1599₹ for my friends birthday gift instead of one plus.& As a result now i hate the word COMPATIBILITY ISSUE.In my friend circle out 43 are facing problems having phone brands redmi vivo real me my sisters phone motorola.4th friend bought just 30 days ago (on my recommendation which i regret now) having oppo phone & still working fine but neckband may remember its INCOMPATIBILITY with it after 2 months
Title: TRUST ME if you have phone other than 1+ don't buy this.

Review: Works as per description, audio is very good,  type C fast charging, excellent battery life,  bluetooth 5.0, good material used for construction,  design is good and compact for storage and mic is clear.Only some codecs are missing which I understand cannot be covered in the price offered.  I am fine with it.Totally Recomended.
Title: Excellent

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 Yes finally ! I found a perfectly balanced Audio companion. OnePlus Bullets Z Bass edition is a perfectly balanced for Calls/Mic BASS gaming ! While gaming i didnt find any latency issues. Auto connect and auto turn off while separating abd connecting the magnets is a great feature i love about this. Battery is insane. Look at my Youtube channel - Making Photographs for the review video !
Title: Best Balanced High Quality Audio companion !

Review: Yes, like most of the user even I was facing the crackling issue while calling or listening to music.Solution is simple just do a factory rest on your headset (press and hold "+ & -" for 3 second untill red light appears)But a brand like One plus should have looked into the issue before launching the product.Sound quality is good and so is the call clarity. But the crackling issue has spoiled the party.
Title: Crackling noise issue (solution)

Review: भईया ! हम बताई दिया की जो एका आवाज हैं न । वो है एकदम अल्टीमेट कोउन्हु टक्कर नए है । रीयल मी वाले इयरफोन से । मतलब एक बार चार्ज हो जात है फिर डिस्चार्ज के नामवे न लेत हवे । अउर बेस बाप हो बाप मतलब जैसे की हमारा दुयिनो कनवा थर थारा जात हैं। ब्लूटूथवो सहिए है 5 0 का है । कल जो है एका हम अपने कोठा पर रखे रहे और हमरा छोटुआ जो है मोबाईल लेके भाग गवा । और ओके ई पता रहा नै । की हमारे पास है #वन प्लस ब्लूटूथ नेकबैंड 5,0 कनेक्टिविटी वाला अब ऊ घर के पिछवाड़े जाकर सईया ने हमको ऐसे देखा की मैं पानी पानी हो गई गाना सुन रहा है और विडियो देख तड़फड़ाए जा रहा की आवाज कहे नाई आ रहा है । लेकिन बाबू तम लोगो को बता रहे है ऊ जावून पानी पानी वाला फुल साउंड पर चलाया है की हम ऊपर छत पर ही मस्तियां गए । 🤭🤭🤭साऊंड  धाकड़वोकल। एक दम साफ़ साफ़बैतरिया मत पूछा हो धकाधक चलत बातेरेंज अभी बताए है न घर के पिछुआरे से ही काम चल जात हैं
Title: बहुत ही मधुर ध्वनि है । ( ओरिजनल बेस एडिशन )

Review: Do not buy this product.The product worked very well for a week, call quality was amazing, bass was good, battery lasted at least for a day or two depending on usage.But all this goodness lasted only a week.It stopped working right after a week. Unfortunately just a day after return policy. Now I cannot return it or use it.The product is neither charging nor turning on nor pairing. PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS SEEMS TO BE A COMMON ISSUE, and no reviews will tell you this unless you specifically search for it.Do not buy it as the one plus service is also pathetic...it's literally money down the drain. Buy Realme ones instead if you are looking for one in a similar range. Else invest some more and get a better brand.
Title: DO NOT BUY.

Review: Don't buy this product if u want to use for attending calls. It gives lots of disturbance. There is no Noise cancellation.Very disappointed with this product as o have purchased it with lot of confidence on OnePlus products.It's worth buying if u want to listen to music alone.
Title: Waste of money. Don't buy if u want to attend calls with this product.

Review: Sound,noise,bass no doubt awesome quality.but i have to face some bluetooth related problame like.for a magnetic bluetooth system,the phone does not actually have connected immediately,2nd one sometimes bluetooth is automatically disconnected,sometimes only audio is going off,you have to go to the mobile and turn it on,same as the call going off.but i've already used sony-WI-C310.i did not have to face any such problame there.when the market price of the two products is same.

I have used both the versions of oneplus earphone,  and they have really improved the bass a lot on this one , u can tell the difference immediately , but at the cost of the battery , yah the battery drains really fast as compared to the old one . The previous version could be used for up to 3 to 4 days without charging but this bass version one i  have to charge every day , the battery is draining really fast , and about the quick switch feature i really liked the old one when there was a physical button that you could use, now its hard to switch and sometime it doesn't even switch and i have to turn the blutooth off one my phone to connect it on my i pad thats the sad part plzzz fix this on the next version
Title: Its bass has been improved a lot but at the cost of battery

Review: Sound is terribly well balanced.Some extra bass would probably start aching ur head.Battery lasts for 18-20 hrs if not used in full volume + fast charging.Has a premium feel to it.Totally tangle free.But if U start to work out they may some times get dislodged...coz they don't have over ear strap..u know!? But u ain't gonna use it only during workouts 😂 so it's the best product u can buy.Most importantly they don't hurt your ears even for during long durations !! The NON-BASS edition has 2hrs more to battery life..But I 'guess' This is worth the sacrifice 🤷
Title: Best Cord Bluetooth headset in 2000 if U want a Balanced & good sound with battery

Review: Most miss guiding product on internetThey are showing that they will give you warranty but in reality they are NOT PROVIDING SERVICE IN MY AREA AND THEY ARE SAYING THAT THERE IS NO PICKUP SERVICE in also my area and when I told this to Amazon they told me to ask and service denied letter from oneplus customer care air and Oneplus Peoples Are Not Giving Me Service Denial Letter From 2 Months And NO WARRANTY IS CLAIMED BY ANY OF THEMplease if you are going to buy something like this don't ever try to buy oneplus if you want to claim warranty, they will not give it to you...I strictly tell you not to go with OnePlus because 2 monts are complicated and no warranty is claimed & no services is provided yet
Title: Wrost on call & No warranty claimed.

Review: UPDATE: Only work for 8 months, after 6 months one side was gone still one side was working fine after 2 months both side were gone. Sad I was hoping so much from this product. I am not sure if it's worth it or not(Nothing special but still quality is good using this for a month Charging time is amazing takes barely 10 min you can use it for 5-6 hours I am not person who loves bass but still good  would love if there was a little bit crisp for vocals built quality is nice Material good if it's survive longer time definitely worth every penny)
Title: You can buy it but nothing special in this product

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I just bought OP Nord and was looking for wireless earphones. Found this on sale @1799.I would say value for money:Pros1. Quick pairing with OnePlus.2. Good sound quality play with Equalizer for your liking.3. No call issues.4. You get a fast charge wire cable.5. Great backup 10hrs.6. Charge 10min playback 10hrs.No cons yetStill have to see how good it is after 6months. As fast charging may messeup the battery.
Title: A must if you have OnePlus phone works like charm.

Review: Product was good but it's wark for 6 to 10 months only after that facing issue, I have replaced it once after 6 month again same issue faced in new one also, even in customer care I have seen 4 people came for same problemI have given review after using more then 1 year so better to avoid it
Title: Don't buy

Review: Not expected from a reputed company like @OnePlus which is reviewed by thousands! Oneplus bullets wireless z bass edition stopped working suddenly while attending a call, after 10days of use !😢 No power light, even after trying to reset by pressing volume+ & volume- button. Not even at charging time light remains off. Charged for 1 hour and tried to switch it on but invain! No nearest service centre!
Title: Stopped working after 10 days.

Review: I own both OP BW Z & OP BW Z (Bass edition).The loudness & bass in the base edition is for sure more than that of normal edition. It also produces bass where there is not any bass  present which is kind of annoying. The battery life would be around 12-14 hours, i expected more but it's not a big deal for me. The Quick Switch option of normal edition is what i miss the most in bass edition. There is a noise which is produced while increasing or decreasing the volume, i don't know if this is there only in my earphones or entire lineup but it's very unpleasant to hear. Overall good earphones.
Title: Overall a good pair of earphones.

Review: Packaging fantastic, Delivery on time, Oneplus product's image well maintained. The wireless bullet ,name says it all, it is a must buy buds earphones. Superb Bass & total sound quality. It also saves battery while not in use if you join the magnetic buds.
Title: A must buy product by Oneplus

Review: I'm writing this review after 1 week of usage.There are some things to be mentioned...1. The overall sound quality is not the best but it's up to the mark and enogh for this price point...no other neckbands can have this much good quality2. The noice cancellation is more than enough and I think it's the best in this budget3. As this is the bass edition and not the normal bullets wireless Z without bass, the bass quality is super...you will be satisfied with the bass...not too much...not too less...it's just perfect...I would rather say that it is the best among any other neckbands of this price point or higher4. The bluetooth compatibility is really good...connects easily when you separate two buds and connects super fast...and disconnects when two buds join magnetically...without any issueSo, go for it...it's a budget neckband and the best one
Title: Value for money

Review: Its really good bluetooth i have brought it today seems like its workh 1999 as i get bluetooth coverage in pretty big distance and playback time is according to mark. Recharge timing is up to mark. Sound experience is also great. I'm using it with my oneplus 7T .Whole great experience.Love it
Title: Love it

Review: Worst service provider. The earphone stopped working properly after just 10 days and they don't even provide services to repair or replace device.  It looks like they are just selling defective stocks in this pandemic situation to clear old stock. I recommend no one should purchase this. Noise cancellation not working properly and earphone creates noise on its own while calling. Also the customer care service is worst grade. They tells you to send device even if service center not receiving and when delivered even after 15 days they won't provide any update to you. They just keeps giving you case ids but no proper response or solution by mail, call or whatsapp. Never buy any product from such company without any service.
Title: Worst Brand, Third class service, No custom support

Review: Stopped Working after 3 months of use.Battery backup is really very good but don’t know it’s stopped charging suddenly and not working since then. I Tried everything which they asks to do but its not switching ON. We don’t expect such poor quality of products from Brand like Oneplus. I have seen a lot of peoples have gone through same issues.However Sound Quality was good, bass quarterback and noise cancellation was also Very decent as compare to other products in this price range. I would suggest look for the other options before buying this.Returned the product after contacting oneplus service agent for replacement. Pickup and drop facility is available which is a good thing.
Title: Stopped Working after 3 Months

Review: I purchased these headphones for calling purpose mostly and it works amazingly superb.. quickly shuts down while you attach the magnets of both side, connects very fast while you detach.When phone rings, I quickly detach the magnets and it connects in 2 seconds and becomes ready to talk..
Title: Amazing product forr calling and great bass too

Review: Build quality- gd.Connection- stable.Comfort- thik thak.Noise cancellation for voice clip recording- below avg.Bt, Call me utna prblm nhi kar rha hai.Battery backup- gd.Charging speed- approx 1 & half hoursBass & sound quality- gd.I use it with redmi note 8 . Connection & pairing me koi v prblm nhi kar rha hai. & Fast also.Tere bina from nucleya mujhe pasand aya. & achcha v baj rha h is neckband pe.Leke pachtaoge nhi.
Title: After 10 days uses

Review: Using it almost a year.. best for calling.. noise cancellation is at its best.. easily talk with anyone on busy street with noise disturbance.. vocals n bass at its best i watch most of movies n hear muisc using it.. easy to go anywhere.. battery last upto 2 days with heavy use too..
Title: Best in Class

Review: One side of earphone stopped working after 6 months of use, since it was on warranty I took it to service center and now it is submitted there for 15 days still waiting for replacement.Disappointed from oneplus, there 3 other peoples in service center with same problem.
Title: One side of earphone stopped working

Review: Most people buy neck band for hand free calls while driving or during other work.....this one plus band is not good for that...because of its poor noise cancellation quality...whenever you talk in call using neck band...during driving and ever at room it take noise of fan,  exhaust  ,wind sound during driving and make uncomfortable to listen what you are saying to other person.....please don't buy if you are buying for calls....but for listening music it's good....
Title: Noise cancellation not good

Review: I bought the earphones on July 5th 2021, after 3 weeks it started making a cracking sound which was gone in a second but as you keep using it for longer it increases slowly.Battery life is good.I have noticed the connection goes away and comes back which makes my calls quite disturbing as I mmiss important points in meetings and work. I also tried using this for netflix and it disconnected, pausing the video and again reconnected and then plays with the cracking sound. Please understand as it is a 2k earphone, it has its ups and downs. Overall it works fine and basic.
Title: Cracking sound and unstable connections.. Suddenly gets disconnected.

Review: I also have had heard the realme buds. The sound of OnePlus bud z is quite open. Punchy bass. And pleaseant to hear. And it also goes pretty loud. Overall these are above average headphones. Nothing special about it. It delivers what it says on the description.Light weight and good for workouts plus has additional water resistance.
Title: Delivers what they say. Just not the bass

Review: This is my first wireless headset, actually after looking all review at net I've decided to buy this on the sale and received the product with in 12 hrs.Band looks nice, flexible, weightless, call quality is also good and music is mind blowing with the new Bass effect addition. You will feel the real true experience of the sound quality this time on this.
Title: Worth buying

Review: The only pros were it had very premium packaging which gave a good unboxing experience. Then the built quality was okay.The Cons are in Sound quality. I would rate it 2/10 I'm a previous oppo enco m1 user and the sound quality from that is perfect in every aspect it will just produce the pure sound that is encoded in your music no extra tweaking for bass or anything. Just clear audio every note, vocals, and instrument are perfectly produced which is perfect for an audiophile at that budget.But in this one plus wireless z it just sounds like a cheap headphone that we can buy for under rs.500.Conclusion: Don't judge a book by its cover. Here the cover is amazing but the content is just worthless.Also, The latency with PC is worst and when music is played you can hear a steady low buzzing sound. The good price will be under Rs. 1000.  I'm not a oppo fan I wouldn't buy any oppo mobiles. but if you are looking for bt headphone under 2k oppo enco m31 is best The sound quality is worth more than 2k but battery can only last 8 to 10 hrs without ldac..
Title: Nota Headphone for Music playback

Review: This is quite a decent product in its class with good wireless connectivity, sound quality, comfort etc. However, there are issues while getting on a call. Earlier it was just a lag in connecting, then slowly the earphones started disconnecting by itself even while listening to something. Past month or so this has started distorting voice on calls. This is after 5 months of use.
Title: Decent overall but problems emerging

Review: 1.Sound Quality is best.10 out of 102. Noice cancellation is avarage.10 out of 83. Bass quality is awsome..10 out of 114. Magnetic on/off control and fast pair with 5.0 bt.5. Dual pair is not support.10 out of 06.battry life is good and support c type charger charge within 50 mintus.7. Standby time upto 3 days or base on our uses.OVER ALL...PRODUCT IS BESTThis review is on the basis of 5 months uses..
Title: Very Very wonderful item. Definitely buy.All Are perfect.😊😊😊

Review: Please don't buy these earphones.. After 3 months of use one side of the earphones doesn't produce proper sound in comparison to the right side nd also the buttons have stopped working nd uhh can't take calls using these earphones as they produce crackling sound in the background which makes calling experience worst.Also the only thing i liked about this product is its battery life other than that nothing is gud in this product that one should invest 1999 in these earphones. And also whenever you call the customer care executives they are always busy no matter at whatever time you call them they are always busy.
Title: Don't buy these earphones as uhh will regret after 2 months.

Review: Earlier I was using Non Bass one, after using them I thought I should upgrade to bass one but it wasn’t good,LikeAt the of using volume button some kind of kharrr khrr sound come….And khat khat sound come while watching movie (Netflix, Amazon, Hotstar, so on)In shot their is some kind of sound disturbance in it…My product have been replaced 2 times by Amazon but still same thing continues…This was my experience…
Title: Product is good but non bass one are far more better and have clear sound

Review: This is awesome. Its been a week I have been using and it is still having around 30% charge(not a heavy user). If I enable Flight mode and disable it, has some problem in reconnecting otherwise it is fine.Update: Just after an year stopped working. Joints started to tear and after few days of this it stopped working.
Title: Great sound quality and provides awesome sound experience

Review: This product is trash for me (my personal experience). Why you ask. I will tell you in 2 points.For a earphone the two main pointer are comfort and sound quality.1) Comfort-  this earphone design is extremely uncomfortable for me and I am dam sure it will be uncomfortable for most of the people. Because of the extended plastic design near the sillicon tips and having a large case housings of driver , it becomes very painfull and irritating for ears even if you wears it for half an hour. ( Very very annoying and painfull).It feels like these earphones are digging into my ears after wearing it for 1 hour.2) sound quality.- Sound quality is also not good (bellow avaerage ). This actually delivers what it said ,bass, but it way too bassy and not a good kind of bass rather a very muddy kind of bass which becomes very irritating to hear. I am currently using it with OnePlus Nord and I have tried to lower the bass through equaliser. After that  also I saw very minimal difference in bass levels. Due to the high muddy bad kind of bass other frequency (mid tones and high tones )gets  seriously affected and gets suppressed a lot due to which music listening and video watching experience gets negatively affected by a lot.I want to go back to wired earphones like sony and Sennheiser which gives a rich experience , but sadly because my phone doesn't have headphone jack I have to stick to these earphones for now😠.* Why I brought this earphone at first place ?. Because I fell for the marketing gimmic of low latency of these earphone with fnatic mode which works with OnePlus device . (In real life you will not see much a difference)I should have gone with oppo enco m31. Seen some really good reviews about oppo in technolob ,geeky Ranjit and gizzmodict yt channel
Title: Read once before buying this. From a genuine indian customer

Review: Not expect to much from this its just ok product the bass is ok not that great the sound quality is good but not up to mark the mic quality is good when making call but really bad when we send voice message in WhatsApp or telegram ect there is lot of noise you have to speak much louder the biuld is good the charging seed is good but is not showing the white light every time the battery backup is not what they claim its give u around 12 to 13 hrs its not for gaming so overall is just a ok product not expect to much from this.......
Title: OnePlus bullet tis just ok quality

Review: 3 drawback i have seen .1> i specially chose this headphone for quick on off, just touch two burds. But it's the main drawback when i traveling and my earphone is not in my ear and came a call ,to hear or spoke i have to connect every time2> there is no vibrate mode ..but 899 boat has. When call come it vibrate not ringing the phone. Thats where we were it.. connect and call come phone and it ringing horrible on class.3>when i share my hotspot to others and my onepluse headphone connect and i use to listen music or other the noise of headphone is breaking.. it is very badly embarrassing..4>my headphone is not want to connect with my laptop .. but it can be laptop problem .. but my Bluetooth speaker is connected very easily. How it can.Otherwise headphone is good. About sound and battery has no complain..
Title: Its good except those problem

Review: I ordered the Bass edition headphones. The sound quality is decent however, 80-90% times during a regular phone or video call i get a crackling sound. I believe it's the microphone issue as i even get it if i connect it with my laptop for Google meet or zoom calls. I even got the headphones replaced via service center by still get the same issue. The service center guy told me that they cannot that responsibility for non one plus device. I will not recommended this ear phone to anyone who wants to use it for voice calls speacially if you don't have one plus phone.
Title: Crackling sound during voice and video calls

Review: After 5 or 6 month of uses ur headphone will automatically cracked by some places....the same thing happens to me I go to my nearest one plus showroom they took my headphone to check and tell us for waiting my headphone has no wear cut no physically damaged just a little bit cracked by one place so they refused to exchange  my headphone...even they have no option to repair it....after 30 or 40 min of waiting they told us that your product will not eligible for replacement....even they have no other options to repair headphones....I must say One plus have very poor in their customer care service  facilities....So I suggest to you all please don't buy any one plus product untill they  don't work on their customer care service.....shame on this company....
Title: Dont Buy

Review: I had been using onplus wireless bullets v1 for 2 years and it lost its charm.With a bass boost, I thought this would be a perfect replacement for it. But the microphone of this is absolutely horrible. The reverb red color does not have a dedicated mic holder like the other colors. So there's a noise always made during calls and it is very annoying for the recipient to a point where we can't talk.I DO NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS PRODUCT. Try other colors in the least, not reverb red.
Title: MIC IS HORRIBLE.

Review: It's a very good product. You can absolutely consider to buy it.* Both the speakers have magnet on the back side hence they immediately stick to each other as they come close.* Instantly connets to bluetooth device* Sound quality is best but the bass is extremely disappointing.* Battery is super fast. In 10-15 minutes you get 100% charged battery that runs easily 9-10 hours.

Title: and sister accuracy level and I will do the same to you

Review: Not durableI have ordered 2 pieces keeping faith on one plusBoth stopped worrking nowInitially 1 ear pc stopped and now both stoppedAs its still within warranty was thinking to visit service center in pune, but their syster is so pathetic that my whole day would have gone for sameWhen i have visited service center for my phone it took 2 day for me to submit my phone and took 2wks to get it back repaired, their i found, not only me around 70% people was having problem with headphones and everyone was struggling to get replacement
Title: NOT DURABLE

Review: Just after one week I brought this product, i was not able to connect this headphone with my any phone. Tried multiple phones but its not connecting. No warranty card with envelop and nothing can be done at this situation. 2K has gone. Never buy this product.
Title: Worst product

Review: Generally this is not expected from One+. They are just fooling people. quick switch doesn't works except the One+ devices.update after 2 days of usage: this a junk product from One plus. if you have connected to laptop and then you are switching to mobile then the sound quality is getting crapped. Note:  Mobile is on Andorid 10. One plus guys needs to fix these major issues..
Title: Quick switch is not working

Review: Honestly I'm recommending you to not buy this earphone. Sometimes it's sounds become mute while Bluetooth is still connected this is worse problem and quick switch is not available in this earphone you have to do it manually this worsen man. I didn't expect this from OnePlus they are making us fool by writing in their products description and they aren't providing return policy , only you can replace with same product, bass is okay but not for bass lover , call quality is also okay sound is low. My recommendation is boat 335 will be good than this OnePlus don't go for OnePlus and battery backup is less than i expectI want my money back
Title: OnePlus z bass edition problem don't buy

Review: First it's take a long time to connect then it's goes on & off in connection. Secondly the worst problem is switching in. After a sometime when put your buds to play they will not be connected then somehow will show connected no phone media active or vice versa suppose a call comes you were your buds and try to pick up it will take time from there you want to play music it will show no media so replug again then from songs you switch to YouTube again it's goes off no media or any call come it's goes off again replug it's very irritating and even your videos get paused during this. Better to buy some other product rather than these one.
Title: Bad product buy something else available in same price

Review: Nice earphones.. built quality, battery back up, fast charging, auto connect everything is awesome about this earphone.. sound quality is not at par with Bose but then again look at the price. Most importantly it feels light on the neck and the neck band feels very comfortable. I am happy with the earphones.
Title: Nice earphone

Review: Ive been using this product for the last 3 days.This might be too early to write an elaborate reviewbut I've known enough about this neckband to be"eligible".1. Sound Quality:The drivers definitely produce a very balanced soundthat is surely going to satisfy most of the peopleincluding me. Whether it's about mid frequencies,vocals or the high frequency trebles, or even thelower frequencies, this neckband deals all of thosewith superior performance. Undoubtedly.2. Bass:Bass is good. But not thumping which you'll getfrom Realme's 13.6mm drivers (Buds Wireless Pro)or even 11.2mm (Buds Wireless). Those do havebetter bass but these 9.2mm re-eng ineered bassboosted drivers of Z Bass edition do produce lowerfrequencies pretty decently. You get my point. It willnot shake the inside of your ears. But you know what,whatever it produces you're surely going to love it. Ofcourse most people won't sacrifice such a decentlybalanced sound for only bass. Again it's a personalpreference. If you're one of them who listensMOSTLY BASS AND HARDLY ANYTHING ELSE, thengo for Realme.3. Battery backup:Oh my word! Jaw dropping backup which I haventimagined even in my dreams. You're easily going toget 15-17 hours of total playtime at 70-80% volume.Oneplus has done an excellent job in this field.4. Charging timeCharged the neckband from 0% to 80% in 10minutes from a powerbank which l used for testing.And it took 57 minutes to charge from 0 to 100%.The powerbank doesnt support tast charging andyou won't ever need a fast-charging supportingcharger for this neckband. For those tech savvypeople out there, the red cable that OnePlus hasprovided supports a maximum of 1 Amp currentsuppose. tried charging my Poco X2 with that cableand measured the current with Ampere app. Thehighest measurement was 850 mA. You can havean idea that 1 Amp might be the limit. So you wontneed a fast charger for that statement to be true "10minutes of warp charge for 10 hours playtime.lamactually overwhelmed with this feature.5. Call quality:lt's decent. Theres NO noise cancellation for sure.IT you re among a heavy traic, other person wIlhear both you and the traftic. In quite environmentst works fine. Voice clarity Is really exceptiona.But even one car horn or one dog-bark from theroad beside your home can ruin the statementenvironmental noise cancellation". For office usageswith fans and ACs arOund you, it will work flawlessly.For even better mic quality and pretty decent noisecancellation you can go with Oppo Enco m31.6. Build qualitygave me an impression that you can wear it atnight while listening to music and sleep. A bit bulkycabinet might be a problem for you it your pillowis like a stone. Otherwise it's fine. The wire is alsotextured and feels like it can handle folds andstretches. Body is polycarbonate but good qualitymaterial nonetheless. Yeah oneplus also did a goodob keeping the build quality decent enough.7. Buttons and features:Umm. Quick switch didn't work for me to be honest.When I paired it with two devices, pressing themiddle button for 5 seconds do disconnect itfrom the current device and you need to press the"oneplus bullets wireless z" in the other device tomake a connection. lt's okay in a way but I expectedpressing for 5 seconds would instantly connect withthe previous device. Other functions are totally okay.Volume up down, changing songs, voice assistant,magnetic on off works like a charm.8. IP Rating:This might not be a big deal for most. But oneplushas this IP55 certification. Rated 5 for dust proofingability and 5 for water resistance, and hence 55.Whereas enco m31 had IPX5, which says there'sno certification for dust resistivity. These might be"theoretical" but at the end of the day these do makea difference when comes to longevity.My opinion:This might be the best neckband under 2000. Encom31 does provide a hard competition against it withbetter sound quality and mic quality. But you actuallyneed battery backup no matter what. 6 hours inLDAC doesn't seem better enough than 17 hoursAAC. And you might not get those LDAC songs in theinternet that easily. For ordinary day-to-day purpose,AAC would be more than enough. And no one couldever say that Z Bass Edition Neckbands have not sosatisfactory sound quality. Yeah bass is not thumpybut it's there when you need it. After a debatemonths between Z Bass Edition and M31, l've finallyinclined for Z. And my regret? No there's none. I am100% satisfied with what this provides.
Title: 5 * great  product

Even the customer support guy was very rude and was mentioning because of the process there is a delay of 3 hours to get a replacement. The support is very much like a government office. Never would buy another one from OnePlus.

Title: 35days of best performance.....and dead later

Review: I’m a bass-head and I was looking for a good pair of BT headphones under 2000 with punchy bass. This one has the best audio and bass. Also the call audio is crystal clear and the ear grip is solid and battery life is solid. I also ordered JBL 215BT bass edition but its no where close to oneplus. Go for it. Brilliant product by oneplus.
Title: Brilliant for Bass Heads!! Best in Range! 5 ⭐️

Review: I have been using this earphone for about 20 days and I am pretty impressed with it.As a casual user, I was looking for a neckband which ticked all the boxes right and after some research, I choose OnePlus from the likes of Realme buds and Oppo M31.Battery: I rate it highly in regards to the battery, it has quick charge and a pretty decent battry life.Type-C charging cable was a must for me.It took around 30-40 min for charging from 0-100. And the battery lasted for about 16-17 hrs at 70% vol. Level. I was using AAC Codec.Best part is it switches on/off by connecting the earbud together. Magic of the magnets. Magnets are pretty strong, they hold the earpieces strongly.Audio: For getting the best audio output choose the AAC Codec from the bluetooth settings or the developer option.I found the audio signature to be well balanced. The volume and loudness were more than enough for my liking.I could definitely feel the bass, which was nice and not overpowering. The highs and the lows are also well maintained. It was definitely enjoyable while listening to music like instrumental and also for watching movies or videos on youtube, vocals were crisp and clear. In this price range I can't complaint much in this regard. Ofc they could have given a better audio codec support like Aptx HD, but I definitely don't mind, and if you are an Apple user you wouldn't either. I tested it both on Iphone SE and Redmi Note 10. I guess for even better audio quality if you are an audiophile looking for an neckband in this price range go for Oppo enco M31.Comfort: I would consider this as personal preference. But in my opinion, this was very comfortable and lightweight, the neckbands is of permium quality sillicon, very flexible and it rest on the neck without giving me any irritation.Earpiece were also comfortable to were for long periods of time, it is good quality plastic with nice finish.The earpiece wire is kinda thick with texture, I gives me some confidence that it won't break easliy. Wires weren't too long either. I was using the medium size buds and it was soft and gave a very good isolation, preventing the outside noise to a degree.I wouldn't recommend using it while on the bed or resting your ear on pillow, it was not comfortable as it was kinda jutting outside of my ear due to the design.IPX5 Rating is also reassuring while working out, jogging, or doing physical exercise.Earpiece did stay in the ears while doing exercises. Tried to head bang to make it fall out. It stayed in. Nice job, even without extra wings for support.Call quality: I don't take much calls on this earphones, but ones I did take was okey, I was audible enough at the other end, the surrounding noise was also creeping in while having a conversation. I would give an average rating if you ask me. It gets the job done.Summery: Definitely a great choice of wireless bluetooth neckband at this price range, I would definitely recommend it at a price of Rs. 1500-1700.My only concern is about the longevity of this product, I'll try to update my review in 6 months or in between if something happens. Cheers.Stay safe. Stay healthy.
Title: Review- 20 days later

Review: great one, easy connect and disconnect. Multi device connection is available.Full charge in 10min only.Playtime is awsome.Sound quality and noise canclation is unremarkable. Built quality is too good.Dont waste time in looking other brands for this price range.My five of friend is using this for many days and it worth.
Title: Go ahead!! don't think twice!! Great product

Review: Bass composition with other freqs is good but not best as you can see in Sony or JBL. So 4 stars for audio quality.Connectivity speed is superbb plus! It gets connected within the time required to separate ear-buds & put then into your ears. Latency is not even noticable & so 5 star for latency & connectivity!Battery backup is also amazing my usage is just 4-5 hrs a day, so I need to charge it after 3 or sometimes 4 days. So again 5 stars for battery!
Title: Amazing, but bass overloaded! 🥶

Review: if you are looking for best wireless earphones @2K, just go for it.(OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition (Reverb Red)) 👍Even though it is a Bass Edition, Bass is not too high but pretty much enough. 👌Sound quality & volume is impressive.💯Didn't found much "Noise cancellation", still not bad.(If your mobile bluetooth version is 4, then you might get voice disturbance & voice break since this device is having bluetooth version 5)✌Fast Connectivity.❤️No Quick switch in this version(Bass Edition) 😏Comfortable 👍Battery 💪 As they mentioned, we can charge for 10 mins & can be used for 10hrs. If you charge for 1hr, you can use upto 17hrs. 💪👍much recommended product @2K 😍And, please don't compare this product with realme buds wireless. I found "one plus Bwz bass edition > Realme Buds wireless".
Title: All-rounder performance, go for it if :

Bass is head hitting, not smooth and punchy, very similar to BoAt.Neckband is annoying in hot sweaty summer environment but that's the deal with any other neckband.So it's not the best but perfectly average which checks every box.

Review: Initially i was very disappointed and angry when i got to knpw that bass variant doesn't have quick switch button and they did not mentioned on product page. As Quick switch meant to me so much as i switch between my laptop and phone very much.But using it for two days i feel satisfied as despite lacking quick switch button its quick switch function works really well you just need to select manually in your bluetooth settings. Apart from that bass, sound quality everything is superb just use bigger buds for extreme bass
Title: Superb

Review: I had to replace the first piece due to the exact same problem.I will not go into Bass, beats, music reviews - there was no problem. It was pretty much same as what has been said in other reviews.I used these with 2 phones - OnePlus 7T pro and Moto One Power. With both of these, during any voice, video, google-meet calls, there is a continuous noise - and a very loud noise on both the ends of call!Even after the first replacement, I faced the same issue. We need to cut the call reconnect it and then we need to make call and speak. While in traffic or in an emergency situation this will irritates you.I previously used boAt Rockerz 510 over the ear headphone from last year till today it doesn't have any connection problem whenever I get call or in between the call it connects perfectly.In the OnePlus wireless z bass edition, in my case it is a big problem for me.Other than that this was an amazing product from OnePlus.Hope it helps :-)
