I have tried connecting the same headset with different Mobile same problem i faced. So it's a product defect.
Title: Call clarity and audio is worst can't hear a thing even with full volume.

Review: I like every features they provide. and I am using for class in laptop mic is very proper, noise cancelling is perfect, bass is very nice that song is so clear that we are dancing in club on DJ that type of feeling I have when I put it . So if you are willing to buy nice neckband go for it , but it has only 17 hours playback if any office or marketing employee is willing to buy so I don't recommend that because you have more  work on laptops so you need more( hours playback like 24,30,40 )neckbands.
Title: Best neckband with best features in budget price

Review: I am using this Bluetooth since last 20 days. I am fully satisfied with this amazing earphone of oneplus. Sound quality of this earphone is very clear and good but noise cancellation during calls is ok ok. Bass quality is superb and build quality is also very nice and looks attractive. It's very light in weight and comfortable for ears. Overall a good earphone by Oneplus. Thank you
Title: Good wireless Bluetooth earphone

Review: I have used ₹800- ₹ 1000 earphones. I have also uaed apple earpods.After my selection in College I wanted to upgrade to a premium earphone. So i choose OnePlus Z .To my surprise It wasn't a upgrade at all-Bass quality very low (hardly noticeable)- Sound quality like a normal earphones-Earbuds Quite small for fit in ears-You just paying for fancy box and company namesakeMy advice: Either go for apple airpods if you can afford or anything between₹ 800-1000 will do the same as₹ 1000-7000 . They just make you pay for company namesake that's it.
Title: Similar to ₹800 earphones

Review: I have both wireless neckband, OnePlus and Realme Buds costing around 2000 & 1800 respectively. Realme Buds are ways better in Sound quality. Oneplus have added bass, which feels like out of balance. I wish I would have bought another Realme Buds instead of OnePlus.
Title: Realme Buds are way Better in Sound quality. Regret Purchasing OnePlus Z Bass Edition.

Review: I bought this for main quick switch feature and I know it is working well in normal version but do not know that quick switch is not available on BASS EDITION though it mentioned on description. I did not expect such a thing from OnePlus.I will surely return it and go with normal edition as such it do have quick switch .
Title: Base Edition do not have quick switch feature

Review: I bought this as an alternative to my existing headphones for gaming purpose. Problem with this is high latency and also in game voice is choppy. In intense fights you won't be able to recognise difference between near and slightly far footsteps. Do not buy this for gaming purpose. Device on which I play is OnePlus 6T. I've also tried gaming on Realme X2 Pro 8+128GB with this headphones and believe me when I say "The problem is even worse." It's okayish for listening music. Hope you find my review useful.
Title: Not for Gaming.

Review: There is no quick switch, unable to switch between devices using these earphones. We have to switch by selecting oneplus bullets on the device's Bluetooth settings. Very disappointed. I bought this product, particularly for a quick switch. Oneplus and Amazon cheating customers.
Title: No Quick Switch on Bass Edition

Review: Not able to record voice... Very low volume. Mic is good for calls. My 200 earphones serves better.I got headache while putting it around my neck and listening music... when I switch to my wired earphones I felt better, no headache.  Serves no purpose to me. May be good for others, not able to return I guess only replacement is available.
Title: Headache while using it & Not able to record your voice properly

Review: Well. Today I  have received it. It's bass quality is very good. U will defiantly feel it's bass..sound quality is also very good even in high volume u don't feel irrigation..for music and call purpose in indoors  it's really one of the best bluetooth earphone. But yes this is  not good for gaming purpose if u don't have  one plus phone.  But if u really want to enjoy music without any doubt u can definitely buy it. Battery back up is also good. It has fast charge . I bought it in sale for 1800 rs. So I can it's totally worth it  for me .thank you amazon for fast delivery
Title: Superb bass & sound quality.

Review: Started to malfunction right after 30 days of usage, no calls are heard clearly, the very reason why it was bought, I thought it malfunctioned, took it to service Center, they replaced it only to find out it too malfunctioned till I realised they are not compatible with my xiaomi phone what a shame!!!
Title: Not compatible with xiaomi phones

Review: Worst product at this point, realme buds are better at sound quality compared to this oneplus bass editionEven the battery says 40% but my phone doesn't play on the earphone but realme at same time didThis is the worst product I bought for such price point
Title: Worst product at this price

Review: I bought this primarily to listen to music. And, it does a fantastic job at that.1. Loud volume2. Punchy bass (Maybe a bit much for some)3. Excellent charge staying duration4. Fits the ear splendidly well. Can run with it.5. Pocket friendly6. User friendly buttons to pause, skip ahead, rewind backI've taken very few calls using this. No latency issues so far.If you are not too technical or particular about how the music should sound, and just want something good for listening to music, then this is a great buy.
Title: Pocket friendly and punch bass

Review: Ordered on 13 jan for my online classes, received on 17 jan. From day 1 , mic not working, booked onsite repair, took 10 days for parcel and all. Received on 31 with the message,'' No defect found. Return without repair.'' Now I took it to service centre myself 30 kms away. They said the issue is there but they cannot make a conclusion .(What does that means) . Bought for online classes and the mic isn't working.
Title: Mic not working

Review: Yes that's a beast , u can buy it without hesitation, it fits perfectly in my ears, additionally u get extra two pairs of earbuds ,The bass is perfect its beyond what i expected,The charging is lit 🔥The charge stays as its mentioned ;-)Sound quality is extremely awesome i loved it .🖤And the feature is also great of magnetic on/off . And after detaching the magnets it well reconnected in half a sec. (It offs to save battery so don't worry about that )About noise cancellations , that's a yes from mee👍And the leds are also nice;It will show with a blink that its connected to ur deviceAnd it will change to res while charging and after fully charged it will change to white.Ps- The only thing that i can't get is how to claim warranty :-(Don't think that's a china product it has a great quality as its a brand
Title: That's a beast for ur music experience 🖤

Review: It's flexible .. I was using samsung previously but neck band was stiff so it broken in a month. Second thing is magnet part so both ear par don't hang around here and there ..So it's good product .. decent sound quality .. I m using mostly for phone calls .. I like this
Title: Good product

Review: Third class service and third class of one plus ear phone and bad service from amazon for defective products returning on next day its say we are unable to do please try after some time.I am buy lots of product by from amazon and but this I am disappointed from service.Next time I want to be think to buy from amazon
Title: Bad ear phone defective product sent to me. Its not working.

Review: Everytime I buy a one plus product I am really satisfied with their quality , regarding this product the packing was superb the quality of the earphones are good the bass are the best , the charging is also fast and the battery backup is also good and according to the price it is also fine different colours are available but Black suits very much !!!! So if you are planning to buy a bluetooth earphone with a range of 2k then I would give a thumbs up!!
Title: One plus❤️

Review: One Plus Bullets Wireless Bass edition lacks everything.1. Battery :- they claim that the battery lasts for 10-12 hours, but in reality it only lasts upto 5 -6 hours. So if you are planning to buy them you will have to charge it repetitively. Also videos/songs don't play smoothly when the charging is low.2. Sound quality :- considering the amount you will be investing in buying these earphones, the sound quality is not so good.. noise cancellation is normal could have been better.If the return window was still open, i would have chosen to return them.
Title: DO NOT BUY THEM

Review: Comfortable - The band is of rubber and easily flexible.Battery backup - 1 to 2 days depending on the usage. Better than most of the Bluetooth earphones.Charging time upto full- comparatively very lessBass - not so much but decentSound quality - crystal clear and highest volume is bad for your ears - 80% of highest volume seems manageable.Most impressive - magnetic on/off is really quick and Bluetooth range and connectivity is strong and quick.
Title: Best neckband earphones you can get at this price

Review: Earlier I used boat rockers. In boat, bass and sound quality was too good. Call quality also good. Approx 2 year , I used. The only negative is charging time, boat will take 2+ hours and only 6-8 hours in medium volume we can use.(time depends upon volume).Now let's come to one plus, firstly charging is awesome. Next Bass quality is excellent. Battery backup also good. After 2 months of usage, it will last minimum 10-12 hours.And finally , the comfortable fitting in the ear and design is soo good.For 1899 rs, this one is worthy.
Title: Worthy for 1899 rs, Good bass, battery back up , fast charging and design. Go for it.

Review: Even though after full charge by OnePlus charger, it never shows the white light. Always red light is shown during and post 100% charging.If we remove the power plug anf connect again it will show whilte light..Looks like a hardware issue.
Title: Good earphone with minor bug

Review: There's so much difference between the normal and bass editions. If you are a bass lover you can definitely go for bass edition anyway the balanced sound is not comprised in bass edition, the sound quality in bass edition is as good as the original version and on the top bass is an added advantage. You just have to compromise with not having quick switch, a separate volume and control button.
Title: Bass edition is the best!

Review: No significant change is noticed than old model I think micro phone is not working.. When i send voice msgs recipient says they cant hear it happens most of the time when i check the sound is too low, its been 3 months i had purchased now onwle speaket is not working.. I came to knw that service center is full of with peoples with same pblm.....
Title: Speker if not working after 3 months common pblm. Service center is full of people with this issue

Review: Very bad experience... Unable to download invoice to claim warranty. after 7 months magnetic on-off is not working and very hard to on it after recharge as there is no on off bottom & magnetic on&off not working.
Title: Magnetic on & off not working after 7 months

Review: Good quality product. Perfect for music listening and movies. Less latency. But it would be very convenient to have mic on the wire like OnePlus Bullets Wireless non bass edition. But still calling is possible and works fine. Love the quality ❤️
Title: Worth the price

Review: This Product by far is the best and affordable investment toward listening to me. Sound is chrisp and clear. The bass is good and I must compare it with other products, though the bass is there but there is a difference between defined and dumb bass. Other companies put strategy that Indians only want that overpowered and full bass, but in these earphones, bass is awesome and also pleasing to ears which also allow other elements of the music to shine and let us experience the true meaning of music. A must buy if you enjoy every element of music
Title: Only For Those who really can feel the real depth of music

Review: If you are a biker please avoid this as the call answer button is situated near the neck and when u wear helmet u may or may nt be able to reach.The bass is deep. The headset SCREAMS basically increasing all functionalities.This does not have function of switching between devices like the non bass edition so think and buy.Return is allowed..
Title: READ AND DECIDE

Review: Worst quality.. Frequently disconnected.. Extra noise always heard during calls.. I have replaced 2 headset and both of them are so bad.. Initially I thought it was a defective product but the replacement also had the same issue.. now I finally requested for refund..
Title: Annoying Product

Review: The warranty of this product is for 1 year but it wont last that long. Mine stopped working on one side in just 3-4 months of purchase. I had to wait for a long time to get a replacement due to shops being closed in COVID lockdown. When I got it replaced, they gave me another faulty product which also lasted for 3-4 months and now the service center sent back a dead piece to me. It is absolutely unacceptable.
Title: Disappointment!

Review: For music and games it's best product. But where if we call someone that time it's really worst product.i have got this product at 7 June that day only1 hour environment noise cancellation is work properly after 1 hour enc not working. I have claimed for replace after few days when I call to someone it's again start problem which is disturbance like our voice is trembling. This problem is both side. Really it's bad experience for me as per this price. One plus should provide best product to their customers.
Title: Worst product 😡😡

Review: Dear sir.I have bought this product for attending meeting and my office work due to long battery backup and quick charging feature.this Brand popularity every on Know .So I know good brand.After using One months this product stop working.my use attending meeting every day 4-5 hours.1 year manufacturing warranty :Service centre are not supportive so how customer get the warranty.Please think once before buying. Its my personal experience  suggestion even wire headphone is better option.
Title: Wastage of money. this product losing one plus brand value .

Review: I always felt that one side of ear plug sounded higher than the other and sometimes audio will be too low even though I have turn full volume. Also while calling in crowded place I had difficulty in hearing otherside person.I had replace this device once, as I have recieved earlier one was faulty..only one side of ear plug was working. Last but not the least...within one year both ear plugs stopped working...I have to twist my ear plugs cord to hear audio...like we do with normal wired ear phones....
Title: Standard audio quality.and within an year it stopped working

Review: Not Bass Edition. Bullets Wireless Z is better. Used both bullets z edition and bass edition clearly normal edition is far better than bass edition. Also mic postion is changed bullets wireless z mic position was perfect.
Title: Not Bass Edition. Bullets Wireless Z is better

Review: These wireless One+ bullets are a great addition to my ever growing phone accessory universe! Perfect fit and great sound quality. Build quality in this price is good. If you for a studier construction go for a higher level earphones from One+
Title: Perfect gadget addition - Great Value for money

Review: The sound quality is quite amazing! I know a few people who do consider the brand BOAT ⛵ for bass quality but in my opinion, this is the best! They are really comfortable to the ears, great bass and superb connectivity. The magnet lock turns of the neckband and that's great as it does save a few milliseconds making you enjoy your content ASAP. Boat earphones disconnect when I'm in the next room but the OnePlus neckband doesn't let me down here! As the name suggests OP (OnePlus) it for sure is OP!
Title: Great for bass lovers!

Review: Product is Very good if u r looking for mireless bluetooth n connrct to yout smart tv.However disappointed that, i had to replace the original headset i recvd due to a defect and the replacement i received also has the same issue.I was also looking to get One plus fone but being not so good experience , i might think twice.
Title: Not so bad, Good option to connect  smart tv

Review: I am a user of one plus neck band from past one year and I should say it has been a very pleasant experience with it. But my recent purchase of neckband changed my opinion.I am using Redmi k20pro and I have a background crackling issue during few calls. Other person unable to here my voice clearly and vice versa.Looking like recent manufacturing batch might have some issue.So, consider it as caution and keep a check ok it.I should thank Amazon for its Hassel free return service.
Title: Crackling sound during calls. I thank Amazon for its hassel free return service.

Review: After using for 3 months, it's started giving problem. After conneting and dialing any number for voice call, other side person continuously hears crackling voice. Also, it gives problen while connecting with One Plus 6T! Need to try multiple times to connect.
Title: Crackeling voice on voice call, multiple try to connect with One Plus 6T

Review: I have been using the one plus bullets wireless z for almost 3 months now.I would like to point out few points:Sound quality: Sound quality is really really good. I had lots of faith on One Plus and they did an amazing job in thatNoise Cancellation: There is enough noice cancellation, to block off all chitter chatter around you while you are listening to music. Very loud noises can still be heard. Don't expect special noise cancellation at this price point, but its decent enough on these earphones.Bass Quality: Bass is really a very main point for choosing our headphones and earphones nowadays. Even though while I was having a dilemma reading the rest of the reviews, that the one plus bullets wireless z lacks in bass, I would like to go ahead and say confidently that, it's bass is just perfect, and you will love it. It's thump has been optimised so that you can hear for longer time. But I am pretty sure there are equalizers available in almost all smartphones and music apps, and with a slight twitch you will be able to get back the thump you want. When connected with laptops, the bass is just perfect. Don't worry about it just go for it.Mic Quality: I am just amazed at the microphone quality of the earphones, they are just awesome. From the moment I have started wearing these earphones I always prefer receiving calls over these only. Sound is just clear.Water resistant: Yes, it is sweat and dust resistant and I use it daily for sprinting (and workout), and I out of all people, sweat very much, and I have not yet seen any problems in the earphones because of coming in contact with my sweat.Overall: It is just an amazing product, you will love it, just go for it
Title: Long term review (After 3 months)

Review: After 10month 15day it stopped working when I request repair they picked and kept it for more then one month and the day when warranty got over then returned my earphone saying it's out of warranty. I complained customer care and it's again 27 day from the day I complaint. They are telling they are working on that, I finally left hope for this repair and buyed new earphone. Really one of the worst service provided by oneplus.
Title: Quality is good but service is worst.

Review: Comfort for calls and melody music. Bass is only 20% in overall sound quality. Quick switch feature not working. I have paired two device and when i click the multifunction key its not connected to another paired device. When we away from Bluetooth range for few hours and comes back to the range its not auto-reconnecting, we have to attach and detach again for re-connecting.
Title: Not recommended for Bass lovers

Review: Overall build quality is satisfactory, sound and bass met expectations, but bluetooth connectivity is terrible,After purchase of 1 week , this device is getting disconnected twice per day while playing music , movie , games etc. now it's use of six months I recommending as a user not wear it while sleeping , now the automatic disconnection problem getting stronger day by day,Try to buy OnePlus bullets wireless normal one (not bass edition).
Title: Bluetooth connectivity issue

Review: I don't buy again not a good product lots of improvement needed in quality of sound quality of product is gud my suggestion is don't buy this product not worthy product price is also high compared to quality of sound not for music lovers like me nothing is improved compare to old one i didn't expect from one+ this sound quality tottaly it deserves only 2 stars
Title: Deserves only 2 stars

Review: Very fast connection speeds. It connects almost instantaneously with OnePlus devices as well as Macs. The microphone quality is very clear and crispy. No adaptive noise cancellation tho. Lasts 6+ hours on a single 10 minutes charge.
Title: Best wireless earphones ever. Period.

Review: Best quality neckband....thuming and boom bass,clear trable,clear vocal,clear instrumental lovers go for this neckband....mic is very good and clear....all features well ballanced in this earphone....battery backup in call and 100% sound it will giving around 15 hours playback....very comfortable earbud..no irretating even you put in ear for long time..light weight and premium feeling to wear in neck....if company give anc support it will be the best option for buyer,i guess 60-70% noise canceling....overall from my side 👍
Title: Oneplus brand is enough .... close your eyes and buy it .. value for money product 👌

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 First impression after 2 hours of receiving(Will update later too)1 Excellent packaging2 Bass too gud3 Sound quality perfect clearly audible each  instrumentss ,vocals4 Audio quality a little compressed low is  heard on call even on full voice I don't  know why  It occurred5 I spend over a month in researching for a  Better earpeice among boat 441 ,realme  Q buds,mivi dupods m40 but all had some  or the other problem either connectivity  or bass or sound quality( I wanted earbuds  but 2k budget is less for it if they are  giving then you are compromising with  one or the other thing)I think I got the best of them thanks one plus .
Title: Beast of all qualities

Review: The worst product that I have ever purchased in my life, absolute trash, the sound quality is poor, randomly disconnects from the devices it's connected to.I have used one plus products before and am a huge fan of the quality of the products this particular earphones however has forever changed my opinion on OnePlus as brand, absolute garbage quality earphones with zero value for money.I strongly suggest that you look for an alternative than to waste your money on this.
Title: Please don't buy

Review: I got this earphones and I was using it very comfortably till today. It been just over 3 months not even 4 months. It stopped working all of sudden and didn't turn on. I am big fan of one plus and am still using one plus phones. I have been recommending to many of my friends This ear phones is really a crap and disappointment!! I won't suggest this to any one. Wasted 2000 rs on this product of one plus.
Title: Stopped working in 3 months

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 Cons• While listening to Music / Attending calls, there is a crackling noise in background.. Its really annoying.• I have recently upgraded to Bass edition, but its seems to be downgraded version of old Z versionIt doesnt have the "Quick switch button" to switching between devices (They are not mentioning this anywhere)• I am not satisfied with this Bass edition 🙁Pros.Design, Look, feel, Comfort
Title: Crackling Noise | No Quick Switch Button

Review: Nice Neckband but faulty product received battery is draining automatically but the sound quality is awesome.I got roughly 1 and  half hours music play time at 60% battery..And I replaced it and I found unsealed product in the replacement box..I ask Amazon for my refund but still waiting for a it...Overall Product is good but the service is not as expected refund my money and I buy it from tata cliq..Because I can't waste my so much time..
Title: Good product but Time wasting service..

Review: I bought the product a month ago.. was continuesly using it untill yesterday my mic working randomly, i have used boat wireless headset for arround 3 year and i haven't faced any problem like this from it.. now also its working fine... After i bought thia product i haven't used it even for a month now the mic is not working.. I DIDN'T EXPECT THIS KIND OF THINGS FROM A SUCH A NICE BRAND LIKE ONEPLUS.. I WONT SUGGEST THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE...
Title: Mic stoped working after 1 month

Review: Go for it....Don't think just buy it if you are searching for a nice gadget.I have bought reverb red version.Feel is premium and sound is awesome.You won't regret once you listen any song from this device.Bass =5/5Calling Voice = 5/5And yes don't trust on negative feedback
Title: Premium feel....Thumping Bass👌

Review: I can't believe it, just 15 days so many issues already. Not very good battery as claimed, poor sound and can you believe it disturbance in sound, yes that's right disturbance. I mean come on so poor quality.I am now never gonna use oneplus. AAAAAAA THHHHHUUUUUUU
Title: Total waste of money

Review: Really impressed by one plus packing, really feels like a quality product. Great battery backup, everything is to the point as the description mentions it. I removed a star because it doesn't perfectly stay in my ears while doing pushups, for rest tasks like walking, running, no problem. It could've held if its structure was a lil different or a firmer grip. So thats just a small thing, it doesn't matter because of the quality that one plus has provided. Go for it, worth the money spent.(Will update review after a month of useage)
Title: Comfortable, Quality Packing, Just a minor bug

Review: Bass was too much for my liking.Because of that i think vocals felt lower. I like to focus more on vocals more in general.Everything else is great. I returned it and bought the normal edition altough.Also,note that Bass edition ones sound louder than the normal ones and has that thumping bass.That's the only difference in sound.Also i noticed that they were not as comfortable as my old anker earphones but I feel for the price, they deliver a lot more. I use them througout the day
Title: Good product

Review: Very good earphones. Good bass. But if you can increase budget little more, i would recommend realme wireless 2. One plus buds pains in ear after some time. While realme had silicon buds and very soft. Also sound of balanced with good bass in realme.
Title: Very good, but...

Review: Sound is excellent with heavy bass. Absolutely value for money but the mic issue started after like days. I can't clearly hear anything during call. Cracking & rattling sounds all the time during call. Otherwise during listing to music it's enjoyable.
Title: Excellent product but with mic issue

Review: I don't know why One plus decided to remove the quick switch button and the inline mic button controls. Just for cost cutting?Since i have been habitual of using quick switch button while switching in between different devices, i find it irritating to go do it in every devices bluetooth settings.Sound quality is a good value for money no doubt.Be careful with the wire as it tends to break with time.
Title: I would still go for regular edition

Review: Everything is good except battery backup, company assured 10 mins charge for 10 hours backup but it's not. It's upto 6-7 hours.Sound quality is best you never feel like you are using wireless headphones.It's very much reliable for talk.Easily connected or disconnected, magnetic control saves too much energy and provide better feasibility.It's wire is little thick that given assurance for non breakable.So overall I found everything. If you have budget Go for it.Thanks
Title: Cool and Feasible

Review: This is my opinion After ten days used it.its hardware is not good. After ten days used it .it's volume key is falled . another issue is changing if it charge 80% show full charge I think OnePlus should work on its hardware and sound is awesome and bass is awesome if someone wants to purchase in my opinion you can buy another Bluetooth try mi or realme .if any issues in this bluetooth I can most explain in future because OnePlus is unique I heard somewhere but my product is totally worst.in15 days I reviewed this product again it's about sound bass and noise cancellation.I can review its charging time.at this time I use it 12 hours not 18 to 20 hours
Title: I use it 12 hours not 18 to 20 hours

Review: Fitting is not upto the mark Causes pain to ear after longer use .Connectivity is ok if you are using oneplus phone it provides better connectivity.Sound 4/5There is some glitch with i noticed it bliped couple of times while hearing music.
Title: Oppo enco m31 is more rich when compared with sound and comfort.p

Review: When I first bought, it was replaced as I received the demage product, after which I received the replacement. But now the voice from one side stopped coming and and from other side very less volumeI said it has 1 year warranty but I am unable to find any optionAs my earphones still under warranty please provide me with refund, repairing or replacing of these earphones
Title: After replacing in once after 5 months it stopped working again

Review: Sound is good and super high bass but sound quality of Oppo Enco M31 is better . great battery backup .Final conclusion - If u want great battery backup and listen to very volume with lot of bass then go for it .If u want a great experience in music with a slight less battery backup and bass , then go for Oppo enco m31 as i have used both the products .
Title: Depends upon your priority .

Review: WOW. Just Wonderful  i loved it At the very sight of the packing  The content is wonderful.Sound quality is excellent Feel  of the product  is NiceI liked the small charging cable given alongThanks Amazon for a early delivery .
Title: No words just wonderful

Review: Sound quality and call quality is superb man but wait nothing is perfects so here's some con bass is not that great you will get more bass in boat earphones even at 1200 but remember basss is not everything and also battery is just 15 to 16 hrs which is good for me but as I know competition even gives you 30  40 hrs backup so why I bought them because I love their music quality(out of this world) and for battery just ten minutes charge all it takes to give 10 hrs so I think oneplus gives you quality product at this range
Title: Worth it

Review: Worst product ever...Don't buy thisI have ordered this productAnd with in 2 months this neckband gives very low volume sound cracking and during call second person are not able to listen clear voiceDuring my meeting  Bluetooth automatically unpaired and paired againThis happen multiple timesI gave this product for repair in one plus care they just picked my product and gave after 3 weeks and same problem happening again...Very worst productWorst serviceThe only big name but poor service and productDon't buy..
Title: Worst product ever...

Review: I purchased this item on April 2021. Before this i had an ant w56. I feel both earphones had a simlar output quality even the w56 only cost ~500rs (wired earphone).The point is, don't expect very deep bass from this oneplus earphones. sound is very much balanced and there is no distortions in high volumes and the battery backup is around 1.5 days(for me atleast).  Also There is no connectivity issues.Happy with this product 😌.
Title: Perfect earphones with well balanced sound output.

Review: Great product got it for Rs. 1,799.Decent bass, great music quality. Great mic quality even outdoors.Good for calling.Good built quality.Great battery life.Overall good product.
Title: Great Product

Review: When i connect with my phone audio quality was not good,Not supported with samsung M21 phone, but when i connected this with my friend's oneplus phone that time audio quality supporting with good quality.This product only support for oneplus devices.
Title: This product is not support for Samsung M21.

Review: Hi,Please read this review before buying. I have been using this ear phones for the past 2 months and their has been a very big problem in these headphones, the problem is noise during calls. When I am talking to someone they hear noise but when you switch to speaker or phone mode this problems mitigate. This is very common problem and you can search about it on google. This problem get solved by factory reset of earphone, but it helps only for one call which is very frustrating. Go for simple edition I think this problem do not occur in them.
Title: IMPORTANT

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 1. My headphone draining very fast from estimated time by company or published by Amazon.2. The reception coverage is very poor.Amazon packaging and delivery was good. Returning product.Regards
Title: Poor Battery back up and reception coverage.

Review: The battery life is longgg, has a type C charging, so recharges quickly. Nlise cancelation is awesome and bass quality unbeatable. The best part is that battery remains aame as ever even after long term uses and is comfortable to the ears.
Title: Best pair

Review: This is my first OnePlus buyAll sound, build quality ok but stop working with in 24hour🤔.Amazed! My bad luck or manufacturing quality issue. Hope replacement pic will work atleast one year.So far I am using Sony bluetooth earphones for last 2yr no complain. Even no wear tear.
Title: Stop working in 24 hour

Review: The overall product is nice.But just keep in mind that when you are purchasing the special edition earphones, it doesn't have the the switch button which is deal-breaker according to me. But nonetheless, the sound quality and battery backup is quite good. I will suggest to purchase the normal OnePlus wireless Z and not the reverb reb ones.
Title: Overall Good Product

Review: • It is not even a year it has started giving me trouble pairing with phone.• Product was submitted to service center it took around 8 days and I received product with some repairs..Note: Under repair my earphones just reset and sent me back. You can get such basic troubleshooting on YouTube these days.I have Oneplus Bullet Z without bass edition earphones.. I will give 5 ⭐ stars for that product because its still intact..Please make wise decision and chose your product just dont go by considering just brand.
Title: Be wise and make a choice

Review: they are nice for the price range but sometimes the led light doesn't work quite right. The Lows could have been better at this price range though... Also, I believe OP should develop Type C earphones other than wireless, I guess many would buy it.!!
Title: Nice deal

Review: Sound quality and build is okay. But feeling cheated by Amazon and One Plus as there is no physical quick switch button in this, the much required feature. Also, there is no return only replacement is possible. Looks like Amazon and One Plus are already aware of this and that is why not return is there.Didn't expected this from Amazon and One Plus.
Title: Feeling Cheated

Review: Overall product is good. Nicely packed by amazon.Main cons is : Noise cancellation. Not upto the markIt's like an average earphone.Bass is good 👍Calling experience is far better than other earphones which i have used .If u r going only for calling purpose ...u may go aheas with it.
Title: Noice cancellation need to improve a lot.

Review: Only 1 week working properly..now completely not working..I was so much disturbed taking this branded OnePlus wireless bluetooth..my phone also onplus7 it's amazing..but bluetooth not branded..I diaponted
Title: Not working

Review: If you have used boat rockerz 255, you will definitely not like the bass of this headphones.But it is way better than one plus normal edition.Likes:-Battery life-Noise cancellationDislike:-Takes time to turn ON, if magnets are connected and you are receiving a call,it will take atleast 3 to 5 seconds to connect.-BassOverall ,good headphones in this budget with one plus branding.
Title: Bass is good,but not like boat rockerz 255.

Review: I've purchased this product From Amazon and I'm using this earphone with my Redmi Note 7 Pro. In starting it was all fine but after using 20 days, I started getting some crackling sound while calling someone (You and the other person both will hear some mixed noise)I went to One Plus store and they told me that we'll check if the issue exist we'll replace it but they told me we've checked it with Samsung phone and they haven't found any issue 😑 and now I'm stucked with this fake product. It's a total scam. Just buy it.
Title: Don't Buy it.

Review: The Company Replied to one persone that they offer Quick Switch like in the non bass version but the actually don't give you anything like that.The only thing you can do is disconnect your one device and then pair with the other which is different from quick switch which automatically switch devices on long press.Company should make this clear in the description.
Title: Don't have Quick Switch Button !!

Review: It's worth for the money I should say.It's wrap charging and back up is what attracted me and I am not disappointed.Sound quality is good enough. Noise cancelation is average.OP promised to deliver its quality in built.The Z buds connects in a blink of an eye.
Title: Value for money

Review: Can't imagine what the bass is like on the regular, non-bass edition. I can hear the bass on these, but only faintly. Slightly disappointed. The drums are kind of annoying and in-your-face; so, watch out for that. If you are sound-sensitive, you may not like loud drums too much. Of course, there is always an equalizer option.Okay, technology-wise, it's great! It connects pretty quickly to devices. Although, the LACK OF QUICK CONNECT BUTTON is also disappointing.
Title: "Bass" Edition?

Review: Bass is excellent, battery life is good, a bit confusing with operations at the beginning, my other wireless earphones gives a voice at on/off, but this gives just a sound, that too a bit confusing whether it is on/off
Title: Good

Review: After three weeks only crackling sound in the background started. Can't talk on phone at all using this earphone. Even the battery backup is so bad unlike the older version of OnePlus Bullets Wireless. Worst earphone I have ever used. Very very disappointed never expected this cheap quality of product from OnePlus. Lost faith in the company.
Title: WARNING!!!!⚠️ DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT

Review: I dont recommend to go for this if you're really needed for calls, it was working for few days after started the making noise in ongoing call. I just searched for resolutions in the one plus community and found so many people facing the similar issue. Also I did troubleshoot as suggested but issue is not resolved.But the sound quality is good, my requirement is only for calls that too it supports noise cancellation
Title: Getting too much noise in the call

Review: I am using OnePlus devices from long time. I like the quality of their products. This neck band ergonomics are good as per compared to my previous neckband like Mivi collar and Mivi Thunderbeats. But audio quality it’s better  Mivi Collar. In full charge of battery you can hear music 6-8 hours with 40-60%of volume. In the beginnings I was skeptical about the life of the wire, but it’s good.
Title: Good ergonomics but less battery life

Review: Sharing this review after 1 day of use, will make it short nd simple--amazing connectivity-good range-super fast charging, charges to 100% within minutes.-super light-amazing audio quality, for those who are complaining about bass- i didn't find any issue with that. I am using this with samsung A8 star and trust me, it's amazing!!Final word -Go for it, dnt even think abt any other option. Good job by oneplus!!
Title: Absolute beast and the best!!!

Review: The ear buds keep falling off the ear..I thought considering the price they should have given different size bud coversm I changed it to smaller one, but still keeps falling off ears..doesn't fit well.
Title: Ok product, pricey

Review: Very fine and very good bass and soundBut the noise cancellation is not up to the markThe battery performance is also you can hear near about 19-20 hours on 50 to 60 percent volumeThe multifunctions keys are good and easily controllableThat's it It is one of the best product and go ahead to buy
Title: Best bass and Sound

Review: At this price range u barely get a product like this with great build quality ,nice and sleek design ,great battery backup, comfortable neck band, light weight ,10 minute fast charging promised but i hardly find it helpful take longer time to charge fully/***Only con i have been facing  is connectivity issues with iphones, u have to reconnect for almost every time u get a new phone call . Moreover earpieces couldn't be so comfortable for everyone***/
Title: Only con i have been facing.....!

Review: The ear phone started troubling after four monthsof purchase. One side of ear phone did not workand today when I went to service centre there wereAt least 30 odd sets of same defect.Apart from thisOthers who had visited the service centre had similar issues.
Title: Handicapped Earphone

Review: Good product for calling, noise cancellation is better, bass is avarage,build quality is excellent, batter drains fast, if you want for only listen  music than don't buy this product
Title: Best for calling, not for music lovers

Review: I have tried lot of neckbands and can definitely tell you that these are the best in the price segment they fall. Amazing battery life amazing performance. The sound is well balanced I didnt even had to use equalizer to set the sound.I had been in love with these earphones from the time I heard normal edition ones. There are few better features on the normal edition like the quick switch, +3hours of battery and a closer microphone.But honestly both are decent sounding earphones.
Title: Just Go For It

Review: Ordered Reverb red but got bass blue. Nonetheless, the earphone is good. It seals quite well and therefore there's nice passive noise cancellation. The sound output is also quite good. Charging and battery time is as advertised.
Title: Good product, go for it

Review: भाई देखो साफ साफ बताता हूं.... आवाज़ तो बहुत अच्छी नही है-ये कड़वी सच्चाई है क्रेनकलिंग कि आवाज़ भी आती है....अच्छाई यह कि #पैकेजिंग अच्छी है #पेयरिंग अच्छी है #बैटरी 8-10h. #नॉइज़ कैंसलेशन भी अच्छा है..मैंने इसे ₹1760 में लिया है...अब आपके उपर है।1महीने बाद एक नई समस्या-जैसे आपका ईरफ़ोन फ़ोन से कनेक्ट है और आप थोड़ी देर कुछ नही चलाये....तो कभी कभी आवाज़ गायब हो जाती है जिसे ईरफ़ोन बंद करके या ब्लूएटूथ री-कनेक्ट करने पर आवाज़ वापस आ जाती है/धन्यवाद🙏🙏🙏
Title: काम चलाऊ है भाई लोग...Expectation high मत रखना

Review: I am having problem with the crackling sound during calls and service center is not fixing this problem as when they connect with their device, it works fine but the problem is they tested it for 20 mins... But the problem comes after some hours of usage. Atlast the conclusion given by them is that you problem in your device... And i bought a new Mi11x. So i am very much dissappointed by the oneplus service.. I will never ever buy oneplus product again and I will not recommended anyone to buy oneplus either.
Title: Crackling sound during calls.

Review: I had a very bad experience with it. After 1-2 month of use, it starts problem like it automatically gets disconnected and connected again and it continues. It doesn't stop even after disconnecting from the device and connecting again. Since it has been just 4 months for using it, and now a background humming noise starts comming during the call, listening music, and for any other use as well. This product isn't worthy of 2000 rupees.
Title: Very bad experience

Review: The product is pretty good as expected, but the wire is a bit lengthy and since the wire starts from the end of the band and is lengthy it doesn't look good while using. Performance wise it's good. Where as the samsung level u's cord startts from around the middle of the band and so the wire doesn't look bad while using, but doesn't provide such sound experience
Title: Pretty good

Review: I had skullcandy before these and it continuously got problems and replaced it 3-4 times.After some research I got these headphones.Sound Quality is good.Though the battery life mentioned is more but it seems it isnt more than the skullcandy I owned.Bass is decent.No bluetooth issues which I had with skullcandy. And decent range.Overall a decent pair of earphones for the price of 2000/-
Title: Good Overall

Review: After lot of research and doubt bought this and like a wishband all problems solved. Beleive me will not be disappointed after the purchase . Baap of all headphones in the price range. Battery superb , min 10 days with 8 hrs of on and off usage. Original magnetic operation not just showoff. Minor lag but thats acceptable while buds are separated and it reconnects automatically.
Title: The solution to all headphone requirements

Review: Having countious problem with Bluetooth while on call it's get wierd noise  disturbance noise which make is impossible to use on call...it happening even after replacing the headset ....while my friend also had same but with different color that's not having any disturbance issue while on call.
Title: Disturbance while on call

Review: I wrote this review after 4 month use.oneplus is very reputed company but it cheated me. After 4 month use one of it's ear bud not working (no sound). I sent one plus bullets wireless z bass edition for repair because it was in warranty and there was no any physical damage. After 20 days care centre sent me that bluetooth device after cutted and said that this is physically damaged.If this type of theft do by these reputed company how can people buy his products. How can people believed in this company.very shameful for Oneplus care center.
Title: Very shameful for oneplus company.

Review: Best product in this price range.The texture of the headphone is rubber thats hands on filling is very good like premium headphone.also the head phone is light weight so thats why in ear experience is good. in this product they provide type c port for charging and warp charge tecnology for fast charging thats quite good in daily life use.and this headphone battery backup are very good.overall best product.
Title: Best headphone in this price range

Review: This product is very good at all. It has a powerful bass, good sound quality and about noise cancilation it is better than avarage. Its back is made up of rubbric material whic makes it light and can be used for outdoor. If you are a gamer then also its a good choise because i ve played many games with it and i dont fell sound delay like it is also good for gaming. The battery life is op. Must buy , they are providing value for money. So if you think to buy it you can go for it.
Title: Must buy , very good product

Review: Good for listening to music, maybe better than many others in this range/type.Making phone calls or attending online meetings through these earphones is absolutely bad and unusable, too much of constant static noise, neither party can hear and complain of constant noiseResetting the earphones help but that has to be done each time and as such not a solutionExpected more out of these earphones usability wise.
Title: Static noise

Review: It's pretty good for the price you are paying.You can easily get it for around 1799 inr on sale or on OnePlus official site by applying 200 inr off cupon.1. These buds offer great sound quality for the price2. You can charge it for 10 minutes and these buds will last you for about 7-10 hrs.3. Has great mic quality.4. No active noise cancellation it's Passive Noise Cancellation.5. It works best with OnePlus smartphones.If you are looking to buy wireless earbuds then these are one of the best for the price.
Title: The best for the price

Review: Oneplus have been a good brand. but this product is to up to the standard. it stops working after few months. Raised the complaint about repair and that already took 20 days since I gave it still waiting for a response and there is no update from Onplus side on my product. poor after-sale service. Worst customer care. Go for BOAT- less price and great product.
Title: Dont Buy it- Stop working after few months

Review: why it is downgrade:1. less battery life(around 10 hours which is lesser than 18 hour of normal one).2. quick switch feature is missing ("center button hold" quick button is just a gimmick and nowhere near the OG quick switch feature)Only pron is increased base.
Title: It is downgrade of its own product(oneplus bullet 2(simple version))

Review: Everytime you make a call, the bluetooth gets disconnected. Connecting to bluetooth is not so fast either, it takes time to get connected. Its very frustrating at times. It. doesn't work at times, even when it is connected.Update after 6months of usage: Sometimes, there is a crackling sound or grains noise. Left earpiece has stopped working.
Title: Poor connectivity and earpiece stopped working

Review: Sound quality was excellent and battery was getting full charged within 10mins. Power off and Power on switch was not given, it'll switch on by simply attaching the left and right wire ends with magnetic support
Title: Sound quality was excellent

Review: Using it for almost 3 weeks now. No issue faced. Oneplus should have had given 2 devices connection or a toggle switch to do the same.Also my bluetooth gets disconnected whenever i am on call for a few seconds and then connects again. Similar thing happened once when i was listening to music on Wynk app. Do not yet know what can be the possible issue as it has never happened while watching a video or youtube or while playing games.Does anyone else has faced this issue?
Title: Good Product but facing some connection issue during calls. Rest all is good.

Review: Writing the review after 5days of usage:Pros:Built quality is very good.Its good for calls and music both.Battery backup is also very good.Magnetic buds to turn off and on is also nice, it also helps to extend battery life.Cons:I found its fitting is up to the mark, there is some scope of improvement.Earphones are falling when you are running.Overall, this is very nice product in this price range.
Title: Nice product in this price range.

Review: There is a crackling sound when something is played or while adjusting the volume.So i made a replacement assuming the product had some defect.But when received the new one it was also having the same crackling sound in between.Very disappointing from such a good brand.The sound,bass and build quality is good.But the this particular ‘One plus Z bass’ item is having some serious technical issue.
Title: Serious technical issue which is identical even after replacing!!

Review: Not a value deal, everything sound, material and battery backup is good but the overall product was not long lasting. One side low sound or one sides bud not working at all this issue comes within 4-5 months only.I have replaced it two times in 8 months and again it was not working one side...So 1900 is two much for only 1 year product on headphones...Find out another one not long lasting product from one plus..In service center only Bluetooth zIssue come (at least 90% customer were for Bluetooth issue).
Title: Quality

Review: OnePlus making you fool very bad product in with his sound quality Reduced to 50% better go for boat products The battery life is also not very great buying it is like great loss of money better not to go on this product search something better
Title: Very cheap quality OnePlus makes u a fool

Review: Believe me this Bluetooth neckband give you new feel to sound without any distortion.Bass super, awesome boom bass...Vocals clearTrebles clearNote: your mobile hardware depends which type of sound produced by your mobileSpecially vivo in Bluetooth hardware not so goodMi, realme, one plus and oppo have Bluetooth v5.0 + dolby atmos.If your mobile hardware below Bluetooth 5.0 so you can't enjoy the bass and sound also
Title: Super sound and awesome bass for bass lovers

Review: It worked fine for 1 month. And then it stopped working. I reseted it. Then it won't even turn on. Tried every method according to the manual. But, couldn't turn this thing on. It frequently had connection issues. For rs.2000, i expected a good product. Disappointed.
Title: Stopped working.

Review: I was stupid enough to buy this product when people were already saying in the reviews there is a crackling sound coming I have replaced once and got a new one still same problem found a solution on you tube 'reset' but the problem comes again after some hours of time believe me please don't go for this product like I did thinking that mine will work fine
Title: Don't Buy you will regret it

Review: This bluetooth device is amazingly good, I have personally for listening music, for my Google meets, while riding to attend calls and Also in rains to talk on call while riding.It works perfectly fine and smooth. I would not suggest to delibrately use it while raining. But whenever I have used it while its raining, it has performed well and have'nt faced any issues til now.
Title: Go For It If You Are A ONE PLUS lover

Review: The only drawback of the bass edition is that it doesn't have any quick switch button as mentioned in the details. Apart from this, everything about thid product is perfect. The quick connect tech that ensures a connection in merely 4-5 seconds, magnetic controlled on/off mode, sound quality, noise cancellation etc are everything perfect. The bass output is exceptional. If you have 2k in your pocket, then this is for you.
Title: Exceptional

Review: I've been using them for over few months now.its a good headphones, charge superfast. I used it for office calls for not that great for hearing good quality music. Its not bad either. Basically bass quality is not that great.
Title: Good gor regular office purpose calls.

Review: It has excellent sound quality, previously I am using JBL, it is better than JBL.But when it comes to battery backup I am not satisfied, company claims of 17 hours, but I use to get 7-8 hours at 60% volume.Charging is really quick.Overall Good.Must buy Under 2000
Title: Excellent sound Quality but...

Review: The Product WAS good. I Purchased this Item On 24th Nov but All Of Sudden Right Hand Side Earbuds Was Not working Properly means The Sound Automatically down But at The Same Tym Left Side sound Out put was Good. TODAY ON dated 08.12.20 this Earphone Makes Me Sad Becuz Of This Problm. And I Found No Return policy Also provided By The seller.
Title: Sound Output was Great but I Hardly Used It For 15 a days.

Review: Mere nackband ke charo wire joint ki rubber wire apne aap nikal gye n joint se liquid bhi nikalne lgaJb service center le gya to bole aapne kharab kr diya to koi replacement nhi hogaAger kharab hota to ek wire ka joint hota but nhi unko to apna plla jhadana thaBakwaas service center.....Yehi bolunga use n throw lena hai to okWrna apna paisa kharab na kre......
Title: Good product but Ghatiya service

Review: I've used Oppo enco m31 & Sony WI C200.Connectivity & Battery back-up is good.At low battery opposite person in call couldn't hear my voice properly!Sound quality & Bass is worst while comparing with other 2 neckbands.. First I received without extra Earbuds I returned & Now noticed distortion noice in right side speakers!From my perspective it's over rated product!Not worth of 2K
Title: Don't buy if you're a music lover

Review: Everything is as required but once not working then no one in this world is gonna help you. I myself raised complaint in consumer form but dont take my advice don't go for oneplus. No warranty claim from the company for water resistance they only show for the advertising
Title: Poor product with very poor customer service

Review: Got defected piece. Bought this headphone on 11th jan 2020 and on 24 Jan 2020 the headphone stopped charging which eventually led them to die,out of battery.Also at the same time i'am unable to return this product to amazon because  the return policy got obsoleted on 18th of Jan 2020.Sound quality is good but brand realibility and build quality is not upto the mark.Therefore I recommend everyone to go for other less expensive brands.
Title: Got defected piece.

Review: Respected sir or mam, I bought a 1+ wireless bluetooth bass edition red and black a month ago it was good at the beginning I had a trip from Coimbatore to chennai through two wheeler I was hearing songs from the left end and the other end was just hanging over the shirt when I reached chennai and went to my apartment I noticed the right end of my headphone got shrunk from the heat I think I never thought it'll shrink from the heat at all can I have a replacement please I also remember it said 1 year warrenty so for that atleast please replace my headphone sir or mam. I hear songs a lot so headphone is something so important to me can you please replace my item.  Thank you.
Title: Please replace my last order

Review: I had ordered these during the Republic Sale. It has great features like Bluetooth 5.0 and Quick Charge. Bass is good too. The main issue that I had was that the bluetooth did not Turn On after the first charge. Tried resetting but to no avail. Hence, ordered a replacement.The replacement suffered the same issue. The earphones do not turn on at all even at the full battery and I am returning the replacement as well.If you get lucky with a good pair, its a good product otherwise.
Title: Good and Value for money only if you are lucky to get the product in the Working Condition.

Review: I bought bass edition thinking bass would be goodAlthough they have good features and work perfectly with my oneplus 7 but what is the use if sound quality is low and bass isn't goodDidn't expect this from oneplus
Title: Its a bass edition white doesn't has bass at all

Review: After 7 months of use its right ear stopped working. And its too disgusting  beacuse it hadn't scratches or broken history suddenly  just stopped while iam hearing.more than the money I believed  in the product value of oneplus.and this incident make me disappointe me very well.iam a sound perfection guy,I want a good quality when watching movies or hearing songs .Now I have only one left ear And  doesn't go well ,sooner I buy an earphone but in my life time am never gonna buy any oneolus product.i lost all my confidence on this
Title: 7 months usage

Review: Its been 9 months after purchase and the wire got cut near the speaker. Dont go with bass edition ,coz the previous edition wires are thick and strong. Couldn't do any service or claim warranty as it comes under physical damage.Dont know whats the advantage of going with branded neckband ,as even they dont provide service for earphone.Please go with some other brands with prices less for better quality than oneplus
Title: Poor wire quality

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I like connectivity, it's fast but after 6 days Bluetooth connectivity light stops blinking and device visibility gone. Factory reset not functioning, then I replace it now I upload photo and video of replaced device. Will upload review after 10 days.Thanks guys bye!!
Title: Bluetooth connectivity is fast but after three days, light stop blinking.

Review: Omg! What an amazing product my gf she gifted me this and i must say this is the best base Bluetooth I've ever heard in this price range and sound quality is lovely see OnePlus is doing an amazing job and best thing is charging. Just plugin for 10min and you're good to go for an entire day if heavy use if not then 2 day max but 10min of charging if you have OnePlus adapter.Guys if you're looking within 2k don't think twice just purchase it this is bang onn.
Title: My gf gifted me and ...

Review: Product is good ,earlier I was not able to understand the power on/off technology of this device.Now I came to know it is working by magnet touches the power will off and vice versa.And sorry the returned device is also working fine all is my mistake to understand the device functionality.Overall it is a worth buy , Appreciate Amazon for hassle free return policy
Title: Overall good device

Review: Purchased this product on 02-Jul-21 and it is stopped working on 03-Sep-21. Initially I was satisfied with the headset though it has norwal audio quality as my intention is to use for calls. All of sudden it is stopped working while using and then unable to switch on. No led indicates. It is dead. Now I have to chase the customer support to see if this can be replaced under warranty.It is not a reliable product so I suggest not to choose this product.
Title: Worst product - Shouldn't trust the OnePlus

Review: Got spoiled in 3 months. The sound quality and everything is just “okay”. There are better ones you can buy from BOAT or any other. The headphones are my second purchase, maybe something wrong with the red colored ones. Buy with caution.
Title: Stopped Working in 3 months

Review: This is an amazing neckband to consider when your budget is less than 4000 . Though it costs only 1999 it gets a variety of flagship functions. The sound is crystal clear with a nice bass. It has a balanced sound. The red and black colour combination too flaunts in itself. I am loving it.
Title: Superb!!

Review: Pros:1. it's a one plus product which is a brand2. Good packagingCons:1. Overpriced2. You can buy earpods of boat in such price or less3. Entangled a lot4. Normal noise just like a ordinary one
Title: Overpriced hype product

Review: One side went bad within few weeks.Then the wire came out which gave mild electric shocks.OnePlus doesn't provide replacement warranty like others do, and refused to cover if damaged.Had to throw it in the dustbin, the rightful place a earphone like this belongs.
Title: Worst quality at this price range

Review: Even though the hype and expectations are very high.It doesn’t perform as well as it should be considering the price point.You will hear cracking sound, it is the most worst thing in any Bluetooth earphones or headphones.That cracking sound will definitely screw up your whole music listening experience.I will definitely recommend other Bluetooth neckbands which are lower in the price over this thing.But the bass is decent.
Title: Don’t waste your money on this product.

Review: Absolute piss poor product. Bluetooth keeps disconnecting. Deosnt switch on at times. Switching off and switching on bluetooth time is more than listening to anything from it. Being a OnePlus user for years and this being the 3rd earphone device I'm owning - tbis is just sad quality. I can't even return sucha poor product. Please don't buy!! Let down product.
Title: Buy to switch on and switch off bluetooth rsther than listening to music from this

Review: Very good product, Sound quality is great, well balanced, vocals clarity nice, loudness great, and all mids, lows and highs are also well balanced.., build quality very good and charging time is just 20 mons and back up is also great,Cons- There is no as such cons in this device but one thing that I feel that it's not comfortably fit in ears, the size of the ear-cup a little bit bigger but the weight is not heavy its light weight, but not very comfortable at all..At last, it is a must buy product at this price point...
Title: You can't get better choice than this at this price point

Review: Oneplus bullet wireless🤘🤘 z:These r one of the most best and most used neckband in the market. Also these r my first oneplus product.Things I like: Good sound qualityMic is superb and best for callsGood quality of neckband 💯Easy pairing. Just separate the  two magnets to on the neckband and close the two magnets to off itThings I don't like: bass is not that much goodFinal: Go for it!!
Title: It's an Good neckband but bass is lagging

Review: This is one of the best Neckband under 2000 rs. The sound quality is truely awesome. The Bass is main reason you buy this Neckband and it gives alot of great bass . The Neckband is of Silicon Material which is very light in weight and you don't know that there is Neckband in your neck.Battery is very awesome . Runs 4-5 Days when Fully charged .I will give it 5/5 stars .I will suggest that you should buy this Neckband .This worths your money 💰 .
Title: Best Neckband in 2000 INR

Review: Bullets Wireless Z(Bass edition Red) - Excellent product which strikes a fine balance between battery life and sound quality. Practically, this is almost close to a wired headset. Never ran out of battery in the middle of something important which is uncommon for a wireless headset considering my bitter experiences in the past. Thumbs Up👍! With OnePlus warp charger, time to charge is minimal too. Not sure how this fares without a warp charger. Sound quality is decent(if not great). Worth buying!
Title: [Battery Life] and [Sound Quality] - Very Well Balanced!

Review: Its good for bass songs only. Normal conversation, movies, videos etc. will also be slightly heard with bass effect. If you are willing to customize equalizer setting in your phone,, your purpose will not be 100% solved. Because you know for classical songs you set equalizer on classical mode,, it won't sound like classic it'll have bass majorly.If you're bass lover it's perfect for you.If Amazon is giving me refund I'm ready to cancel the order.
Title: Only for bass

Review: The headset sells just because it's OnePlus is the most apt review for this product.Poor quality microphone, high disturbance for the person listening to you on call under any circumstance, indoor or outdoor.Know multiple people who have faced the same issue.The service center folks have also acknowledged that the earphones having these manufacturing defects is quite common for this product.
Title: Overpriced inferior product

Review: Defects prody delivered new one with scratches.But good this return policy and immediately sending new one .I'm using OnePlus mobile after seeing OnePlus earphones reall shocked this kind of products how they delivered
Title: Defect or used  product delivered

Review: Guys don't trust these earphones as their sound quality is good but their built quality is too poor.Earphone just got separate from right ear.Red wire got separated form black joint.Such poor build quality i have never seen anywhere at huge price.Please don't buy those.I genuinely request you it will waste of your money and they will not provide any warranty as they will call it as physical damage.
Title: Poor build quality.

Review: Nothing to like in this product. Frequently disconnection, other side person doesn't get clear sound, too much of noise. Useless in zoom calls as auto connection doesn't happen once disconnected and have reconnect call even because of it. Worst experience with a headphone. I do not recommend for one plus headphone now. Note: I am using it with one plus 5T. And had expected smooth connectivity and sound. Cheap product.
Title: Not worthy at all and useless for calling

Review: I really liked the build quality and sound quality seriously well it is worth the price noise cancellation is pretty good too and bass quality is just excellent on this price point but the only thing i dont like about this headphone is that if you are on call when you play music or games the sound goes from stereo to mono and sound quality decreases wether its phone call or discord call that's the only thing i dont like and in my phone (one plus 8 pro) there no latency at all i dont feel any delay and that's it for my review i hope it helps you ;)
Title: Sound quality is really well balanced between bass and treble really worth the price 🔥

Review: Good sound and connectivity but the only con is that it does not work well with WhatsApp calling and even some other calling apps like imo and sometime instagram.. I think it's a bug because I've seen alot of complaint regarding this issue
Title: Great

Review: Battery life is just outstanding. The sound quality was clear but the bass was not that good even though I bought the (bass edition). For bass I would rate 3.5. In bass edition we would expect more than this. The pause and play option takes 1.5 second to act. My recent earphones were jbl endurance run bluetooth. It has a bit more bass compared to bullet wireless but the quality of sound is better in oneplus bullet wireless. But never the less for 2000.
Title: Good for the price range.

Review: Did not expect this from one plus:The product keeps on giving me crackling sound. It goes only when switched off and switched on. I can not keep on doing that all the time. Worst experience from one plus
Title: Did not expect this from one plus:

Review: I found crackling sound when i connect to laptop and TV. So I am replaced it. When i received the second product i was shocked to know that it's a fake item completely ! packaging was different and quality as well !This was not expected from oneplus and amazon ! actually it's done by the mediators in between the company and customers and company should take actions regarding this !
Title: Neckband sound has some crackling sound in background !

Review: Pathetic experience wid this is one. It was working fine for two months and then stopped working like not supprting charging n no sound. The service centre is also very disappointing, its already been more than 15 days but after many call attemts they r giving no clue how long it ll take to repair the product. Wud have bought realme or boat they r way better than this.
Title: total waste of money on the name of oneplus they r fooling us their servicing is also worst

Review: The first time i ordered i have got nonsealed and damaged incorrect cheap product..i was very annoyed..later i ordered replacement and got the sealed one which is quite decent...check the seal and product aswell before accepting coz the box was original but the inside product was wrong and cheaap quality.BEWARE OF FRAUDULENT ACTIVITIES
Title: BEWARE OF FRAUDULENT ACTIVITIES

Review: Worst wireless earphone ever bought in my life within 6 months started showing connectivity issues, bluetooth stopped working and OnePlus service is the worst I don't why they claim they have the best customer service, on the other hand other earphone company have pickup and drop facility.here I'm waiting for 1 week to get my Earphone repair or replace. There's no response from customer care service they don't pick up your call. Worst service!!
Title: Please don't buy look for another company products

Review: Just what you need to listen to music. Not so much for calls but it does the job. It is easy to set up and pairing was almost immediate. Really nice quality and fits well. Only thing I thought was the wires are a bit longer than I am used to, but that is okay and I can live with it. Magnetic off is also really helpful.
Title: Not disappointed

Review: The battery life if not stellar as advertised, but it’s good. Lasts for 6 hrs of playback.Charging not as dramatic, but charges fast.Sound quality is good and comfort is also very good.Calls/Mike quality is good as well.Overall no regrets in purchasing this. Highly recommend it, but don’t go by PR numbers.
Title: Most Comfortable and Convenient Bluetooth earphones at very good price.

Review: Using the product from past three months the bass quality is really up to the mark and sound quality is really great.Noise cancellation also works fine with the build in quality. It's really light weight and doesn't feel any kind of pressure on neck.But the voice quality is bit lower as we think of one plus product other than that the product is worth it and you should go for it .
Title: Bass is up to the mark

Review: Best blutooth earphones....build quality and the Sound quality of the product is really amazing...Noise cancelation pretty decent...This earphone never disappoint you and fulfill all yours expectations.....In last simply superb and also thanks amazon family for the delivery of this product in just 3 days...
Title: Amazing product

Review: Disagree is it continues reminds u that your charging gonna be over like having 20%-10% if u talking with another person it Will automatically turn on speaker if u talking any secret or serious debate better to check ur Bluetooth charging is full or not
Title: U should keep all the tym charging we ur 10 hurs of charging limit expired

Review: Even after getting the product exchanged after my very first purchase, the second product also has the same issue. There is a lot of cracking sound while on calls, which is really frustrating as you have to remove them for attending calls. It's great while listening to music but really disappointed when on calls.
Title: A lot of disturbance during calls

Review: Earphones bass have rattling sound, first I thought that it might be issue with this piece, but I asked for replacement from Amazon, but the same issue persisted in this piece as well. I tested it in multiple videos and different bass test, but there was this annoying terrible rattling sound every time.I tested old version of OnePlus Wireless Z bullets as well, it was fine. I think instead of improving Bass they made it terrible
Title: Bass is TERRIBLE !!!

Review: It is mind blowing until and unless it is working, but that condition will not last for more than 2 months at least not with me. Instead of getting it exchanged, it is not working properly as it sometimes do not connect with my device, when connected disturbance is there, disconnects on its own and what not. Never expected such a product from a reputed brand like one-plus. Please do give a thought before purchasing it.
Title: Pathetic experience!

Review: So far good only Skype or hangout call not working properly. My voice lagging behind few seconds for eg if i speak then it take 5-6 seconds to reach my voice to listener in between that there another action taken. This is impacting to my daily meeting,embarassing :(
Title: Sound quality

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I have ordered on 11th of October 2021 one plus bullets wireless z base addition earphone and it has stopped working one piece of the ear bird has stopped working and also sound in comming and going I'm very unhappy with the service my last date of return was 21st october 2021 and now I'm not able to return this product kindly help me out with this Amazon Kindle help me out to return this product
Title: Want to Return the diffective product one plus bullets wireless z base addition earphone not working

Review: Okayish. Sound gets distorted in certain music genre. First I thought my earphone was bad, so got it replaced but the new one is also the same. Probably should have taken the normal edition and not the base edition.FYI, I am a OnePlus fan and hence bought this earphone, even my previous Realme earphone was better. Not comparing with JBL or Bose, etc. as they are of different price range.

Review: Worst decision that I bought these.The item that I received was having connection problems, then I got the replacement of the same, the replaced item has mic issue. Mic is not working properly and creating alot of noise.

Review: Noise cancellation is worst and very irritating especially on calls. After a month it became horrible and unfortunately even after two repairs its still the same and disappointed Very much 😞☹️I took the help from the service centres and sent to repair twice still getting the same issue. I am very much looking for replacement or refund. Didn't expected this kind of isaue with one plus ☹️☹️☹️
Title: Worst noise cancellation

Review: I am using it from last 4 months..... but my earphone taking 2.5 hrs to 3 hrs to fully charge......they claim 10 min charge 10 hrs battery backup.....but my earphone didn't giving 10hrs backup......also it does not giving 10hrs backup after fully charge......worst experience......
Title: Charging issue found

Review: i bought an new oneplus z bass wireless but I'm totally disappointed with that very very very poor microphone quality it produce creepy sounds during conversation and I'm a student during my classes it produce same kind of noiseiam not that much rich to buy this brand but my parents bought me this for my studies and its mic quality is totally rubish very poor .You are not providing the service for the money you get from customers
