Review: It is not working at all.. give me feeling a roadside stuff. I returned first item with the hope next piece will work but it also not working... Takes 1 hour time to pair and battery goes down in 2-3 hours. Very disappointed.. never expetected such a pathetic product. Do not buy .... Duplicate items sold on Amazon now...
Title: Do nto buy.. take 1-2 hours to pair and battery goes in 2-3 hours. Worst experience

Review: Everthing is all good about itExcept one thing nd that is when some one is calling through net like whatsApp, imo, Botim then you can not accept it through this you need to answer it from ur phone after that u can talk freely nd one more thing that is by not this u can not feel what u r tapping is it disconnecting ur call or increase volume or decreasing its just a plane u have to look it before action other wise it is worth it.
Title: I would say go for it.

Review: I bought the first headset and it was superb but had little mic issue which any product can have like manufacturing issue.But it was so quick when I ordered a replacement it was replaced within 24 hrsReally impressed with the time take for original order and replacement as well
Title: Best one and Amazon service awsome

Review: Voice not clear and lot of disturbances while in call at both caller and receiver.By that time I reliasie the problem was due to this particular bluetooth set, return period was lapsed.I personally not recomand if you want to use for calls.
Title: Voice not clear and lot of disturbances while in call at both caller and recevier.

Review: I have been using this device since December,till now it was good experience but suddenly one ear piece is not working and it happen to my last pair of bullets also after 5to6 months of use it starts with issues so I request Amazon to repair my earphone but they don't reply . This kind of service is very bad if you want to buy this earphone buy it from oneplus website it's more safe and you will have your warranty claim within a year
Title: Worst product from oneplus

Review: Excellent product. Very light weight with clear audio. Excellent for use both during workouts and meetings. Quick bluetooth connectivity and mobile phone compatibility, especially if you're also using a OnePlus phone.Only drawback is that the cables are a little too long and dangle a bit. Value for money and overall it's worth it.
Title: Great product

Review: Just received the in-ear earphone today. Delivery was super quick( within 24 hours). Well done Amazon.Using it for a few hours to watch movies, attend calls, connects to phone and laptop. Must say that the product is amazing.Pros:Connects seamlessly with my Samsung Note 8 and Macbook airProduct Quality is premium & excellentNoise cancellation is very impressiveVoice clarity is superbPackaging was impressiveCons:Bass is good but not amazing
Title: Best Speaker at this price

Review: Worst for calls, we will get buzzing sound on both ends, I guess it is not compatible with all the device.I ordered twice, both the time I face the same issue, found so many other people facing the same in internet.Tried so many solutions available on internet which not helped me.I am returning my second ear phone also.Great for music, but worst for calls with some devices.MyDevice:Redmi Note 10 Pro Max
Title: Bad call Quality(Buzzing sound)

Review: My first impression was like wow, it's amazing but after just 5 months it stopped working. Tried contacting support but they only have services for phone and TV. Would have given 5 stars if it didn't break so soon!
Title: Lasts just 5 months

Review: Whoever reading this comment please don't buy these headphones... Sound quality is ok...but built quality is so poor even 300 - 400 earphones have better built quality.After 6 months rubber usesd in it gets melts down...and boom 2000 gayo.
Title: Please don't waste your money...you gonna regret buying these

Review: Oneplus always keep thier brand value..Great product than i expected.Last 4 years i really happy with oneplus family and this wireless z is great product and unbelievable battery life and value for money. If someone seeking for a bluetooth earphone, go for oneplus bullet wireless z..Good quality and its very easy to use and magnetic control function very nice..Thanks for this product and very good packing superfast delivery even during this situation.. hats off oneplus and Amazon..Cheers
Title: Best neckband in 2k

Review: Amazon is just fooling us nothing else, they send dublicate products my earphones stopped working after 3days only n the delivery boy refused to take it back by saying some packaging difference I mean seriously wth man.
Title: Amazon product sucks

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I have received the product in open condition.And I have booked Red color Bullets and when I open the box in that it was black colour.On box also it's mentioned Red colour but the Oneplus Bullets inside the box was black.The sound quality is not good.The product which I received is used or  duplicate.
Title: The Product was opened

Review: Sound quality is good.Mic is also good.Quick switch feature works differently.As you know there is no physical quick switch button like normal edition.If you want to switch quickly, turn on your blue tooth and select your bullets your device will be connected.However I don't like this way I don't know why they say this is quick switch feature.
Title: Over all this is worth

Review: I am using this earphone more than 1 week and its working perfectly the sound quality and bass is amazing. Ia ma using this earphone in redmi phones such as redmi note 4 and it's working good  in redmi phones.I am searching earphone 2 -3 months I found boat rockerz 255 but I  little bit confuse then ilI found one plus headphone bass edition. I am using this earphone for online class and the battery backup is amaing and it takes charge in 30 - 40 minutes.Without thing go for it if you bass lover and you need battery backup.
Title: Value for Money

Review: Definitely one of the best in this price rangeIf you attach proper buds according to your ear size and tune a good equalizer, you'll experience the best sound, bass, and a perfect noise cancellation..Recommended for use with OnePlus Device for the best result ..
Title: Worth it!

Review: Fast connectivity, well sound quality and buildup quality , as well as easy to handle light weight water resistance it really good for all rounder use. and delivery was also fast though i am not prime member user but still fast delivery i like the way they deal as well as if u got any kind of problem they replace your product hassle free over all it is a good product under 2000. after 3 month of use i can say that it is a worth buying.
Title: after 3 month of use

Review: Not able to judge the sound quality because it  was not connecting in my phone although I have Bluetooth v5.0 in my phone .This oneplus earphones always say couldn't connect and when get connected it automatically gets disconnected within 10 -12 seconds  by the time I on my wifi and play any video to listen it sound some blink and gets disconnected  so how can I live with such earphones with so much  inconvenience to use every time
Title: Again and again gets Disconnect automatically

Review: Magnetic switch off not working soon return policy expired i don't know how to get warranty claim in this amazon. Got defect product.
Title: After 13 days Magnet switch off not workings.

Review: Comfortable even if you wear for whole dayIt won't give you any irritation or headacheIt's lightweightBesides, it has lower latency than the regular versionI've been playing PUBG on my ipad since the day I bought not better than some good quality earphones when comes to gamingBut best it neckbands, you can even try oppo enco but it has some latency but better sound quality.Low latency works nicely with iOS and OnePlus devices.
Title: Comfortable, Low Latency, Good Sound Quality

Review: Reviewing after using for almost more than 2 months.The noise cancellation is this earphone is really poor. I attend meetings and my team sometimes get annoyed by the sounds of birds/crows/bikes sounds in the background. With his price, I expected much better performance.Battery life is much lower than what they claim, I hardly get 5 hours .I won't suggest to buy.
Title: Poor Noise Cancellation

Review: Most probably thus may be one of the first reviews for bullets wireless z 'bass edition'.like everyone I've also done many researches before buying this.i saw many youtubers and others complaining about the bass.in my opinion the bass is absolutely pure and its perfect, for a common listner.I think they all are reviewing from the perspective of a music director or something.The sound quality is absolutely pure.We can hear every single sound in detail.If your budget is 2k i highly recommend this product
Title: Superb buy for 2k

Review: Got defected piece...earphones are getting disconnected just few minutes after connecting...this is known bug in software from oneplus and my previous earphones also had this....and now there's no return on this order and my money is wasted!Oneplus is not anymore the oneplus which was known for its quality products!
Title: Defected piece

Review: Had purchased less than a year ago and one of the headphones stopped working.. looking at the cost 2k the durability is very bad..where other good brands costs 40-50% less that does not matter if they stop working within an year... Stay away from these headphones if you are tight on budget and think of buying expecting it to be long lasting
Title: Very bad durability..do not last for even a year

Review: I like the sound as it is decent enough you can enjoy ur favourite music and voice calling. Only one thing which i dont like is this headphone is not having noise cancellation because of that on the other end it will very noisy if you are in croweded area it catches even small surround sound.
Title: Sound

Review: I bought these earphones as they would go well with my one plus phone as charging it would be easier. But the left earphones stopped working just after a week of use. Very disappointed. The return window is closed as well. Would never recommend this.
Title: Stopped working

Review: The sound quality is decent but the microphone is real bad. Does not seem to work with OnePlus 6. The earphones are not suitable for MacBook, the earpiece gets noise intermittently (I replaced it thrice, and the issue was observed with every single set of earphones). The microphone does not work on macbook, I tried with duo call and the other party kept complaining about low amplitude and the intermittent irritating noises.
Title: Microphone does not work, I returned the earphones

Review: This is a fake product, I ordered the same from one plus website and there is difference of day and night between the two. Stop selling such products. These earphones cause disturbing sound when connected with iPad and MacBook. The original ones do not cause such noise.Shame.
Title: Fake

Review: This headset stopped working in 5 months. I went to service center for repair/replace this. But the service center guys are very unprofessional. They said, they don't have stock and they never call you back when the stock is back. Also they say, they can't replace the same product. Very bad experience from One plus service. Pls don't buy this product and face similar situation like me.
Title: Worst Product. Never Buy it.

Review: Ideal for daily use no ear pain after long usage (3hrs)Ear peice is Quite uncomfortable when its used inside helmet. however it fits by adjustingCalling:The opp person is hears your voice well. I. E The ambience noise suppressed and speaker voice is heard more.
Title: Best head set under 2000

Review: The bass is not that clear.  It is like listening to music in an auto with wooden supported speakers. didn’t  expect this from oneplus.  Named bass edition. But bass is like listening to 200/- earphones.  Not worthy of paying 2000/- for this product.
Title: Not worthy. Bass edition is only for name.  Sounds like 200/- earphones.

Review: The headphones are very good with good sound quality and comfort of wearing the headphones for a long time. But what made the manufacturer think to remove the hardware button for the quick switch feature to switch between the connected devices. The normal edition of the OnePlus Bullets Z has the hardware button to switch between two devices that work seamlessly. I returned the Bass edition and bought the normal one. The quick switch feature works well in that.
Title: Sound quality is good, but quick switch feature is meaningless on the bass edition

Review: I have already recommended this headphones to my friends and colleagues. These are best in the market at the price segment it is offered. The sound & bass quality is excellent. The best about these headphones is the battery life & charging time. I am using these headphones for past 5 days for strech of 10hrs & I have practically charged the headphones 3 times for just 10 to 15mins. I have never heard the message of battery low till now.
Title: Most reliable Headphones

Review: Product:  3.5/5first of all i almost used every earphnes as far ....in 2k budget there are lot more better than this one....as they mentioned bass its nt upto my mark when compared to others noise cancellation no way it doesnt have such thing as they mentioned, nd connectivity wz pretty good nd power on nd off wz good,while call, if yu wearing skinny tight jeans nd riding bike yu may nt get clear voice while riding nd can hear disturbance more than yua voice....dats clear nd clean review Delivery:missed redcable bt later they replaced it 3.5/5
Title: nt up to mark

Review: I have bought this today. In a single word it makes me feel just wow.... Soft, comfortable, premium finishing, great fitting in ear ....buid quality is great.Come to the audio section....great sound...bass is somuch improved compared to the previous version... loudness is quite good ... microphone is quite impressive, battery back up just awesome. Apart this there are so many interesting features like fast charging...multiswitching ..etc. Just grab it.. it's great deal for this price range
Title: Awesome 👍 neckband for 2k

Review: Bass is good, noice canceling is moderate. Only disadvantage is you will hear crackling sound sometimes and sometimes it disconnect by itself without notifying.So you've to turn off your Bluetooth and reconnect it again to get back
Title: Good to buy

Review: This Bluetooth is having Best sound quality, good for listening songs when doing your regular work and good for taking with your loved one when your hands are busy...😊Only I found difficulty when wants to listen radio in mobile ...as the radio asks for wired earphone...also when we want to join WebEx /G meet ,the sound gets distorted if the wireless bluetooth is used for that.But all in all other features are good and I liked this product for Listening songs.
Title: Very nice product ☺️👍

Review: The product is very good  and have pretty good sound quality and you will definitely enjoy music as well  the call quality sound also good. It's magnetic on-off function good and easily coonected with phone.Overall recommend for the buy.
Title: Awesome wireless headphones.

Review: Bass is good and call quality is also good but only one this is disappointing is that chur ahur sound all the time it's like local earphones I'm very sad with this product from now in I will never buy this one plus product no matter how much good ur product I swear I will never buy this 😶 u know  realme is best earphone I ever used if u guys have one plus device that buy this trash other vise dont buy trush me I'm dying inside I wasted my money 😭on this product one plus is really trash I hate this

Its  not working at all  and now its facing same problem  i love the sound quality  and the comfort  but the mic issue is facing  now after the lock down i need to go to onplus store and replace it. Noteit: sound 🔊 10/10 comfort  10/10 batteries 8/10 and mic 0/10  one plus please clear this issue its my request
Title: Mic isssue

Review: I think I received a defective product.When I receive a waiting call  ,Bluetooth gets disconnected. Other waiting call ,on picking can't be heared thorough headsets.Disconnecting headsets while listings music didn't pauses music or youtube vedio rather sound starts coming out from mobile.

Review: Best part I liked is the quick pairing and moving to stand by mode just by bringing the earpieces together. Don't need to worry about battery wastage or long time to get the damn thing started every time.Edit: after using for 2-3 months, battery life I am actually getting is close to 10 hours only. Since it charges super fast, not a deal breaker but buyer should be aware
Title: Great product for buying within 2000 bucks!

Review: The earphones doesn’t switch between devices. We need to manually connect to 2nd device !The audio quality of OK but when we try to increase or decrease volume while listening to music on iPhones, it makes a noise which is really bad !And during calls, sometimes, people cannot hear you properly! This has been an intermittent issue but it does happen quite frequently
Title: It’s really bad !!

Review: For the first week it was working smoothly,Now I am having a cracking sound in right earnpiece.Its very disturbing and when i call someone both of us getting a noise which is again a bad experience.It starts to work only after factory reset it.
Title: Worst experience after 1.5 months

Review: Buyed this product on December 2020 and its not even been 2 months..And today while i was talking in a call i suddenly gone off.. and its not getting on.. even if i keep it on charge its not showing the indicator (led light).. complete waste of money. I didn't even rough use it.. nd it doesn't even have a scratch on it..I buyed it from all my pocket money and Amazon putted it in water😡😡.. i need refund/replacement or atleast repair 😡
Title: Not to buy

Review: They are awesome i cant explain how roughly i used them but low latency is lovely and build quality is top notch compare to alllllll other neckband i an huge fan of oneplus seriously i also have oneplus 7t and oneplus tv i really love oneplus and its work and quality in all their products
Title: Top in the market in under 2k price

Review: This bass edition product lacks nice codecs like AptX or Ldac and we only get SBC/AAC low quality codecs. Additionally, mic is unsatisfactory to use. A little distance between phone and neckband will let no audio to get captured. Sound quality and range is good and works great at some distances. Hope this helps. Try getting better neckband like boat 335 or like that cuz it also has 10mm driver unlike this neckband which has 9.2mm driver.
Title: Not worth 2K till it has competition like Boat 335.

Review: Just recieved this product it's just just just worth. BuyingValue for moneyBass ohh noo it's vibrating my brain.....just awesome and smooth bass......loved it .....OnePlus is brandOnePlus Nord is my deviceAnd this buds just awesomeAfter using OnePlus u will never switch back to resmi , realme etc awesome just awesome ..........
Title: Awesome just awesome bass 😎

Review: I read a lot of positive reviews & trusted one plus brand name, but the product seems of no use. Have a noise in the background. Cant listen to songs on this at all. Someone said it has good connectivity with phones having Bluetooth 5.0 and above, my phone has BT 5.0, still unable to listen to songs correctly.
Title: Big noise in the background always.

Review: Sometimes problem in connecting to laptop....Not in mobile.....sometimes have to stop driver forcefully and then start again to connect....
Title: After using 1month

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 Feel cheated cause even though they mention that you can toggle between two deviceUnlike the older version where they had an explicit button, this reverb edition does not have that button.You have to manually connect to devices everytime
Title: Does not have toggle button

Review: 1 star because of Misleading information about Quick switch on its official website.Quick switch button removed on latest version. You will have to manually switch between two devices
Title: No quick switch button or option. Planning to return

Review: Works well only with oneplus phones.Dont buy.You wont get bass or loud sound using with laptop or other devices.If you buy any other brand, sound quality is same on all devices.
Title: Avoid: Works well only on oneplus phones

Review: If you are looking for LOUD music this is not for you , my wife loves it  I find it too soft and cool .I use sennheiser my self.I would rate this as 5 full star
Title: Faulty or bad

Review: Charging speed and backup is plus point.Average bass only. Difficulty in switching to multiple devices. Better to go for normal edition (having swich button) instead of bass edition (no switch button and no bass)
Title: Good headphone with average bass

Review: It is very strange but it seems company try and put time lock in the device. I have bought 2 semilar device on which both of them stop working as soon as it cross 1 Year.. so beware.No complain on sound or call quality or physical quality it is owsome. But it looks like company make sure that device stop working post 1 year... #oneplus
Title: Good product but seems company play time clock restriction on device

Review: Pretty happy with the product. Here's my insight:Packaging: ExcellentProduct Quality: ExcellentBattery Life: 16.5 hrs (not 17 hrs)Connectivity: ExcellentBase: Above averageNoise Cancellation: Pretty goodSound Quality: ExcellentFast or Flash Charge: Accurate & Excellent
Title: Worth the price!

Review: Absolutely terrible experience, please do not buy from this retailer as the item.is defective. Bluetooth stopped working in less than 24 hours of arrival of product. There is no option to return but only to replace. Stay away from this retailer and save your money.
Title: Defective product, terrible experience.

Review: Bought it for my son! He is very happybwith this product and he told me to give it 5 stars.
Title: Worth buying

Review: One plus earphones are just great. I used them for my regular calls on mobile, zoom etc and mic/audio quality is great. There is no lag at all.Design is also very good and its very lightweight.Battery backup is very good as they promised. It will roughly backup for 2 days.
Title: Great Earphones

Review: Well Spotify provides high quality music, while listening to music and podcast if the headphone and mobile are near it feels smooth. If we move 6-7meter apart for phone, music starts to tear up. Iam using OnePlus 8Pro. May be if this headphone has aptX technology we won't have this problem. If your a listener of high quality music kindly go with aptX technology
Title: Are you a Spotify listener?

Review: I don’t know what is wrong in this product, I’m facing disturbance while listening to music . Looks something wrong in earbuds, the disturbance looks filter in earbuds is defective. I have requested for replacement there was no response for 2days. I have cancelled and raised replacement again its been more than 24hrs i haven’t get any update. I feel like I have wasted money by purchasing this. Deeply disappointed.
Title: Disturbance in earbuds audio is not clear

Review: After paying such a high amount for thus earphones .the built quilty is not good after using for almost 6months .I am facing problems.i have used boat wireless earphones. It was best.. worked very fine ..also they replaced one-time wen I was facing problem with it .that also after almost 8 months. But the cost was less compared to this OnePlus . highly disappointed. And not going to buy any OnePlus device again 🙏
Title: Highly disappointed

Review: This is an amazing bluetooth earphones and by far my most favourite one, it's really comfortable to wear, I sometimes forget I am wearing them, I'm a long time wired earphones fan because I used to always feel bluetooth earphones/headphones are not crisp Enough but this earphone changed my opinion! I hope it lasts ! Max bass could be too loud but you can adjust to your sweet spot! (Around 75%-85% intensity) Just go for it!
Title: Great Bass, Comfortable!

Review: The product is ok. Not as great as I was expecting. There is alot of disturbance while talking on the phone which gets really annoying. So if you have a long call or online meetings it will definitely give you trouble.  Music output is fair. So nothing exceptional in it which makes it slightly overpriced.
Title: Sound quality is fair.

Review: fast charge is very very important for me.its a average gear for continuous conference call and lazy people like me who forget to charge."one plus" I give you "5 minis" for sound quality like this, I don't recommend it for listening songs.
Title: music lovers dont buy, you will be disappointed.

Review: First 7days of usage is fine but as soon as the replacement window is closed it started showing all types of problems...mainly the call quality is very bad....some sort of irking noise is always there on a call
Title: Call quality is very very poor

Review: I am so with the purchase, I have been using Skullcandy for more than five years, sound quality of one plus is better than Skullcandy, but i think Google assist is not activated on 1+, whereas on Skullcandy I can easily use Google assist to do many things without touching my phone.overall I am 100% happy with 1+ than Skullcandy. worth Buying it.
Title: Good Enough To Listen Music..

Review: It's Osm Product...I used It 10 days & it's Music is Crystal Clear Which I love.Bass is Thumbing...It's Very Lite To Use and Also The Magnetic Sensor Is Nice 👍🏻..Connectivity Is Very First & It's very Comfortable.It's Very Easy to Use But what I need in a Neckband is first The Wlc assistant from OnePlus but it don't Have.But Once Once Time It automatically Disconnected !!!Overall Nice ProductI love This 😍.....
Title: It's Very Good product From OnePlus 😍😍😍

Review: Giving One Star to OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z Bass Edition(Reverb Red) because when I'm using this headphone to listening video songs, lectures, and voice calls too, I'm getting very poor quality of sound, continuously unexpected disturbance sound coming through the speaker and its hearting my ear. I am fed up with this product. That's why I'm returning my headphone.Hope everything will be right when I get back after the replacement.Thanks! Amazon for fast delivery.
Title: Poor Sound Quality

Review: Honest review after using 1 month.Waste of money only in one month I am facing lot of issue.1.only in 1 month sound are so noisy lot of disturbance is coming on call2.automatically connect and disconnect when I am on call3.Fake 17 hour backup only 5to 6 hour backup like other local brandGuys please don't waste money on it it's better than purchased local headphone
Title: Worst product forever and I am giving the minus rating

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 It's just waste of time and your money, it stops working after 3-4 Months, again after exchanging it from service centre it stopped working. After that service center were denying for an exchange
Title: Worst, and waste of money..

Review: I purchased this headphone one week before and from today I started facing noise while calling everywhere,in calls either WhatsApp or phone call everywhere and this is too annoying. I tried to reset and pairing again but it didn't work.even my Boat rockerz 255 works far better than this one.Hope one plus fix this soonDevice name - Oneplus 6
Title: The only hype is magnetic control

Review: I have used the headphones for more than 3 months and would say the overall quality of the product is really impressive. If you are going in the budget of 2K for the wireless then my suggestion would be to go with this particular only.Also, the build quality is also good.
Title: Good Quality Wireless Earphones

Review: The headphone is good & it's working fine with my OnePlus 8T. But if you pair it with Macbook Pro 15" (BigSur) you'll hear constant background noises. Replaced one time. Same problem. Now I'm returning the product, thanks to amazon...If you spend most of the time in front of MacBook Pro (developer maybe?), don’t buy the bass edition...Note: there is no such issue in the non-bass edition and You'll not face any problem if you connect with any other devices for both bass and non-bass editions.
Title: Don't buy Bass edition if you use MacBook Pro 15" (BigSur)

Review: I got faulty item some times shows charging indication light and sometimes dont.Sound quality is good.but for bass lovers it is not for you instead go for oppo enco m31 that is way superior then oneplus z bass edition.Battery backup is nice.
Title: Not that good

Review: I replaced reverb red with another due to its mic problem… oh god it’s annoying with the new one as it’s crackling sound…And now right side speaker out..Worst ..Do u know one thing…I’ve 3 boxs again nd again replacement for the same headset with same problem..Sustains only for a month..then a problem.. Now again a problem after a month …Worst experience ever…I suspect they’re replacing the repaired products with new boxes…
Title: Worst replacement product

Review: Pros:1)Bass is really re-engineered, vocals, trebles are very well maintained.2) Built quality is good with silicon and plastic material.3) Charging is lasting long.Cons:It is not a con but, it would be better if the wire is some more sturdy.Suggestions:1) Turn on the mobile/laptop bluetooth always for better connectivity2) Adjust earbuds to fit perfectly into ears to experience real sound quality.
Title: The real best and beast from Oneplus

Review: My mom hates these earphones, I am home for summer break and she spent over 5 mins calling for me, and then came to my room and hit me on the head because I couldn't hear anything apart from the lofi beats I was listening to. At mid volume that too. Good stuff OnePlus. I just hope it lasts.
Title: Good earbuds. might cause concussions.

Review: Warranty offered from one plus is not upto the mark. My earphones stopped working after 5 months of normal use. I went to customer support in Allahabad, they asked me to wait for aroud 20-25 days for replacement. Is this even justified?They are taking around a month for replacing a product which is still in warranty. What a great service offered. Kudos to OnePlus.
Title: Poor Service

Review: Overall good product, but too costly for the quality of sound. Also do not support multiple device connectivity. Only multiple OnePlus device can get connected. So non OnePlus users, please make decisions cautiously before purchasing
Title: Product doesn't support multiple device connectivity

Review: Over all  is best but amazone is froud  site renewed product in sell  battery charge is 1.30 minute time not available in site feature same  bass is mind blowing mic is good noice cancellation is not fine battery  back up  is normal  fine i m return a product plz  i purchase in same brand black bass edition review are good 👍
Title: Battery is not good charge time is 1hour and 30 minute full charged

Review: have purchased this for myself, as i am a big time music listener + to use it for phone calls. one thing I must say the moment you nsert buds in your ear, noise gots cancel by 80% as the buds are so perfectly fit. battery backup is really commendable with real bass which is soothing to your ears. i would definitely recommend jus go for this in 2k budget.
Title: Good sound quality with very good battery

Review: It's very good product. Must buy.Sounds quality -5 ratingsNoise cancellation -5 ratingsBass quality -5 rating.Battery back up -5 ratingValue for money.Only thing I faced is switching with multiple devices. Its bit complax process to switch btwn devices. So given 4 ratings.
Title: Must buy

Review: It is Not Allowing to switch between any 2 devices. I am doing it Manually Which is making me more irritating a lot where I do receive many calls more than 50 Calls per day and simultaneously I am using Youtube In Laptop Getting Lot of problems whenever calls are Receiving calls.
Title: Quick Switch Between 2 Devices

Review: Been using it for a month, sound quality is good, easy to operate, battery life is excellent, fits well in the ear, long usage doesn't burden the neck, feels light, durable haven't face any issue or no twitching sound heard till now. It is still one of the good product at this price range.
Title: A good product at affordable price!

Review: This is the best in class neck band with high quality mic for conf calls. Buy without any hitch. I ve used realme, airpod, sneeisser neckbands but this is the best.
Title: Excellent Quality , best in class mic

Review: Sound quality is good. Battery backup is excellent. But I face connection problem every time I recharge the headset battery. Keeps getting disconnected. If I try to unpair and pair again it does not show up in the available devices.
Title: Connection problem after recharging battery

Review: Packing was good.Product delivered in good condition.Headphone is best under 2k with one plus branding.Sound is also best .Fitting in ear is good.Bass is super.Noise cancellation is somewhat less than expected.The product is quite good.You can buy this product without any confusion.
Title: Worth for money

Review: It's really good, noise cancellation perfect, call quality is up to the mark, connects well with my oneplus, battery is okayish(but it charges real fast so no issues).. n this magnet on-off feature is really nice i love it
Title: Lovely product... Oneplus never disappoints

Review: This feature of disconnecting whenever the earbud magnets join hanging in the neck is so irritating.Often it doesn't even connect back.No vibration on incoming calls either.My samsung was so much better
Title: Great sound but poor bluetooth

Review: I have been using this  product since last 15 days. I am satisfied with the performance oh this wireless head phone. Battery lasts upto 2-3 days and connectivity is very fast and great.
Title: Great Buy 15 Days use

Review: This is just awesome ,just like others i was also confused in real me,one plus,oppo ,boat but in 2k one plus is king just close your eyes and go for it sound quality is too good you can't listen in full volume Bluetooth range is also top some times you may feel legancy but it is not too much battery is also very good charge for 15 min enjoy 2 days overall it's king in this price segment just go for it😊
Title: Just awesome no words

Review: Product is good as long as it works but it stopped working just after a month use. No practical solution is given by customer care. Seems that I'm trapped and lost Rs.2000 on buying this.
Title: It worked only for a month!!

Review: Do not go to price just go for the product. Promise you will not regret. Absolutely worthy product. It has been more than 6 months and still working without any issues.Sound quality 5/5Noise cancellation 5/5Bass quality 5/5
Title: Best when comes to bass.

Review: Bass and sound quality is amazing. And the most fascinating thing is how it connects and disconnects so easily. I use the earphone for almost 12-14 hours everyday and i have to only charge them once in the morning, and still 40% battery is remaining at the end of the day. It is a fantastic product. If your budget allows you, go for it!
Title: I just loved them!

Review: don't buy it guys totally wrost product and specialy OnePlus ke warenty pura fltu he logoko ullu bana ke lut Raha he only 5 month old and my earfone are not working at all warenty claim kerne jao to Amazon vale bol rehe he OnePlus ko bolne ke liye and OnePlus vale bol rehe he ki mere Iha pe service centre nehi he pick up drop option vi nehi he metleb customer ka kuch nehi tum Jake mer jao hamara keya
Title: Don't buy it guys wrost items ever see in my life specialy OnePlus ka service is very disepointed

Review: After 2 -3 days usage the product doesn't give me any backup. Its turn off by itself. Without giving the mentioned back of 17hrs. Or atleast some hours even if its disconnected it gets discharged after sometime. I really liked the product though.. maybe the product i received has defects. I'm going to initiate a return and get a replacement i hope it will work fine.
Title: It was really good, but not now..

Review: Great product with amazing sound quality and build. Quite light in weight and material of product is also smooth on your skin.The neck band is strong which avoids the unwanted movement of the earphones.Coming to sound quality, OnePlus Bass Edition earphones have a very balanced sound quality with pure bass.In one line, excellent product for music as well as daily basis like calling etc.
Title: Excellent Product

Review: Simple review : if you use only for game and music just go for it, worthy to this price rangeIf you are more using in calls while driving, op bullet not for this just go other, no noise cancellation, worst in this segmentNote : except calls while driving it's goodSpecial Note : Games going to next level sound experience
Title: No noise cancellation

Review: Product packing is not good.But the Bluetooth earphones are awesome and it has very good battery backup. And the sound quality, bass , comfort very good I will give (4.7/5) I am using ti for 5 days and I don't had any problem with it and it is ok for playing pubg for me it has very less letency in sound while playing pubg but I not got any problems of sound in pubg with this earphone. And the quality of product is very good . New Bluetooth earphones user will definitely fully satisfy with this it worth of money. Just go for it...
Title: Satisfied

Review: If you want a balanced sound with decent bass quality, then go for it. But if you are a bass lover, you want thumpy and punchy bass then don't buy, Boat earphones are far better as compare to this in terms of bass. I am returning this because bass quality is not like that bass which Indian users like.
Title: Bass quality is very poor😠😠

Review: Honestly one of the best earphone I have usedSound quality ultimateVery fast chargingUltimate battery backupAnd I love one Plus products because theyProvide quality this product is worth itI am using one Plus 7 from more than 1 year and it feels like newAnd also this earphone is worth it believe me buy itReview for one Plus bullet wireless z (bass edition)
Title: Best in all department ultimate one Plus

Review: When I visit OnePlus Service center, they were replacing 200-300 in a day at Kolkata Park Street Service Center.Awesome for the first 7-8 months.Wire gets cut from the edge from ear price.Invest some more and buy wireless pods..You will regret after using this in a long term.
Title: Not Good For Long time use

Review: I have used wired jbl head set with average quality and that has better sound quality. If you are planning to use for quality music avoid this.Bass edition is not available in bass edition. you need to manually disconnect from one device to connect 2nd device
Title: poor bass and sound quality and no quick switch for bass edition

Review: Among the Bluetooth neckband earphones considering the price, one plus offered one of the best one in the segment. Magnetic earphones tip with auto on-off is really a cool feature which not only saves the battery drain but the connectivity with the devices are so instant as well. The battery backup is a big thumbs up. Sound quality is great who prefers more bass.
Title: One of the best in the segment

Review: The sound quality is normal for both music and calls. There is nothing special about this headphones. But for the money it works .It comes with a cable. It does not live upto the charging capacity it mentions but overall it works ,no issues so far (1 month usage).Worth the money
Title: Good , feasible buy.

Review: This is the worst earphone I have ever used, build quality is so bad that it got damaged within just 5 months of purchase,Even after proper handing .Same thing happened to my friend as well, Such poor quality wasn't expected from a brand like OnePlus at all. My experience with Boat earphones was way better than this one. Don't go for this, DON'T LET JUST THE BRAND NAME FOOL YOU.
Title: Terrible Build quality

Review: I used the earphones for about 6 months and suddenly one side of it stopped working. I requested for a replacement since it was in warrenty but the service centre people started repairing it. For about 20 days my earphone was at the service centre without any progress on it . The brand has gone down from its standards. There is no proper resolutions if your device stops working.
Title: Don't buy it!

Review: Ek Normal user ke liye bahut hi accha earphone h aur agar aapko long battery backup chahiye with good overall package to jarur ise consider kare aur agar aap audiophile h to aapne Shayad isse acche earphone sun rakhe honge
Title: One of the best at the price

Review: I have two choices when i decided to buy a Bluetooth headset, realme buds and one plus bullet bass edition, after a long research , i decided to go with oneplus. This product surprised me when i started to use, because the bulid quality is very good and the bass of this  headset is much spectacular.  Also their is no any latency. I feel this is a good choice for song and movie lovers.
Title: Great bulid quality

Review: Below are the issues1.the neck band is not user friendly....it gets tied up. It does not stay freely around the neck. You will feel that something messy around the neck2. The buttons are difficult to reach3.not good with notice around...it will catch all noice4. For me it does not fit in ear
Title: Not comfortable around neck

Review: When you listen to music the audio is good , but during any audio call the other end person doesnt seem to listen well. Voice is distorted. Is the service free for headset ?
Title: Lot of distortion during audio call.

Review: Value for money. Quick switch doesnt work properly in bass edition. Takes a lot of time and click to shift. Sound quality is great. Bass is at par. Not very high but good to ears. Build quality and charging speed are top notch.
Title: Good buy

Review: No noise cancellation, long distance noise sound high wrost headphone
Title: No noise cancellation

Review: I'm connecting this with my oneplus 7 device but getting problem every time when I try to pair..It's not getting pair quickly I have to connect it 2 or 3 times after then it get connected,When this blutooth is attached and I'm listening songs it get disconnected automatically..I don't know what the plbm...Sonud quality is good..Noise cancellation is also good.But while getting pair with my device I'm suffering some issue..
Title: Connection Problem.

Review: Everything is nice But some cons which I felt ...1) Noise cancellation is not accurate somewhat Low sound near is less but not High sounds2) Bass is Ok but If u r using dobly atoms or Equalizer3) it take almost 2 hours to charge4) connection is Excellent but If U remove from ears the magnetic tip at endside it connects fast it trend to Disconnect while doing works
Title: Best but yet some Cons ....

Review: Crackling sound during calls: There is a continuous crackling sound when I am taking calls through my mobile. I have tried every method but nothing seems to work.Listening to music or videos through mobile phone and laptop is hassle free. Go for it if you only want it for these.Strict no no if you want to use it for office calls or normal calls in general.
Title: Crackling sound during calls

Review: It's value for money. It's really good for gaming and watching things on Netflix and other OTT platforms. Negligible lag on oneplus phones. However, the mic catches more noise from the surrounding while talking over phone. The mic is designed that way, I guess. Battery backup and charging time is amazing.
Title: Better sound quality, better battery performance, less charging time, more noise pick up from mic

Review: साऊन्ड क्वालिटी ठीक है। बैटरी लाइफ भी ठीक है ।लेकीन  ये कान में ठीक से फीट नहीं होता । स्लिप हो जाता है।  और १ महीने में खराब हो गया। ओन ओफ  नहीं हो रहा है। और कूछ अजीब सी स्पारकींग आवाज आ रही है लगादार। और में उसे One Plus की कस्टमर सर्विस सेंटर में रीपलेस्मेंट के लिए दीया है  १५ दीन हो गए हैं ।मूझे अभी तक नया प्रोडक्ट नहीं मीला हे। 😡😡😡😡😡😡।इसे अच्छा तो में बोट रोकर्ज का हेडफोन लेता 😔😔😔😔
Title: 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 मत लेना ये । Please बकवास है ये । १ महीने मे खराब हो गया

Review: No doubt bass is awesome in this earphone and the vocal quality is also clear. Voice capturing through the mic is perfect. And the best part is charge for 10 mins you can use it for 10 hours nonstop . Magnetic control is plus point in this.  I like the color combination too.  Go for it .
Title: Loved this bass edition

Review: Charging and battery backup GajabConnectivity is also  goodLooks v bhut achhe hAap ess se recording v kar sakte ho  bhut hi achha h aur bhut dur tak ka sound v catch kar leta h agr aap dhire se baat karne ke liye lena chahte h  matlb ki aap gharvpe rhte ho aur Aap apni GF/BF se baat krna h to esse achha fusra option hai hi nhi.👌👌👌👌👌👍👍
Title: Bhut hi achha h  better than boat ,realme ,redmi.

Review: Sound quality is good. Bass is standard. Better product than boat rockerz 335 (Apex hd). Oneplus have AAC codec...After 1 day , the neckband is automatically disconnecting in a time of every 20 minutes(aprox).Really irritating.I just reset the headset. If the problem continues I wil return it back.
Title: Sound Quality really great, automatic disconnect problem

Review: I have replaced my earphone for 4th time within 1 year. It stops working from one side , there is no sound from one side. The service center gave me replacement everytime bt still they stops working from one side, no dont buy
Title: Not working Issues

Review: Waste of money don't buy it ...after some days it won't work at all especially it is worst for calling experience ..Waste of money don't buy it after some days background sound like cracking noise is observed ...in warranty I have claimed 5 times but same problem is repeating..At service center they are giving just new one but it is also having manufacturing defects ...I think it is also not worth for one star ⭐ also
Title: Waste of money don't buy it after some days background sound like cracking noise is observed ...

Review: Good product amazing sound quality charging rate is very good it take 20 min to full charge and long lasting battery backup also Grate Sevice Provided by one plus my one ear piece got damaged no sound were coming due to some reason after 2 month I contacted service Center got piece to piece Replacement
Title: Good Product must buy for this price range and Grate Sevice Provided by one plus

Review: The product has been hyped a lot by marketing this and that in the advertisement but hardly stands tall on anything.I spent my money 💰 on Realme Buds they are worth every penny., Even oppo is not good.
Title: Lot hyped, but all in vain

Review: This BT earphone is beyond my expectations, i have used many earphones double the price of it of reputed brand but this earphone is really fantastic, i am not saying those were bad but i felt it is little bit better than my previous one. Powerhouse of bass with clearity in vocals and well balanced treble. Loved it
Title: Perfect BT earphone at this price

Review: I did not find it as good as the reviews suggested. Have a boat wireless headset and in fact found them to be better. Sounds good, not great. Call quality - barely manageable. Bass quality is good - but looks like that's because the overall sound quality is subpar.Its very well possible that I got a defective unit!
Title: Its ok, not as good as the reviews

Review: Nice battery time, fast charge support 10 min equals approx 9 hrs of music, decent sound and bass, reasonably loud, build feels a little flimsy but not bad, charging port (type-c) is without cover so feels it might catch sweat or water. Microphone clear and OK noise cancellation, reasonably comfortable to wear (fit in the ear nicely).Overall worth every penny spent.
Title: Worth the buck

Review: I always check the headset at its limits and also left and right works perfectly,After checking this, left and right is perfectly fine, But there is a cracking noise in mac os . But is fine in my android device. After so many reserch i disabled AAC in bluetooth settings. And now it is fine
Title: Please fix issue with mac os

Review: No Bass at all. Just like normal head phone. After using one week, when attending calls echo comes in voice & lot of noise. It's literally horrible. Return to the service center & waiting for new one. Waiting time is 15 days minimum. Yes ofcourse the service is too good in OnePlus service center. I appreciate the efforts. But Quality of products is matter.
Title: After using one week, when attending calls echo comes in voice & lot of noise.

Review: I ordered this because I heard that the original Wireless Bullets Z was lacking bass. But when I received it, it's bass was really too much. Couldn't hear the other levels at all. So I returned this and bought the BWZ. The quick switch is better implemented in the Original BWZ. And the audio quality is also much better including good bass. Plus you get longer battery life. So I think the original BWZ is a better deal.
Title: The Bass is uncomfortably boosted

Review: Worst product quality.  THE EARPHONES HAVE STOPPED WORKING AFTER 14 DAYS OF USE.No charging light and not switching on, even by pressing the buttons or by separating the ear pieces.I need a replacement from OnePlus ASAP. Someone please tell me how can i do that?The return/ Replacement option is not showing since it has been more than 7 days. HELP ASAP Please
Title: Don't buy this

Review: Guys no doubt sound quality is good. But as oneples claim of quick switch facility from one to another device but believe me there is no quick switch facility. You have to connect manually every time if you want use this.
Title: Cution please : No quick switch facility like Normal edition

Review: The build quality is quite good, neckband is comfortable as well. the fit of earbuds is amazing and the sound quality is like best in the segment. really amazing product and the best part is fast charging. I literally use them for hours after just 10 min charge and overall battery life is also nice. If u wanna buy a wireless neckband just go for this one
Title: amazing... totally satisfied

Review: After just 1 year of use for my office work , edges are coming off. One ear pieces edge is torn off and it stopped working( now I have to live with one side of the ear piece, NO warranty aswell). Later, one piece of the control button plastic has come off. not happy with the durability. Spending 2k bucks  just for 1yr use.?! Pathetic., see attached pics.
Title: After 1 year of use , edges are torn off

Review: Really great neckband earphones from OnePlus that you would expect. The wire has a great quality. Noise cancellation is at it's peak and you get to get the best sound experience. The bass quality is decent enough but not as loud Indians like. It charges well and fast with the 30W charging
Title: OnePlus quality earphones

Review: Very happy to use this product but after 1 month 10 days this oneplus earband automatically get off and on while using it like watching videos or hearing song's and also when you use to watch any video 🎥 on YouTube if you want to pause video with the neckband button it will not give any response
Title: Sound quality is good

Review: All is good but charging port is not correctly placed. Sweat or water can enter & can damage the product
Title: Bass is awesome

Review: The headphones is good. Good amount of bass and sound quality is nice. Some charging issue is there. The red light never turns white. It is taking more than 40 mins with one plus dash charger.
Title: Charging time.

Review: What i liked the most about this product is the noise  cancellation. It works so good. The bass sounds premium, the whole material has a smooth and soft finish. Overall its a very good buy at 1900/-.
Title: Satisfied with the product.

Review: i like this earphones due to its looks,light weight,C type charging port,good battery life than real me buds etc.but i think in case of battery life i am not quite satisfied with what thay have written in specifications,they say battery life is 17 hours but as far as i counted with my redmi y3 phone( by playing video and audio both )which has bluetooth 4.2 it was around 10 hours but not 17 hours,so i am totally disappointed with that 17 hours specifications.although 10 hours is not bad but remove that specifications that is has 17 hours of battery backup.
Title: Battery life is not 17 hours

Review: Awesome neckband .quality is too good . Whenever I wear it on neck it’s too much confortable and dosent feel like wearing any neckband .sound quality is awesome.But when I paired it with Apple phone the sound quality not up to the mark it’s gives average sound effect .but for android phone it’s awesome .
Title: Awsme experience

Review: Poor connectivity with many honor phone works fine with oneplus phone, auto disconnect during media play main issue I am facing is during call even if its paired its not working while I am calling or receiving a call I had to turn the Bluetooth on/off many times to fix it but media works fine, resetting doesn't work how to fix now?
Title: Connectivity issue

Review: Sound quality is food but don't buy this product as I buy this product on 19th dec 2020 but on 2 jan I am not able to connect my device & unusual sound is coming from blue tooth all the time , this sound is like you are listening AM Radio with out any sound
Title: Don't buy

Review: Base is just awesome and build quality is good get recharged in just 20 mins which is a deal breaker for me I have used many wireless earphones but at this price range nothing can come near this earphones just grab it without thinking twice!
Title: Just go for it!

Review: I purchased this product 5 month back and now it is not switching off , this is getting charged full but not getting switch on , showed in service centre they said it is charging port damaged , i am not understanding that if it is damaged then how it is getting charge . There is problem with its board that it is not getting switch on but service centre is saying it will not cover under warranty .. so please think before purchase
Title: Within this one year 2times this product got defected, not reliable

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 I bought this earphones. After  I week I got trouble with this. Before that they have played well. After 1 week the sound is going off. While listening the songs  or seing videos. Just passing 1 sec and again playing. I observed the defect and  I kept the exchange policy. Though the earphones are good. But I got damaged one. I think soo.
Title: Not working propely

Review: Worst product as the the audio keeps on stopping despite i have got the replacement for the product. If it's not supporting in my one plus7 phone i wonder in which device does this earphone support . The refund window also now is over what to do just keeping this device as idle because if goes to service centre I don't think so it's of no usePathetic experience
Title: The audio keep on stopping .

Review: I am using it since 4th may & I have zero complaints regarding it ! Bass is really good in comparison to the non bass edition.... call quality is also very good..its crisp & clear.... battery backup is ample for me... I hardly put it on charge before 2 day use !(note- I use it more than 5-6 hrs a day at 60%+). For gaming its low latency mode worked very well on my samsung galaxy M51.
Title: Thank you amazon for delivering it on time & the authentic one !

Review: 1.I am facing Bluetooth connectivity issues many times, it seems like connected but the sound won't be there. After reconnecting it it will start working.2.For a price range like this one plus could have been provided much better sound clarity.3. Noise cancellation feature is not at all available.
Title: It's a Wastage of money.

Review: Sound quality is great. Noise cancellation is just right to make Skype & Teams calls over laptop and mobile. Only con is only one device can be paired at a time.
Title: Very Good Product

Review: Good quality bluetooth earphones works very well excellent sound quality Mic and call quality noice cancellation is also good most important is the battery backup which is extremely good the bass is perfect the mids highs and lows are perfectly fine while listening to the music looks premium and completely value for money
Title: Outstanding

It had extremely clear highs, lows, mids, trebles and even vocals!This neckband is perfect for workouts and the ear buds don't fall out.The build quality is also amazing. It was very comfortable too! The mic quality was bad but other than that, I loved this product!!!
Title: The best neckband under 2000 rupees!

And when i got the first one, i was satisfied but when i used volume rocker then i heard a weird sound like zig zag white noise. Then i applied for replacement and got it replaced. I tried it out and found it also has the same problem that i was having before.

Review: At 2000 i think this is the best device with really good sound quality and bass.Battery life is also really good. I use it for office meetings and lasts all day and more.

Title: LIFE IS 1 YEAR

I initially thought this was an issue with the particular headphone that I ordered but that was not the case, I got a replacement and the issue with Apple devices still persisted.
Title: Doesn't work well with Apple devices for sure

Review: The build quality is best very soft and smoothThe battery backup is good about 15 to 16 hour batteryThe sound quality is good but the bass is very low I give ratting to bass  is 1.5/5If you have a comfartable and balanced sound the you go for it but if you haveOnePlus mobile then you go for it another one you go for boat or realme earphone I refer for boat
Title: Good sound

Title: Decent neckband and bass is too good

Review: The media could not be loaded.                 While delivering the product it seems to some has changed the product and after checking it one side is not working and also while delivering the product the box was good and the the inside box seal was already teared so we need the refund our product.
Title: Problem in delivering

Review: I liked the bass and build quality of the product, the connectivity is superb , but sometimes during calls switching from blietooth to speaker disconnects the Bluetooth and we should reconnect again. Buy this product and check it thoroughly 9 days and don't throw the box after unboxing it pls save for atleast 10 days ,so if get some problems u can return it. Pls dont do the mistake i did that throwing the box. Noice cancellation is okok..
Title: Check thoroughly for 9days with charging and using it with music , watching movies and making calls.

Review: Great product. It sounds great and has a bit of noise cancellation for low to moderate sounds. For a bit louder noise it is not suitable. But overall it is great.Bass is great to my liking. It is just not adequate as some of my family members tried it they expected a bit more.
Title: Good Product at the price

Review: Amazing quality earphones. Don’t even think of turning back at such a price. It’s really good in quality and durable. Have been using this for months and I’m not a easy going user, I used the earphones in rough conditions and still no problem. The battery lasts very long and charges up quickly. Go for it.
Title: Just wonderful✨

Review: All good.. excellent packaging and product. For the Bass Edition, keep in mind that it doesn't have a physical button for Quick Switch! They have mentioned it only on their website with really small fonts which one could easily miss, if they have a similar impression as normal edition. It still supports quick switch between 3 paired devices, but it has to be done manually by selecting the device in Bluetooth settings!!
Title: No Physical Button for Quick Switch in Bass Edition.

Review: Good noise cancellation and too useful product. The only thing I liked less is it’s bass effect which is a bit more. But nevertheless it’s superb to use.
Title: At this price range it’s the best product

Review: Bluetooth is working good only for music and media content for calling I am hearing cracking sound and for the mic also bad for calling....

Title: Quick switch.. haha

Review: It's a very good product in this price range.. sound clear, call quality good, bass it's okPlayback time is I'm using last 7days and after 1st day of full charge it's still have 50% of charge (I'm watched movie and listing songs 1 to 1&half hour last 7days and youtube videos) the backup is very good...It's takes to full charge 45 to 50 mints(I'm using 18w charge)
Title: Playback time and sound clarity

Review: Bass is really good! For below 2k, these are the best value for money earphones. Battery easily lasts 2 days. Superb sound quality. Even mic quality is really good. Only con is perhaps the virtual quick switch, which means that we need to pair it to 3 devices and disconnect from one and connect to another manually - No dedicated button for this. Also, during gaming, there's a sound delay of approx 0.7 seconds.
Title: Great Sound Signature + Amazing Bass

Review: Cheap product from one plus, irritating cracking sound in the earphones while playing any media, very disappointed, the return situation is also not good, DO NOT BUY...
Title: Cracking noise, not always though

Review: Sound quality is fine. Microphone quality is pathetic. Everyone whom I call complain about too much background noise and overlapping sound.Previously I was using Samsung phone with Samsung wired headphones costing 450 rupees, I never faced such issue with Samsung. Now I have One plus Nord 2 with these bullshit headphones costing 1800, is complete waste of money.
Title: Really bad microphone

Review: It's very annoying that on call the other person can't hear me properly and everything I have to adjust my mic. Won't recommend it. Bad for calling.
Title: Won't recommend

Review: I am facing horrible voice issues. Whenever I am in call with someone, some sound from the earphone keeps interrupting. I even visited service centre and got the product exchanged but the problem still continues. I will not recommend anyone to buy this model. Last models were good and I purchased this trusting it to be worthy but am extremely disappointed.
Title: Bad experience

Review: Sound quality is really good.Immediately connects with any device.I would like to mention here, initially the seller sent me an opened box which was lacking of USB Type C cable inside. I spoke to amazon customer care representative and asked to replace the product. New product was delivered to me within 3-4 days. This time it was sealed and had USB Type C cable inside. Thanks to the seller and amazon

Review: I am writing this review after purchasing this headphones almost 10 months. In starting it was good but from 1 month this headphone is not starting even though it's charging. I even tried to factory reset it but it's of no use because the headphone is not starting at all. Even though it's in warranty period the showroom of oneplus is war alway from my home. What to do now?

Everyone says about its pros, not consCons-- There is no quick switch button for dual paring-- Sometime next/previous button not work.-- dual pairing does not work. They just display the dual pairing-- you can't use more then 3 to 4 hours

Go for it.

Review: Bass is Thumping, but Reverberation Resonance is a bit off and has to be fine-tuned via OnePlus EQ. Watching movies with the device connected to Wireless Z sometimes needs change of HW/HW+ acceleration on MX player. Otherwise Good. Not Excellent. But Perfect for VFM.
Title: VFM and Long Lasting with Minimal Charge Time. Good for Games, Calls and Movies.

I don't know if this is due to brand difference between my phone and one plus bullets or due to any other isse but it's happening. Overall audio quality is fine and balanced.

But the issue is with the seller or courier service don't know exactly with whom but  Packaging quality is very low and earphones box was unwrapped and packed was opened by someone and were used one and buds were dirty, couldn't expect this but was my worst experience in this purchase

Bass quality is good and appreciable.
Title: Non attractive noise cancellation

The only drawback is the bud is made of plastic and not metal, but the overall build quality is good.The best feature of this buds is the quick Bluetooth connectivity and quick switching between devices.

At that point I generally pause my music wait a little and resume again, and it becomes alright. I don't know what can be causing this, but I have noticed this quite a few times and it's very annoying.
